T02TD1203E:208b-1: shr'i dzny'a ti la ka panytsi k'a gu hya tattva n'a ma /
T02TD1203E:208b-3: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba /
T02TD1203E:208b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1203E:208b-5: de nyid lnga brgyad drug gi bye brag de kho na nyid shar //
T02TD1203E:208b-6: rdo rje snying po bha gar sbas pa dam pa'i bde ba che //
T02TD1203E:208b-7: sku gsum ye shes lnga rdzogs bde gshegs kun kyi [*gyi] thugs rang bzhin //
T02TD1203E:208b-8: dpal ldan ye shes thig le khyed la sgo gsum dang bas 'dud //
T02TD1203E:208b-9: thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa la //
T02TD1203E:208b-10: bdag blo go skabs med mod kyi ;
T02TD1203E:208b-11: / gzhan gyis 'dir ni bskul ba'i phyir //
T02TD1203E:208b-12: gsang ba'i de nyid dka' 'grel brtsam //
T02TD1203E:208b-13: shes rab chung ba'i sems can rnams //
T02TD1203E:208b-14: rigs pa ngan pa chos kyi blos //
T02TD1203E:208b-15: ji ltar gsungs la ma gsungs smra //
T02TD1203E:208b-16: de bzhin 'dir yang gsungs mod kyang //
T02TD1203E:208b-17: sems can bsam pa'i khyad par gyis //
T02TD1203E:208b-18: zhal nas gsungs pa'i chos la yang //
T02TD1203E:208b-19: dga' zhing dad pa'i phyogs su 'jug / de bzhin 'di la yang 'jug go //
T02TD1203E:208b-20: de bas nyon mongs dbang gyur pa'i //
T02TD1203E:208b-22: brtse ba'i dbang gis gsang ba yi //
T02TD1203E:208b-23: de kho na nyid bshad par bya //
T02TD1203E:208b-24: 'dir rgyud kyi don de yang dgos 'brel rnam pa lngas bstan te /
T02TD1203E:208b-26: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i gang zag dang /
T02TD1203E:208b-27: gang zag gi rjes su 'brang ba gnyis las /
T02TD1203E:208b-28: snga ma 'jug par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1203E:208b-30: de la rgyud 'di dbu nas zhabs kyi bar gyi /
T02TD1203E:208b-31: tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs ni rjod par byed pa'o //
T02TD1203E:208b-32: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le sku gsum dang /
T02TD1203E:208b-33: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid rnams brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:208b-34: de rnams brjod par bya ba dang /
T02TD1203E:208b-36: der gdul bya rnams la bskyed rim la sogs pa'i thabs bstan pas dga' bar byas shing 'jug pa ni dgos pa'o //
T02TD1203E:208b-37: yang zhugs nas grub pa'i mthar phyin pa 'di ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'o //
T02TD1203E:208b-38: 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:209a-0: 'di skad ces bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du phyin ci ma log pa'i @209a * //
T02TD1203E:209a-1: don de yang dag par ston pa'i tshig gis so //
T02TD1203E:209a-3: sdud pa po lha'i dbang phyug gis zhes 'brel ba'o //
T02TD1203E:209a-5: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la sdud pa pos /
T02TD1203E:209a-6: ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du thob pa ni /
T02TD1203E:209a-7: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:209a-8: dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:209a-9: 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus bkag pa yin te /
T02TD1203E:209a-10: rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs pa'i dus na'o //
T02TD1203E:209a-11: de yang drang ba'i don gyis rgyud 'di 'byung bar dka' ba dang /
T02TD1203E:209a-12: sdud pa po shes rab che ba la sogs par bstan to //
T02TD1203E:209a-13: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:209a-14: bdud rnam pa bzhi bcom pa dang dbang phyug la sogs pa'i legs pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:209a-16: dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang //
T02TD1203E:209a-17: dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang //
T02TD1203E:209a-19: yang na mi mthun pa'i bdud de kun bcom nas /
T02TD1203E:209a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:209a-22: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis kyi dbang gis 'khor ba dang /
T02TD1203E:209a-23: mya ngan las 'das pa'i skyon gyis ma gos par gshegs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so //
T02TD1203E:209a-24: thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:209a-25: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
T02TD1203E:209a-27: thugs kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin ;
T02TD1203E:209a-28: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs so //
T02TD1203E:209a-29: dbyer med pa'i phyir rdo rje'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i sku bde ba chen po nyid do //
T02TD1203E:209a-31: de bzhin gshegs nyid dpal dang ldan //
T02TD1203E:209a-32: de bzhin gshegs shing byon pa'o //
T02TD1203E:209a-33: rigs lnga'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1203E:209a-34: thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:209a-36: dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:209a-37: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa'i phyir rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad bcom zhing zhi bar byed pa'i phyir na dpa' bo'o //
T02TD1203E:209b-0: @209b phyir la rgol bcom dpa' bo ste //
T02TD1203E:209b-1: de bzhin skye rga na 'chi yi /
T02TD1203E:209b-2: sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pas na //
T02TD1203E:209b-3: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
T02TD1203E:209b-5: dpa' mo zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du 'dir nu ma dang /
T02TD1203E:209b-6: mtshan ma la sogs pa'i khyad par byas pa'i bud med kyi gzugs kyis bzhugs pa ste /
T02TD1203E:209b-7: zla ma sogs pa'i dpa' mo rnams so //
T02TD1203E:209b-8: thabs dang shes rab kyi rnam pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i dpa' bo chen po dang /
T02TD1203E:209b-10: bcom ldan 'das la rnam par bskor nas bzhugs so //
T02TD1203E:209b-11: btsun mo ni rdo rje btsun mo rnams te /
T02TD1203E:209b-12: sangs rgyas spyan dang m'a ma k'i la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD1203E:209b-13: btsun mo dang bha ga dang /
T02TD1203E:209b-14: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs snying po rdo rje nyid ces bya ste /
T02TD1203E:209b-18: 'khor khyad par du gyur pa dpa' bo la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum dkar po nang stong pa /
T02TD1203E:209b-19: 'og phra la steng yongs su rgyas pa'i nang gi gzhal yas khang na bzhugs so //
T02TD1203E:209b-21: 'di skad bdag gis de nyid gsungs //
T02TD1203E:209b-22: bdag nyid dang ni bcas pa ste //
T02TD1203E:209b-23: rang bzhin bzhi yi rnam par ni //
T02TD1203E:209b-24: don dam par ni shes par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:209b-25: thos pa'i don zla bde mchog / de ni nam mkha' bzhin du mchog / gcig ces bya ba gzhan mchog go //
T02TD1203E:209b-26: srid dang mya ngan 'das dang bral //
T02TD1203E:209b-27: dus ni phyag rgya chen po bshad /
T02TD1203E:209b-28: bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs pa spangs //
T02TD1203E:209b-29: bcom ldan 'das ni mtha' zhes bstan //
T02TD1203E:209b-30: rang dga' nyams su myong ba'i dngos //
T02TD1203E:209b-31: thams cad stong ba ye shes gsum //
T02TD1203E:209b-32: de nyid kyis ni spangs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:209b-33: de bzhin gshegs ni rnams byed grags /
T02TD1203E:209b-34: dang po'i gnas ni grub par byed //
T02TD1203E:209b-35: sku ni dga' ba'i dngos por grags //
T02TD1203E:209b-36: dbang po gnyis byung dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1203E:209b-37: gsung ni mchog gi dga' bar bstan //
T02TD1203E:209b-38: dam tshig las byung gis ni spangs //
T02TD1203E:209b-39: thugs ni chad pas dga' ba ste //
T02TD1203E:209b-40: ye shes las byung gis ni spangs //
T02TD1203E:209b-41: rdo rje dang ni rang bzhin dga' //
T02TD1203E:209b-42: rang bzhin gyis ni rtog pa bral //
T02TD1203E:210a-2: zhu ba chad pa spangs pas gzugs //
T02TD1203E:210a-3: dpa' mo dbang phyug ma bde rten //
T02TD1203E:210a-4: dang po'i bdud rtsi las skyes pa'o //
T02TD1203E:210a-5: rnam skor yan lag thams cad kyis //
T02TD1203E:210a-6: khyab par chu yi padma bzhin //
T02TD1203E:210a-7: shes rab de ni tshangs pa'i gnas //
T02TD1203E:210a-8: tshangs pa ye shes 'dzin pa'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:210a-9: bha ga bdud ni 'joms pa'i phyir //
T02TD1203E:210a-10: yang na longs spyod myong bas so //
T02TD1203E:210a-11: bzhugs pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid de /
T02TD1203E:210a-12: de bzhin gnas pa yang na gshegs //
T02TD1203E:210a-13: de lta bu yi don du ni //
T02TD1203E:210a-14: 'di skad bdag gis la sogs par bstan //
T02TD1203E:210a-16: gzhan ni 'di skad bdag gis la sogs pa'i don ni ;
T02TD1203E:210a-17: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba de kho na nyid bzhir phye nas bstan te /
T02TD1203E:210a-19: phyi dang nang dang de bzhin gsang //
T02TD1203E:210a-20: de nyid don dang rnam pa bzhir //
T02TD1203E:210a-21: dkyil 'khor dang ni lus dang yang /
T02TD1203E:210a-22: las ni phyag rgya srang bzhin med //
T02TD1203E:210a-23: ces gsungs pa bzhin bshad zer ro yang gzhan dag ni 'di skad bdag gis la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni phyi la sogs pa'i don 'di skad bstan dgos pa gsal bar gsungs te /
T02TD1203E:210a-24: ae yi yi ge sa zhes bya /
T02TD1203E:210a-25: las kyi phyag rgyas sangs rgyas spyan //
T02TD1203E:210a-26: snying rje chen po dang ni thabs //
T02TD1203E:210a-27: sna tshogs dngos dang sna tshogs spyod //
T02TD1203E:210a-28: lte ba sna tshogs chu skyes kyi //
T02TD1203E:210a-29: sprul pa'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:210a-30: wam gi yi ge chur shes bya //
T02TD1203E:210a-31: chos kyi phyag rgya m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1203E:210a-32: byams pa chen po smon lam las //
T02TD1203E:210a-33: rdo rje rigs kyi lha mo ste //
T02TD1203E:210a-34: snying gar chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad //
T02TD1203E:210a-35: chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus na gnas //
T02TD1203E:210a-36: ma yig me ru brjod pa'o ;
T02TD1203E:210a-37: / phyag rgya chen po gos dkar mo //
T02TD1203E:210a-38: dga' ba dang ni stobs [?] rang bzhin //
T02TD1203E:210a-40: mgrin par chu skyes bcu drug 'dab //
T02TD1203E:210a-41: longs spyod 'khor lo'i dbus gnas pa'o /
T02TD1203E:210a-42: ya yig rlung du shes par bya /
T02TD1203E:210a-43: dam tshig phyag rgya dam tshig sgrol //
T02TD1203E:210a-44: btang snyoms ye shes sbyor ba las //
T02TD1203E:210a-45: las kyi rigs kyi lha mo gtso //
T02TD1203E:210a-46: spyi bor 'dab skyes sum cu gnyis /
T02TD1203E:210a-47: bde chen 'khor lo la gnas pa'i //
T02TD1203E:210a-48: nyon mongs thams cad 'joms mdzad pa //
T02TD1203E:210a-49: 'khor ba las sgrol sgrol mar bshad //
T02TD1203E:210b-0: de bzhin du yang rigs kyi bu 'di skad @210b bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge 'di dag chos thams cad kyi thog mar brjod pa ni /
T02TD1203E:210b-1: rtag tu dag pa'i phyir yi ge ste /
T02TD1203E:210b-2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skyed pa por byed pa grub pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:210b-3: de'i phyir na 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la sogs pa'i don rgyas par bshad dgos zer ro //
T02TD1203E:210b-4: yang gzhan kha cig na re 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la sogs pa'i don dbye bar mi bya ste /
T02TD1203E:210b-5: de rang gi don ji lta ba bzhin bstan pa yin gyi /
T02TD1203E:210b-7: le'u dang po 'di dang gnyis pa'i snod drang ba dang nges par ma phye ba'i phyir na /
T02TD1203E:210b-8: rgyud kyi don ji lta ba bzhin du bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1203E:210b-9: de yang ston pa bcom ldan 'das ni rtogs shing mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:210b-10: 'khor dang bsdu ba por bcas pa rnams ni /
T02TD1203E:210b-11: nyan cing shes par 'dod pa'i bsam pa can yin no //
T02TD1203E:210b-12: de'i phyir 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi don la ;
T02TD1203E:210b-13: de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bos nas /
T02TD1203E:210b-14: de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa'i ngo bo la sogs pa'i gleng bslang ba yin zer ro //
T02TD1203E:210b-15: de dag gis gzhung la bdag gi ni yid ches par mi byed do //
T02TD1203E:210b-16: 'on kyang gzhan dang po srid pas dor ba yang ma yin no //
T02TD1203E:210b-17: slob dpon chen po aindra bh'u ti'i man ngag gis gsungs pa bzhin bdag 'dzin te /
T02TD1203E:210b-18: de yang drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don du dbye'o //
T02TD1203E:210b-20: nges dang drang don bye brag tu //
T02TD1203E:210b-21: 'di skad bdag gis la sogs bshad //
T02TD1203E:210b-23: / der dpal nam mkha' dri med ces bya ba ni yang dag 'od rab nyid las ston pa dang /
T02TD1203E:210b-24: 'khor gyi bye brag gi gzugs kyis sprul nas /
T02TD1203E:210b-25: sems can gyi don mdzad pa dang /
T02TD1203E:210b-26: de bzhin du yang gdul bya la dgongs nas /
T02TD1203E:210b-27: rtsa'i dbus stong pa'i nam mkhas kyang bstan pa ni /
T02TD1203E:210b-28: der dpa' bo chen po dang /
T02TD1203E:210b-29: dpa' mor bcas pa'i bzhugs gnas de ru'o //
T02TD1203E:210b-30: de dpa' bo chen po byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dri med dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'khor mchog tu gyur pa dpa' bo dang /
T02TD1203E:211a-0: dpa' mo rnams kyang tshul ji lta ba bzhin bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tha @211a * //
T02TD1203E:211a-2: /'dir de rnams kyi mtshan dang grangs bshad pa /
T02TD1203E:211a-3: dpal nam mkha' dri med dang /
T02TD1203E:211a-4: shin tu rtsal phye dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
T02TD1203E:211a-5: kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa'i don 'di rnams 'og nas gsungs pas 'dir rnam par bshad pa gsal bar ma byas so //
T02TD1203E:211a-6: de lta bu'i zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:211a-7: mtshan dang grangs bstan pa ste de rnams so //
T02TD1203E:211a-8: rab zhal la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:211a-9: dpal nam mkha' dri med la sogs pa'i dpa' bo bcu drug po rnams dang /
T02TD1203E:211a-10: dpa' bo sum cu gnyis po kun no //
T02TD1203E:211a-11: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni /
T02TD1203E:211a-13: yang na dga' ba bcu drug po rnams so //
T02TD1203E:211a-14: phyir rim gyi dpa' mo bcu drug po'i rnam par dag pa ni yul lnga dang /
T02TD1203E:211a-22: de rnams rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1203E:211a-23: ma mo'i btsun mo zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ma mo ni mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs so //
T02TD1203E:211a-26: dpa' bo rnams kyis rol cing spyad pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1203E:211a-27: bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba ni ;
T02TD1203E:211a-28: rtsa phra mo bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis rnam par dag pa'i tshul de bzhin du 'dir yang gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:211a-29: rtsa rnams kyi don de rnams kun gyi 'khor ni /
T02TD1203E:211a-30: bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis ma mo'i btsun mo mkha' 'gro ma'i grangs rnams so //
T02TD1203E:211a-32: legs dgyes chen mo'i sbyor bas bzhugs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:211a-33: shes rab dang thabs kyi sbyor bas mnyes pa ste /
T02TD1203E:211a-34: yum phyag rgya chen po ni mtshungs pa gzhan dang mi mtshungs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:211a-35: de yang dag par sbyor zhing rol pas mnyes pa ni /
T02TD1203E:211a-36: legs dgyes kyi bde bas myong ba'o //
T02TD1203E:211a-37: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bka' stsal pas ni /
T02TD1203E:211a-39: byang chub sems dpa' ni gnyis su med pa'i yang dag pa bla na med pa'i byang chub la spyod pa'o //
T02TD1203E:211a-40: de nyid kyi don byang chub tu thob pa la sems dpa' ni /
T02TD1203E:211b-0: byang chub @211b sems mi gtong bar sems shing yang dang yang du byang chub sems dpa' ste /
T02TD1203E:211b-2: 'gro ba'i bsam ba ji bzhin du don spyod nus shing mdzad ba ni sems dpa' chen po'o //
T02TD1203E:211b-3: byang chub kyi sems nyid lha yin la /
T02TD1203E:211b-4: de nyid la mnga' bas na lha dbang phyug go ;
T02TD1203E:211b-6: byang chub gnyis med ye shes te //
T02TD1203E:211b-7: der sems mi gtod sems pa'o //
T02TD1203E:211b-8: gang der 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
T02TD1203E:211b-9: rin po che'i bzhin chen pos mdzad //
T02TD1203E:211b-11: des na 'dir kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug ces bos nas /
T02TD1203E:211b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to //
T02TD1203E:211b-14: 'gro ba gdul bya'i bsam pa la dgongs nas gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:211b-15: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang /
T02TD1203E:211b-16: zla ba bde ba mchog gi dang /
T02TD1203E:211b-19: de la rang gi ngo bo dang /
T02TD1203E:211b-22: dpal ye shes thig ler grags pa nyon cig / ces gsungs pa la /
T02TD1203E:211b-23: de ltar dus kyi so so skye bo byis pa rnams yang dag pa'i don ni ma rtogs shing /
T02TD1203E:211b-24: rigs pa ngan pas sgro 'dogs pa dang /
T02TD1203E:211b-25: skur pa 'debs pa la ni dga'/
T02TD1203E:211b-26: kha cig ni 'brel pa med par rgyud la sogs pa'i don bshad par yang byed /
T02TD1203E:211b-27: de bzhin yang kha cig ni phyin ci log gi rtog pa dang /
T02TD1203E:211b-29: nga rgyal gyis rgyud la sogs pa'i 'grel pa rtsom par byed cing grub pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang mi ldan pas dmyal bar 'gro'o //
T02TD1203E:211b-30: de bas na kho bos de rnams la bsams te /
T02TD1203E:211b-31: 'dir kha cig gis gzhung bkod pa ni /
T02TD1203E:211b-32: don ji bzhin du bdag gis bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:211b-34: 'grel bshad med par mdor bsdus rgyud //
T02TD1203E:211b-35: rigs pa ngan pas 'chad par byed //
T02TD1203E:211b-36: gzhan gyi chung ma nor zas la //
T02TD1203E:211b-37: sred bskyed nas ni dmyal bar 'gro //
T02TD1203E:211b-39: grub dang yon tan med par ni /
T02TD1203E:211b-40: kha cig 'grel bshad sogs byed cing //
T02TD1203E:211b-41: sgra dang rtog gi nga rgyal gyis //
T02TD1203E:211b-42: rnal 'byor spyod las nyams par byed //
T02TD1203E:212a-1: skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
T02TD1203E:212a-2: bcom ldan 'das zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1203E:212a-3: de kho na nyid gsum la sogs par sbyar te /
T02TD1203E:212a-4: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid ni /
T02TD1203E:212a-5: ae wam la y'a zhes bya bas bstan te /
T02TD1203E:212a-6: rgyud dang sdud pa por 'brel pas na'o /
T02TD1203E:212a-7: yang na 'dir mthun par ae wam ma y'a zhes bya'o //
T02TD1203E:212a-8: thos pa ni zla ba bde mchog go //
T02TD1203E:212a-9: thos pa ni sdud pa po'i myong ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02TD1203E:212a-10: de bzhin du zla ba bde mchog kyang bstan no //
T02TD1203E:212a-11: dus ni phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid de /
T02TD1203E:212a-12: mtshan ma'i dngos po thams cad dang bral /
T02TD1203E:212a-13: bsam du med pa'i dus phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1203E:212a-14: de gnyis dbyer med par gcig pa'o //
T02TD1203E:212a-15: mtha' zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das so //
T02TD1203E:212a-16: spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad las ring du song bas na /
T02TD1203E:212a-19: 'di skad bdag gis de nyid gsum //
T02TD1203E:212a-20: bdag nyid dang yang bcas pa ste //
T02TD1203E:212a-21: thos pa'i don ni zla bde mchog / dus ni phyag rgya chen po ste //
T02TD1203E:212a-22: bcom ldan 'das ni mtha' zhes bya //
T02TD1203E:212a-24: de bas na de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1203E:212a-25: dpal ye shes thig ler grags pa nyon cig ces 'grel pas /
T02TD1203E:212a-26: don de bzhin bshad zer ro //
T02TD1203E:212a-27: kha cig ni de la de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:212a-28: cha la sogs pa'i sbyor ba drug dang gcig pa nyid yan lag sbyor ba drug po ni /
T02TD1203E:212a-29: dpal ye shes thig ler bshad do //
T02TD1203E:212a-31: cha dang thig le dang ni tshul //
T02TD1203E:212a-32: de nyid gsum bdag bstan pa yin //
T02TD1203E:212a-33: tshul tsam zla ba bde ba mchog / phyag rgya chen po 'dir ni mchog / de yi mtha' ni mchog gzhan no //
T02TD1203E:212a-36: shr'i ni gzhan min 'dir ni cha //
T02TD1203E:212a-37: dzny'a zhes bya ba thig ler bstan //
T02TD1203E:212a-38: na yi yig 'bru tshul yin te //
T02TD1203E:212a-39: ti yi yig 'bru tshul tsam mo //
T02TD1203E:212a-40: la yi yig 'bru mchog tu bshad //
T02TD1203E:212a-41: ka yi mchog gzhan zhes pa'o //
T02TD1203E:212a-43: de kho na nyid gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02TD1203E:212a-44: dpal ye shes thig ler grags pa nyon cig ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:212a-45: de bzhin bshad dgos zer ro //
T02TD1203E:212b-1: rgyud 'di dbu zhabs kyi don gyi snying po ni de kho na nyid bcu yin la /
T02TD1203E:212b-2: 'di rnams sbyor ba drug tu 'dus la /
T02TD1203E:212b-4: brjod pa las brjod par bya ba rnyed par 'gyur /
T02TD1203E:212b-5: de bas na de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1203E:212b-6: dpal ye shes thig ler grags pa nyon cig ces pa 'grel de skad du yang /
T02TD1203E:212b-7: de nyid sum cu drug bdag po //
T02TD1203E:212b-8: cha yi ye shes tshor byed de //
T02TD1203E:212b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
T02TD1203E:212b-10: le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa nas rgyas par bstan pa de'i phyir na /
T02TD1203E:212b-11: de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa'i don de bzhin du bshad dgos zer ro //
T02TD1203E:212b-12: yang la la dag na re /
T02TD1203E:212b-13: de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i don ni /
T02TD1203E:212b-14: 'dir skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
T02TD1203E:212b-15: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gleng gzhi dang sbyar la bshad de /
T02TD1203E:212b-16: bcom ldan 'das yan chad sngar bshad pa dang mthun no //
T02TD1203E:212b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:212b-19: byang chub kyi sems dbyer med pa'i gzugs ni /
T02TD1203E:212b-20: mchog tu zab pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bsdus pa'o //
T02TD1203E:212b-21: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
T02TD1203E:212b-22: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:212b-23: sku dang gsung dang thugs snying po rdo rje'o //
T02TD1203E:212b-24: zla ba bde mchog ni dpa' bo chen po dang /
T02TD1203E:212b-25: dpa' mo dbang phyug ma yang yin te /
T02TD1203E:212b-27: dpa' bo la sogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' yin pas so //
T02TD1203E:212b-28: de bas byang chub sems dpa' ni /
T02TD1203E:212b-29: byang chub kyi sems dpa' yin no //
T02TD1203E:212b-30: phyag rgya chen po ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes chen po'i don rdo rje chos kyi sku'o //
T02TD1203E:212b-31: bsod nams dang snying rje'i dbang gis snying po'i gzugs kyis so //
T02TD1203E:212b-32: de'i mtha' ni bzhugs gnas chos kyi 'byung gnas gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:212b-33: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni drug pa'i sgra dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:212b-35: de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma las ni sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:212b-37: de nyid gsum ni sku gsung thugs //
T02TD1203E:213a-0: rdo rje gsum ni ye shes @213a * //
T02TD1203E:213a-1: mchog ; zla ba bde ba mchog gis gang //
T02TD1203E:213a-2: de ni phung po dbang po khams //
T02TD1203E:213a-3: phyag rgya chen po rdor snying po //
T02TD1203E:213a-4: de yi mtha' ni bha gar bshad //
T02TD1203E:213a-7: de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma dang /
T02TD1203E:213a-8: le'u gnyis pa'i gzhung gis don rgyas par bshad par bya dgos zer ro //
T02TD1203E:213a-9: de rnams kyi rang rang gi gzhung la gzhan dad pa srid pas ma bkag pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:213a-10: 'on kyang kho bo ni mi 'thad de /
T02TD1203E:213a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don rgyas par bshad de /
T02TD1203E:213a-13: 'dir de rnams dang mthun pa ma yin pa /
T02TD1203E:213a-14: de bas na rgyud la 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1203E:213a-15: bla ma'i man ngag gis bshad pa 'di gnyis kyi le'u gnyis pa dang bcas pa 'di ni bdag gi 'dud pa dang 'jug par 'thad pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:213a-16: yang la la 'di ltar sems par 'gyur te /
T02TD1203E:213a-17: de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa gsungs pa ni don dam pa spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba nyid yin pas //
T02TD1203E:213a-18: de la kun rdzob kyi rnam pa dang tshad dang ngo bo bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ci snyam mo bar dpyod du dogs pa'i bsam pa bslang ste /
T02TD1203E:213a-19: 'di'i don gsal bar bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:213a-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i dbang phyug mtshan ma la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i chos rnams kun gyis mgos pa ni /
T02TD1203E:213a-21: dpal ye shes thig le yin na /
T02TD1203E:213a-22: de la rnam pa la sogs pa mtshan nyid kun rdzob tu gsungs pas /
T02TD1203E:213a-23: sa la lta zhing cang mi gsung bar 'dug go zhes bshad do //
T02TD1203E:213a-24: de'i dus na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa mtshan ma'i bden par mtshan ma'i bden pa rnam par rtog pa spangs pa yin yang /
T02TD1203E:213a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis su med pa'i don la dgongs nas /
T02TD1203E:213a-26: zhu ba po la sogs pas rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:213a-27: rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul bstan pa ni /
T02TD1203E:213a-28: nam mkha' dngos po med pa'i stong pa las /
T02TD1203E:213a-29: dngos po can gyi me tog sna tshogs pa dang /
T02TD1203E:213a-30: dri chen po dang ldan pa'i me tog dang /
T02TD1203E:213a-31: rin po che la sogs pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid mngon par sprul nas /
T02TD1203E:213a-32: char bzhin nyid la nyid kyis zhabs kyi rtsa ba la sogs pa drung du sprul nas bab par mdzad do //
T02TD1203E:213b-0: yang @213b bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:213b-1: sngar bos par ma zad da ltar yang bos nas /
T02TD1203E:213b-2: khyod ci yang lan ni smra bar 'dug pa /
T02TD1203E:213b-3: ci zhig la ya mtshan du 'gyur ba yin zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:213b-4: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:213b-5: rdo rje 'dzin la sngar gyi don la gsol pa'o //
T02TD1203E:213b-6: de la rang gi ngo bo dang /
T02TD1203E:213b-8: tshad yod dam ci zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:213b-10: mtshan ma la sogs pa'i dngos po dang bral ba'i don dam pa'i bde ba chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de la kun rdzob kyi rnam pa la sogs pa yod dam ci ;
T02TD1203E:213b-11: de la bdag lha'i dbang phyug ya mtshan skyed par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1203E:213b-13: lha'i dbang phyug ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:213b-14: rdo rje 'dzin pas dbang phyug dam pa sbyin par mdzad nas byis pa so so'i skye bo'i don la bskul ba'o //
T02TD1203E:213b-15: dkon mchog gsum gyi bdag nyid thugs yang dag pa'i rdo rje ni mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1203E:213b-16: 'di gsungs zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i don gtan la dbab ste /
T02TD1203E:213b-17: chos can gyis chos nyid dam pa bsgrub dgos pas na med dam ci zhes so //
T02TD1203E:213b-18: de ltar yang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:213b-19: de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:213b-20: de rang gi ngo bo dang /
T02TD1203E:213b-22: tshad kyis lha'i dbang phyug ya mtshan skyer rung ba'o //
T02TD1203E:213b-23: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams kun ni chos thams cad do //
T02TD1203E:213b-24: de'i chos nyid ngo bo nyid kyang de yin la //
T02TD1203E:213b-25: stong pa nyid kyang de yin /
T02TD1203E:213b-26: don dam pa'i bden pa yang de nyid do //
T02TD1203E:213b-27: stong pa nyid 'di kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam la ma brten par shes par gal 'gyur te mi 'gyur ro zhes so //
T02TD1203E:213b-28: de'i phyir mig yor tsam zhes bya'o //
T02TD1203E:213b-29: yang dag pa ma yin la kun rdzob sgyu ma dang /
T02TD1203E:213b-30: mig yor dang sprul pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:213b-31: tsam gyi sgras sgyu ma nyid rang bzhin med par bstan to //
T02TD1203E:213b-32: rgyu ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes spros pa med pa'i rgyu de rang rten du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:213b-34: de nyid tshol la thog mar ni //
T02TD1203E:213b-35: thams cad yod ces brjod par bya //
T02TD1203E:213b-36: don dam rtogs shing chags med nas //
T02TD1203E:214a-1: sgyu ma tsham gyi chos can chos la brten nas /
T02TD1203E:214a-3: chos thams cad zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD1203E:214a-4: zag pa med pa'i chos kun no //
T02TD1203E:214a-5: ji ltar gal rtsi la brten ni dri gang yin rnyed par 'gyur gyi zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:214a-6: gla rtsi dang dri gcig pa yang ma yin /
T02TD1203E:214a-7: tha dad pa yang ma yin te 'on kyang gla rtsi dngos po med par dri ga las rnyed //
T02TD1203E:214a-8: rgyu dang ldan pa la thabs kyis rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1203E:214a-9: de med par zhes bya ba ni gal rtsi'i dngos po med par mi rnyed do //
T02TD1203E:214a-10: rnyed par ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:214a-11: dngos po med par dri mi rnyed de /
T02TD1203E:214a-13: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni don ston pa yin te /
T02TD1203E:214a-14: rang gi ngo bo dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:214a-15: ji ltar gal rtsi las dri rnyed pa bzhin /
T02TD1203E:214a-16: kun rdzob kyi thabs la brten nas don dam pa rnyed par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni de lta ma yin no //
T02TD1203E:214a-18: thabs ma yin pas ring ba dang //
T02TD1203E:214a-19: thabs kyis ring ba ma yin ba //
T02TD1203E:214a-20: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas te //
T02TD1203E:214a-21: zhes rab srid la mi gnas so //
T02TD1203E:214a-22: zhes bya ba bshad pa lta bu'o //
T02TD1203E:214a-23: des nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
T02TD1203E:214a-24: lnga dpe'i don gyis bstan pa la bsnyag go //
T02TD1203E:214a-25: khyab dang khyab byed bye brag tu //
T02TD1203E:214a-27: ji ltar shing dang sha pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa bzhin du /
T02TD1203E:214a-28: don dam pa'i bden pa spros pa dang bral bas /
T02TD1203E:214a-29: kun rdzob kyi dngos po la khyab pas khyab byed kyi don ni zlas bye'o //
T02TD1203E:214a-30: mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa'i phyogs kyis dkri bar bya ste /
T02TD1203E:214a-31: tha dad pa'i chos bgrang ba ni /
T02TD1203E:214a-32: bye brag mang po'i don to //
T02TD1203E:214a-33: de rnams thams cad dbyer med pas na gnyis su med bde ba chen po'o //
T02TD1203E:214a-34: bde ba sku la brten pa'i phyir //
T02TD1203E:214a-36: kun rdzob phyogs kyis bstan pa'i sku'i dngos po la /
T02TD1203E:214a-37: don dam pa de bzhin du brten pas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes chen po de kho na nyid bsgrub bya thob par 'gyur bas na /
T02TD1203E:214a-38: sku la brten na de nyid 'gyur //
T02TD1203E:214a-40: sku la brten pa ni thabs kyis rab tu bstan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:214a-41: sku bde rnam par shes yin no //
T02TD1203E:214a-42: thams cad gnyis su med pa'i dngos //
T02TD1203E:214a-43: zhes bya ba ni phyogs gnyis pa'i chos rnams bsdus te /
T02TD1203E:214b-0: bye brag @214b gnyis brtags pa thams cad gnyis su med par zung du 'jug pa'o //
T02TD1203E:214b-3: rtog pa gnyis po spangs pas ni /
T02TD1203E:214b-4: gang du dngos po gcig gyur pa //
T02TD1203E:214b-5: de ni zung 'jug ces byar bstan //
T02TD1203E:214b-7: drug gi bde ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:214b-8: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid la sogs pa der bstan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:214b-9: ye shes mchog ces bya ba ni spros pa dang bral ba'i dga' ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD1203E:214b-10: 'o na de gang gis rnyed par 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1203E:214b-11: sku dang bde ba gnyis las 'byung //
T02TD1203E:214b-12: zhes sngar bstan par byas so ;
T02TD1203E:214b-13: / de nas sbyor ba drug gi don gsungs pa //
T02TD1203E:214b-14: 'khor lo drug gi dbus na gnas //
T02TD1203E:214b-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:214b-16: bde ba chen po la sogs pa drug ni lte ba'i nang gi dbus su //
T02TD1203E:214b-17: de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa'i sbyor ba drug bzhugs pa'i gnas so //
T02TD1203E:214b-18: dang po gsum ni rgyu las ye shes can ri bong can gyi rim ba skye ba ni 'bras bu'i bdag nyid mchog go //
T02TD1203E:214b-20: lus rten srog gi dbyug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:214b-21: lus la srog rten pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1203E:214b-22: yang na srog la lus rten pa'o //
T02TD1203E:214b-23: thigs pa dang bcas de rnams sbyor ;
T02TD1203E:214b-24: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:214b-25: byang chub kyi sems ga bur dang bcas nas rtog med ma dang /
T02TD1203E:214b-26: rlung ro gcig tu gyur pa'i rim pas sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1203E:214b-27: srog ni rlung dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems /
T02TD1203E:214b-29: srog ma'i rtsa ka pa'i gzugs kyis 'khor lo rnams kyi dbus na gnas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:214b-31: lus rten srog gi dbyug pa la //
T02TD1203E:214b-33: nang du'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:214b-34: 'dzin ma dang ro ma g-yas g-yon de gnyis kyi dbus su'o //
T02TD1203E:214b-35: de bzhin du byang chub sems kyi lam ni gsum ste /
T02TD1203E:214b-36: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'o //
T02TD1203E:214b-37: phyi ni 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rten dang /
T02TD1203E:214b-38: brten pa'i bdag nyid kun du sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1203E:214b-39: nang gi rlung dang byang chub sems la spyod pa'o //
T02TD1203E:214b-40: gsang ba ni ye shes la spyod pa'o //
T02TD1203E:214b-42: ye shes skyes pa'i lam ni bzhi //
T02TD1203E:215a-0: srog ma las dga' ro ma mchog /'dzin @215a * //
T02TD1203E:215a-1: ma las ni bral ba'i mchog / rtog med rang bzhin dga' ba'i lam //
T02TD1203E:215a-4: cha yi sbyor ba nang du min //
T02TD1203E:215a-5: nang du de ni rtog med na /
T02TD1203E:215a-6: g-yas g-yon mdud pa'i nang du ni /
T02TD1203E:215a-7: ro ma dang ni 'dzin ma gnas //
T02TD1203E:215a-9: de bzhin du gsum du dbye ba dang bzhir dbye ba yang gsum gyi don to //
T02TD1203E:215a-10: de'i don ni bde chen 'khor lo'i lte ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1203E:215a-11: bde chen ni byang chub sems kun rdzob dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:215a-12: 'khor lo ni 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1203E:215a-13: lte ba ni gong du bshad par byas so //
T02TD1203E:215a-14: ri bong can gyi byang chub kyi sems bde ba dang rtsa dang ldan pa ni zla ba rgyas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:215a-15: rtsa dang rgyas pa dang srog gi rlung dang ldan pa ni bcas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:215a-16: sbyor ba drug gi dang po ni thog ma'o //
T02TD1203E:215a-17: zur gsum gyi dbyibs kyi gzugs can rnams ni zur gsum gyi rnam pa'i tshul lo //
T02TD1203E:215a-18: rtsa dang rlung dang byang chub sems kyi khyad par kun gcig gis don rtogs pas thams cad kyang ngo //
T02TD1203E:215a-19: longs spyod lte ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:215a-20: ye shes kyi ro la sogs pa la longs spyod pa'o //
T02TD1203E:215a-21: lce dang bcas pa'i rtsa ro myong bar byed pa ni /
T02TD1203E:215a-24: de bzhin du ming ni brtags pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:215a-25: rtsa dang bde ba'i rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1203E:215a-26: gyen du 'gro ba'i rlung dang 'dzom pa ni bde ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:215a-27: ske ni longs spyod 'khor lo'i rten no //
T02TD1203E:215a-28: chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:215a-29: sems las chos rnams 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:215a-31: padma 'dab ma brgyad dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:215a-32: nam mkha' ma ni sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:215a-33: snying ga rtsa'i yon tan gyis ye shes ldan pa ni bde ba'i ye shes dang /
T02TD1203E:215a-34: gzhi'i rlung dang ldan pa sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:215a-35: sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lte ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:215a-36: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams 'byung ba ni sprul ba'i don to //
T02TD1203E:215a-37: sems can dang sangs rgyas sprul ba'i 'dab ma ni drug cu rtsa bzhis mtshon pa'o //
T02TD1203E:215a-38: 'dod ma ni gtum mo 'byung ba'i gnas kyi rtsa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:215b-0: bdud rtsi ldan @215b ni rlung kro dha dang bcas pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1203E:215b-1: me'i 'khor lo ni 'dab ma gsum pa'i me'i gnas so //
T02TD1203E:215b-2: sngar las khyab par du gyur pa ni rab 'od ma'o //
T02TD1203E:215b-3: 'dod par ldan ni rlung 'dod pa dang bcas pa'i bde ba'o //
T02TD1203E:215b-4: rlung gi 'khor lo'i lte ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:215b-5: 'dab ma drug pa'i gnas ni rlung gi 'khor lo ste /
T02TD1203E:215b-6: rlung gi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i gnas na mo'i rtsa ni brtson 'grus ma'o //
T02TD1203E:215b-7: gsal ba'i rlung dang bcas pa ni stobs dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:215b-8: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs don gyis sbyor ba drug tu bshad pa ste /
T02TD1203E:215b-10: de ni sbyor drug rnam par shes //
T02TD1203E:215b-11: rtsa dang thigs pa dang ldan no //
T02TD1203E:215b-13: gang tshe rtog med mas ni 'khyud //
T02TD1203E:215b-14: de tshe tshangs pa'i dbyug pa yin //
T02TD1203E:215b-15: zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe 'khor lo rnams kyi lte ba dang /
T02TD1203E:215b-16: bde ba bzhengs bzhugs gnas par ldan pa de'i tshe /
T02TD1203E:215b-18: gang dang de gnyis rtag tu 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1203E:215b-19: tshangs pa ni ye shes dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems srog gi dbyug pa la 'khyud pa'i tshul gyis tshangs pa'i dbyug pa'o //
T02TD1203E:215b-20: tshangs pa ye shes 'dzin pas na /
T02TD1203E:215b-21: dbyug pa rnam rtog 'joms pas so //
T02TD1203E:215b-23: de'i don rgyas par bstan pa ni /
T02TD1203E:215b-24: de yi dus ni bdag gis bshad //
T02TD1203E:215b-25: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni de'i dus zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:215b-28: bsam du med pa'i dus so //
T02TD1203E:215b-30: 'ong ba bzang ba'i dus zhes bya //
T02TD1203E:215b-31: 'gro bas ngan pa'i dus yin no ;
T02TD1203E:215b-32: / bzang po de ni mchog tu bstan //
T02TD1203E:215b-33: ngan pa'i dus ni bral ba'o //
T02TD1203E:215b-34: gnyis dang bral ba de kho nyid //
T02TD1203E:215b-35: rnam rtog dngos po thams cad bral //
T02TD1203E:215b-37: shar ba la sogs pa'i ye shes 'byung ba gong gi de ni 'di nas mar ro //
T02TD1203E:215b-38: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bshad pa'o //
T02TD1203E:215b-39: shar ba dang nub pa zhes bya ba ni steng dang 'og gi 'pho bas na /
T02TD1203E:215b-40: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i lte ba man chad du bcu drug 'pho ba de bzhin du yang rin po che nor bu sprul pa'i 'khor lo nas steng du 'pho ba bcu drug go //
T02TD1203E:216a-3: byang chub kyi sems dang rlung gnyis phrad pa'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:216a-5: rtog med ma nyid ni gcig pu'o //
T02TD1203E:216a-6: dngos po'i ni ro ma dang 'dzin ma dang srog ma'o //
T02TD1203E:216a-7: sbyor ba ni rtsa dang rlung dang byang chub kyi sems ro gcig pas sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1203E:216a-8: rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis ni mdud pa bcu drug pa phrag gnyis /
T02TD1203E:216a-9: steng dang 'og tu 'pho ba'i g-yas g-yon gyis gnas so //
T02TD1203E:216a-10: byang chub kyi sems dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gdu bu'i rnam pa zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1203E:216a-11: ri bong can gyi rnam pa ni /
T02TD1203E:216a-12: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje rin po che'i nor bu dang bcas pa'i gnas kyi gdu bu sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag po'i rnam pa dga' ba bzhi dang ldan pa'i rnam pa dang /
T02TD1203E:216a-14: 'dir yang rnam par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD1203E:216a-15: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:216a-19: gsum gyi bdag nyid ni rtog med ma'o //
T02TD1203E:216a-20: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rtogs pa med pas na /
T02TD1203E:216a-22: rgyu'i dngos su snang ba las 'bras bu'i ming brtags pa'o //
T02TD1203E:216a-23: yang na sku ni dga' ba /
T02TD1203E:216a-26: bdag nyid rang bzhin dga' ba /
T02TD1203E:216a-27: gcig pu rtog med ma zhes bshad do //
T02TD1203E:216a-28: bde ba chen po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'khor lo drug gi lte ba dang po bde ba chen po nas tha ma rdo rje nor bu'i gnas bde chen gyis bshad pa ga bur dang bcas pa'i g-yas dang g-yon de bzhin tshangs pa'i dbyug pa'o //
T02TD1203E:216a-29: ji ltar ni dpes bshad pa'o //
T02TD1203E:216a-30: tsandan go shirsha'i shing gi dbus su sprul mo yod pa'o //
T02TD1203E:216a-31: de bzhin tshangs pa'i dbyug pa'i dbus na /
T02TD1203E:216a-32: ro ma dang 'dzin ma g-yas g-yon /
T02TD1203E:216a-34: lha'i dbang phyug de la ji ltar bdag nyid kyi don bshad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:216a-35: gor shirsha'i tsandan de bzhin du /
T02TD1203E:216a-36: rtog med ma tshangs pa'i dbyug pa la mdun du 'khyud pa'i don rgyas par bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:216a-37: de la tshangs pa'i rus pa'i tshigs pa'i nang mtshan no //
T02TD1203E:216a-38: dbyug pa'i snying po ni srog gi dbyug pa dang gsum par ldan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:216b-0: dang por las kyi phyag rgya dang @216b mnyam par sbyor ba /
T02TD1203E:216b-1: dang po'i zur gsum gyi rnam pa mdud pa'i lte bar zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:216b-2: 'pho ba'i dang po rten nas dbyibs zur gsum dbus kyi lte bar /
T02TD1203E:216b-3: dngos shes rab ma las kyi phyag rgyal lta ba las 'dar ba'i ro skye /
T02TD1203E:216b-4: ye shes 'dod pa'i dga' ba srog rlung ldan pa zla stod kyi tshes gcig //
T02TD1203E:216b-5: chu tshod gcig gi bar du byang chub sems kyi thig le /
T02TD1203E:216b-7: rten padma'i dbyibs can du dngos rig pa la 'dod pa las 'dra ba skye /
T02TD1203E:216b-8: 'dar ba'i dga' ba'i ye shes nye ba'i srog rlung dang ldan pa /
T02TD1203E:216b-9: tshes gnyis kyi zla ba 'phel ba bzhin chu tshod gnyis kyi bar du yun ring bar mtshungs pa /
T02TD1203E:216b-10: byang chub kyi sems stobs kyi thig le rnam par 'byed pa nub pa'o //
T02TD1203E:216b-11: rten du grags pa'i ming can du /
T02TD1203E:216b-13: 'gro ba'i ye shes mnyam pa'i rlung dang ldan pa'i tshes gsum gyi chu tshod gsum gyi bar du ;
T02TD1203E:216b-14: byang chub kyi sems sprin gyi thig le rnam par 'byed pa shar ba'o //
T02TD1203E:216b-15: de bzhin du gzhan rnams kyang rim pa bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD1203E:216b-16: 'dar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma tsam bstan to //
T02TD1203E:216b-17: bzhi pa nu ma reg pa la rdul skye /
T02TD1203E:216b-18: lnga pa dang drug par ba spu langs pa skye /
T02TD1203E:216b-19: bdun pa dang brgyad par dbyangs kyi khyad par skye /
T02TD1203E:216b-20: dgu pa dang bcu par bkrag bzang bar skye /
T02TD1203E:216b-21: bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis par kha dog 'gyur pa skye /
T02TD1203E:216b-23: bcu bzhi par dga' ba'i snang ba mi gsal ba skye /
T02TD1203E:216b-24: mtha' ma gnyis la yang snang ba thim pa skye'o //
T02TD1203E:216b-25: yang na gnyid pa dang 'khrul pa dang /
T02TD1203E:216b-39: rnam par 'byed pa yang de bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:216b-40: mtshan mas ye shes skye ba'i rim pa shes rab 'gyur ro //
T02TD1203E:216b-41: ye shes skye ba'i rim pa shes pa'i dgos pa gang yin snyam pa la /
T02TD1203E:216b-42: des ni rang bzhin dga' ba rten med rnyed cing thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1203E:217a-0: des na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi @217a * //
T02TD1203E:217a-3: ye shes skye ba'i rim pa'i mtshan ma'i rtags ni /
T02TD1203E:217a-7: chags pa chung ba la sogs pa las shes par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:217a-10: du ba las ni mer shes shing ;
T02TD1203E:217a-11: / chur skyar las ni chur shes so //
T02TD1203E:217a-12: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis //
T02TD1203E:217a-13: rigs ni mtshan ma rnams las shes //
T02TD1203E:217a-15: ye shes skye ba'i mtshan ma yang de bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:217a-16: yang na reg bya med par dga' ba la sogs pa sngar bzhin bskyed par bya ba yin no ;
T02TD1203E:217a-17: / thogs ni sngang [*sdang?] 'jigs byed pa yang //
T02TD1203E:217a-19: byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le rnams dang bco lnga po'i dga' ba la sogs pas reg par ma nus pa'i mchog gi thig le 'di zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1203E:217a-20: dpe ni 'jig rten pa'i grags pa bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:217a-21: de la ni 'pho ba'i don de la'o ;
T02TD1203E:217a-22: / nub bcu drug ni thim pa'i sgra yin te /
T02TD1203E:217a-23: de'i don gyis shar ba yang de bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:217a-24: shar dang nub pa ni rlung dang byang chub kyi sems phrad pas 'pho zhing /
T02TD1203E:217a-26: thim pa steng dang 'og tu 'gro ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1203E:217a-27: bco lnga pa dang bcu drug pa rten can dang mchog gi dga' ba ni mdud pa'i rim pas skye ba'i don to //
T02TD1203E:217a-28: rang bzhin dga' la de yon tan min ni rang bzhin dga' ba skye ba dang /
T02TD1203E:217a-32: yod pa dang med pa la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad dang bral ba shar ba dang nub pa yod pa ma yin no //
T02TD1203E:217a-33: yon po'i gdu bu'i rnam pa'i rtsa lte ba'i dbus su zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:217a-34: srog ma dang bcas pa'i mdud pa rnams kyi lte bar /
T02TD1203E:217a-35: lte ba'i gdu bu'i sgras rdo rje rin po che'i gnas su bzhi'i don 'dus pa'i dus so //
T02TD1203E:217a-36: dus kyi sgras thig le dang /
T02TD1203E:217a-37: dga' ba dang sogs pas steng gi rlung dang /
T02TD1203E:217a-39: rtsa rnams la ni dus gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1203E:217a-40: gcig pa ni chags pa dang /
T02TD1203E:217a-41: chags pa ma yin pa ro gcig pa'i dus so //
T02TD1203E:217a-42: de lta'i bde chen rnam pa ni //
T02TD1203E:217a-44: sngar bshad pa'i chu tshod dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:217a-45: 'pho ba zhes bya ba ni 'pho ba bcu drug dang /
T02TD1203E:217b-1: dbyu gu drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /
T02TD1203E:217b-3: skad cig ma bzhi po 'di kun gyi nang gi sbyor bas /
T02TD1203E:217b-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag gis bshad zin pa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:217b-6: dngos po rten dang ye shes dang //
T02TD1203E:217b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste ;
T02TD1203E:217b-8: dngos po rten dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:217b-9: dngos po'i sgras sbyor ba'i dngos po rnams so //
T02TD1203E:217b-10: rten gyi sgras ni byang chub sems kyi rten rtsa'i gnas rnams bsdu'o //
T02TD1203E:217b-11: ye shes kyi sgras dga' ba rnams rlung dang ldan pa bsdu'o //
T02TD1203E:217b-13: byang chub sems kyi thig le la sogs pa spyir 'byed pa rnams bstan pa yin zhes bya'o //
T02TD1203E:217b-14: de rang gi don dngos po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1203E:217b-15: dngos po ro mnyam sbyor ba yin //
T02TD1203E:217b-17: rnal 'byor pa'i dngos po ni las kyi phyag rgya dang thabs kyi bdag nyid gnyis dpal phyag rgya chen po dang ye shes thig les byin gyis brlas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:217b-18: de gnyis sbyor bas ro mnyam sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1203E:217b-19: des ni dga' ba la sogs pa'i stobs las skyes pa las gnyis su med pa'i 'bras bu bde ba chen po rnyed do //
T02TD1203E:217b-20: las kyi phyag rgya dang thabs dang /
T02TD1203E:217b-21: rtsa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dngos po'i chos thams cad kyis /
T02TD1203E:217b-22: ye shes spros pa dang bral ba la 'bras bu dang rgyur mi 'gyur la /
T02TD1203E:217b-23: de bzhin du dngos po'i lha la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:217b-25: yang na 'jig rten gyi lha chen po la sogs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1203E:217b-26: de bas na rnam par mi rtog pa nyid spros pa thams cad dang bral ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:217b-27: des 'bras bu yang dag pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba bde ba chen po rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1203E:217b-29: de kho na nyid kyi rgyud las /
T02TD1203E:217b-30: stong nyid bsgoms pas de nyid 'thob //
T02TD1203E:217b-31: spros bcas rnam par rtog pa yis //
T02TD1203E:217b-32: 'bras bu de bzhin ma yin te //
T02TD1203E:217b-33: rtog pas rtogs pa skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1203E:217b-36: rnam rtog gti mug chen po ste //
T02TD1203E:217b-37: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed yin //
T02TD1203E:217b-38: mi rtog ting 'dzin la gnas nas //
T02TD1203E:217b-39: mkha' bzhin dri ma med par 'gyur //
T02TD1203E:218a-2: rtog pa can bsgoms pas bya ba med de rnam par mi rtog pa bsgom mo zhes so //
T02TD1203E:218a-4: 'dir rtog pa yin na dngos po'i rtog pas 'bras bu de bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:218a-5: ji ltar 'o ma sprul gyi dug yin yang /
T02TD1203E:218a-6: mi la sogs ba'i de bzhin ma yin no //
T02TD1203E:218a-7: de bzhin 'dod chags la sogs pa yang bsam pa'i khyad par las /
T02TD1203E:218a-8: khyad par can gyi 'bras bur byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1203E:218a-10: rtog pa min pa'i don gsungs pa //
T02TD1203E:218a-11: chags pa'i 'dod chags rnam dag byed //
T02TD1203E:218a-12: ces bya ba la sogs pa las /
T02TD1203E:218a-13: chags pa ni rtog pa'i yul phyin ci log pa ste /
T02TD1203E:218a-14: bud med kyi dngos po dang /
T02TD1203E:218a-15: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa la lta zhing mthong ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:218a-21: chos la sogs pa'i rtog pa la zhen cing chags pa ni 'dod chags yin te /
T02TD1203E:218a-22: 'dod pas bdag gi dbang du byas nas mi gtong ba'o //
T02TD1203E:218a-23: rnam dag ces bya ba ni de 'dir dag par 'gyur te /
T02TD1203E:218a-24: tha mal pa'i spyod pa dngos po la zhen pa ma yin /
T02TD1203E:218a-25: lha dang lha mo'i bdag nyid sgyu ma'i dngos po bsgoms nas /
T02TD1203E:218a-26: thabs dang shes rab kyi spyod pa byas pas rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1203E:218a-28: 'dus pa reg bya byed pa yi //
T02TD1203E:218a-29: zhes bya ba la 'dus pa ni thabs dang shes rab reg bya ni rdo rje rin po che dang bcas pa padma bya gdong ma dang bcas pa /
T02TD1203E:218a-30: byed pa po'i dngos po zhes sbyar te /
T02TD1203E:218a-31: thabs dang shes rab la sogs pa'i dga' ba ni /
T02TD1203E:218a-32: tha mal pa dang mthun pa ma yin no //
T02TD1203E:218a-33: de bas na srid pa med par byed ces gsungs te /
T02TD1203E:218a-40: ji ltar dug gi dum bu yis //
T02TD1203E:218a-41: sems can kun ni 'chi bar byed //
T02TD1203E:218a-42: dug gi de nyid shes pa yis //
T02TD1203E:218a-43: dug gis dug ni 'joms par byed //
T02TD1203E:218a-44: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i dpe dang /
T02TD1203E:218a-45: de bzhin chos can rtogs pa ni //
T02TD1203E:218a-46: rtogs pa yis ni dag par byed //
T02TD1203E:218a-47: ji ltar 'dod chags mes tshig ni //
T02TD1203E:218b-0: @218b 'o dang khyud pa longs spyod rnams ni /
T02TD1203E:218b-1: sbyor thabs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa yin te /
T02TD1203E:218b-2: de bas 'dir yang 'o la sogs pa'i spyod pa longs spyod du gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:218b-3: de yang dga' ba skye ba'i rgyu 'khyud pa la sogs pa yin la /
T02TD1203E:218b-4: 'bras bu'i dus na ni longs spyod /
T02TD1203E:218b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyur 'gyur bas kyang longs spyod pa'o //
T02TD1203E:218b-6: dngos ni dngos por bar chod byed //
T02TD1203E:218b-8: 'khor ba'i dngos po'i chos rnams kun //
T02TD1203E:218b-9: thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spyod pas ye shes skyed de /
T02TD1203E:218b-10: phyin ci log gi spyod pa'i bar gcad par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:218b-11: rten gang yin snyam pa la /
T02TD1203E:218b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs ba'o //
T02TD1203E:218b-15: zla ba'i rnam pa can punda r'i ka'o //
T02TD1203E:218b-16: 'byung ba ni ku sha'i mtshan nyid /
T02TD1203E:218b-17: yis zhes bya ba ni rtsva la ku sha 'bab pa'i phyir na'o //
T02TD1203E:218b-18: zur gsum ni sngar bshad pa'o //
T02TD1203E:218b-20: drag po'i mig can la sogs rnams bsdu /
T02TD1203E:218b-21: rten gyi ni shuksha dga' ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnas byed pa'o //
T02TD1203E:218b-22: rtsa rnams kyi bsdus pa'i don dang bcas pa gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:218b-23: rten ni bsam gtan med pa ste //
T02TD1203E:218b-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:218b-25: rten ni 'dab ma gsum pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02TD1203E:218b-26: de ni bsam gtan gyi gnas so //
T02TD1203E:218b-27: med pa ni bsam gtan med pa ste /
T02TD1203E:218b-28: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la bsgom pa med pa'o //
T02TD1203E:218b-29: de las gzhan ma'i khyad par can zhig bsgom pa'i bsam gtan yang med do //
T02TD1203E:218b-30: chos dbyings rang gi ngo bo yin //
T02TD1203E:218b-31: steng dang 'og tu mnyam pa brten //
T02TD1203E:218b-33: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa bral ba'i mnyam pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang rig ngo bo yin la de mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir na /
T02TD1203E:218b-34: mya ngan 'das pa rtog pa med //
T02TD1203E:218b-35: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rtog pa med pas na /
T02TD1203E:218b-36: 'khor ba'i rtog pa yong mi skye /
T02TD1203E:218b-37: de la bsam gtan gzhan pa ga la yod de med do //
T02TD1203E:218b-39: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lung las kyang //
T02TD1203E:218b-40: rtag tu shar ba las gzhan ci //
T02TD1203E:218b-41: gang du yang ni sgom yod dam //
T02TD1203E:218b-42: gal te su zhig sgom byed de //
T02TD1203E:218b-43: khyad par can du skye mi 'gyur //
T02TD1203E:219a-1: chen po'i bdud rtsi ni nyan thos pa'i bde ba las mchog tu gyur pas bde ba chen po'i'o //
T02TD1203E:219a-2: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1203E:219a-3: zas ni bdud rtsi rten ni spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i chos kyi dbyings rten can la gsal pa'o //
T02TD1203E:219a-4: rigs lnga ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:219a-5: de'i mchog ni gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po /
T02TD1203E:219a-6: gnas zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pas byas so //
T02TD1203E:219a-7: de yi ye shes gsum pa ni //
T02TD1203E:219a-8: ye shes 'dod pa lhun gyis grub //
T02TD1203E:219a-9: ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1203E:219a-10: ye shes ni byang chub sems bde ba'i ye shes 'dod pa ni dga' ba bcu drug gi dang po'i dga' ba'o //
T02TD1203E:219a-11: lhun gyis grub pa ni de rnams grub pa'o //
T02TD1203E:219a-12: 'dar ba'i dga' ba mchog gi dga' ba ni /
T02TD1203E:219a-13: de rnams kyi gnyis pa ni 'dar ba'i dga' ba ste /
T02TD1203E:219a-14: dang po'i mchog ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1203E:219a-15: ye shes zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong ba'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i don 'di'o //
T02TD1203E:219a-16: lhun gyis grub pa ni bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis ye shes bskyed pas grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1203E:219a-17: gnas ni ye shes bco lnga ba'i bzhugs gnas bcas pa ni rten can gyi rang bzhin dga' ba dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:219a-18: chad pa'i dga' ba yi ni bco lnga pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:219a-19: gnas med pa ni rten dang rten can dang /
T02TD1203E:219a-21: 'pho ba la sogs pa'i dngos po dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1203E:219a-23: de kho na nyid ces bya ba dang /
T02TD1203E:219a-24: don dam pa'i bden pa dang /
T02TD1203E:219a-26: bde ba chen po la sogs pa rnam grangs so //
T02TD1203E:219a-27: gnyis su med pa'i mchog ni ye shes kyi nga rgyal tsam yang med de /
T02TD1203E:219a-28: ye shes nga rgyal med par byed //
T02TD1203E:219a-30: chos ni 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba'i phung po la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:219a-31: thams cad ni rdul phra rab kyis bsdus pa dang cig shos so //
T02TD1203E:219a-32: rnam par shes pa ni gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i don ye shes su blos 'jug cing shes pa'o //
T02TD1203E:219a-34: ye shes bya ba'i don grub byed //
T02TD1203E:219a-36: de ni sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:219a-37: ye shes la sogs pa bshad nas /
T02TD1203E:219b-0: zhes bya ba la @219b sogs pa gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:219b-1: byang chub sems kyi thig ler lhag par bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:219b-5: tshul ni tshul gyi thig le /
T02TD1203E:219b-6: sprin ni sprin gyi thig le /
T02TD1203E:219b-7: stobs ni stobs kyi thig le'o //
T02TD1203E:219b-8: de bzhin du gzhan rnams kyang bsdu'o //
T02TD1203E:219b-9: bdag nyid ni bde ba'i thig le bcu drug gi bdag nyid rnam par 'byed ba'o //
T02TD1203E:219b-13: rten med par byed pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1203E:219b-14: dngos po kun ni dga' ba dang /
T02TD1203E:219b-15: byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i thig le rnams so //
T02TD1203E:219b-16: rnam pa ni khyad par sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa mang po rnams so //
T02TD1203E:219b-17: gnas ni rtsa'i mdud pa'i gnas bsdu'o //
T02TD1203E:219b-18: bcas pa ni rtsa dang thig le la sogs par ldan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:219b-19: thim pa ni dngos po dngos po med par te /
T02TD1203E:219b-20: 'di ni chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1203E:219b-21: chos kyi sku'i lus 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa /
T02TD1203E:219b-22: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing /
T02TD1203E:219b-23: 'od gsal ba chos kyi rang bzhin te /
T02TD1203E:219b-25: de bzhin nyid du mdzad ba'o //
T02TD1203E:219b-26: chos kyi sku 'di ni gzugs kyi sku dang /
T02TD1203E:219b-30: skye dang gnas pa rdzu 'phrul gyi //
T02TD1203E:219b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1203E:219b-32: skye ba ni chu las nya bzhin du chos kyi sku las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02TD1203E:219b-33: gnas pa ni zhing yongs su dag pa na /
T02TD1203E:219b-34: mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa zla med pa'i che ba'i yon tan mang pos brgyan pa /
T02TD1203E:219b-35: 'ja' tshon lta bu'i sku mdzes pa /
T02TD1203E:219b-36: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spyod par 'os pas na /
T02TD1203E:219b-38: rtag par gdul bya'i don byed pas na /
T02TD1203E:219b-39: rgyun gyis rtag tu gnas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:219b-40: rdzu 'phrul gyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:219b-41: de las sprul pa'i sku sprul nas /
T02TD1203E:219b-42: re re zhing yang gdul bya'i dbang gis don mdzad par sprul pa'i sku bye ba mtha' yas pa de las kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:219b-44: rang gi rig pa de nyid ni //
T02TD1203E:219b-45: gzhan gyis brjod las mi 'byung ste //
T02TD1203E:219b-46: mos dang bsgoms pas rtog 'gyur gyi //
T02TD1203E:220a-4: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can //
T02TD1203E:220a-5: nyon mongs kun las rnam grol zhing //
T02TD1203E:220a-6: mtshan rnams kun gyi rang brgyan par //
T02TD1203E:220a-7: stong nyid ye shes las byung ba //
T02TD1203E:220a-8: spro zhing sdud par byed pa yi //
T02TD1203E:220a-9: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan zhing /
T02TD1203E:220a-10: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
T02TD1203E:220a-11: ye shes sgyu ma 'dra zhing rtag / ces gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:220a-13: sangs rgyas nyid las sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD1203E:220a-14: dpag med rigs su sprul ba ni //
T02TD1203E:220a-15: 'gro ba gdul bya'i bsam pa'i rgyud //
T02TD1203E:220a-16: de bzhin du yang sbrul [*sprul?] skus mdzad //
T02TD1203E:220a-18: der gsum po'i don bstan nas /
T02TD1203E:220a-19: de dag gi 'byed pa gsungs pa /
T02TD1203E:220a-22: gti mug gi sgras ni 'dod chags dang /
T02TD1203E:220a-26: 'khor lo ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1203E:220a-27: sngags ni de rnams kyi bzlas pa dang /
T02TD1203E:220a-29: bya ba ni phrin las rnams so //
T02TD1203E:220a-33: rtsa'i snying po ni 'dab ma gsum pa'i lte ba'i rtog med ma'o //
T02TD1203E:220a-34: thams cad ni zur gsum la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:220a-35: bcom pa ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings su bcom pa ste /
T02TD1203E:220a-36: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i sgra'o //
T02TD1203E:220a-38: mi mnga' ba dang ldan pa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:220a-40: mtshan ma'i dngos po las 'byed pa'o //
T02TD1203E:220a-41: ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
T02TD1203E:220a-42: snying po ni de rang mthar thug pa'i mchog go //
T02TD1203E:220a-43: mtha' ni chos nyid dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:220a-44: de nas ye shes kyang de nyid snying po yang de nyid /
T02TD1203E:220a-45: rnam par 'byed pa gsal bar byed //
T02TD1203E:220a-47: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes snang ba nyid gsal ba'i bdag nyid ces so //
T02TD1203E:220a-48: shin tu ni phul du byung ba'i ye shes so //
T02TD1203E:220a-49: bde ba ni yang dag pa'i mchog go //
T02TD1203E:220a-50: byed pa'i phyir ni rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes de kho na nyid kyis /
T02TD1203E:220a-51: phul du byung ba'i yang dag pa'i bde ba'i mchog byed ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1203E:220b-0: des na rnam par @220b 'byed pa'i de kho na nyid phyir brjod ces gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:220b-1: sku gsum mi phyed pa'i don gsungs pa /
T02TD1203E:220b-2: gnyis su med pa'i mchog zhi ba //
T02TD1203E:220b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:220b-4: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa ni gnyis te /
T02TD1203E:220b-5: de bzhin du gnyis pa thams cad bsdu ba ni gnyis su med pa'o //
T02TD1203E:220b-6: nyon mongs pa nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub las khyad par du gyur pas na mchog go //
T02TD1203E:220b-8: de kho na nyid don dam pa spros pa dang bral ba /
T02TD1203E:220b-9: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa kun zhi bas na zhi ba'o //
T02TD1203E:220b-12: chags bral ni nyan thos kyi stong pa phyogs gcig pa'o //
T02TD1203E:220b-13: 'di ni mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pas na /
T02TD1203E:220b-16: dri ma med pa ni glo bur ba'i dri ma ma rig pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1203E:220b-17: nam mkha' la sprin la sogs pa bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:220b-18: 'dus byas ma yin pas na bcos pa med pa'o //
T02TD1203E:220b-19: rgyud las mi skye ba'i rgyu dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1203E:220b-20: a'a li k'a li las ma skyes pa'i phyir sngags dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1203E:220b-21: bskyed rim rdzogs rim las mi skye ba'i phyir rim pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1203E:220b-22: rang rig pa dang brjod du med //
T02TD1203E:220b-23: thams cad khyab dang dbyer med pa ;
T02TD1203E:220b-25: brjod du med pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes spros pa dang bral ba chos thams cad la khyab na /
T02TD1203E:220b-26: yang na mthong ba ma yin pa /
T02TD1203E:220b-27: mtshan dang dpe byad med pa'i bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid ni /
T02TD1203E:220b-28: gzugs kyi sku dang bral ba rang gi rig pa'i ye shes brjod du med pa nyid do //
T02TD1203E:220b-29: de kho na nyid de yang mdo dang lung dang /
T02TD1203E:220b-30: 'grel pa la sogs pa'i nang nas gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:220b-32: yang na 'dir 'ga' tsam drang por bya ste /
T02TD1203E:220b-33: bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas //
T02TD1203E:220b-34: de ni gnyis med ye shes te //
T02TD1203E:220b-35: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa yin //
T02TD1203E:220b-36: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid //
T02TD1203E:220b-38: yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi mdo las mngon par 'du mi byed pa sgyu ma'i chos nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med par rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos la 'jug cing /
T02TD1203E:221a-1: thams cad gzod ma nas rnam par dag par mngon par dad pa dang /
T02TD1203E:221a-2: mos pa'i sems can de ngan song du 'gro zhes nga mi smra'o zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1203E:221a-3: yang nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las kyang 'brel bar bstan te /
T02TD1203E:221a-4: de nyid gang zhig 'dod pa la //
T02TD1203E:221a-5: de la de nyid dam pa med //
T02TD1203E:221a-6: sa dang pha rol phyin pa yis //
T02TD1203E:221a-7: tshe 'dir de nyid thob mi srid //
T02TD1203E:221a-9: gang zhig gis ni rtog rgyur na //
T02TD1203E:221a-10: de yis de nyid dam pa 'di //
T02TD1203E:221a-11: nges par de nyid myur du 'thob //
T02TD1203E:221a-13: yang bden pa gnyis su med pas ni rgyu dang 'bras bu dag kyang gnyis su med pa yin la //
T02TD1203E:221a-14: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pas thob pa dang thob par bya ba dag kyang gnyis su med pa yin la //
T02TD1203E:221a-15: de dag gnyis su med pas bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1203E:221a-16: bsgom par bya ba dag kyang gnyis su med pa ste /
T02TD1203E:221a-17: gnyis su med pa la ni /
T02TD1203E:221a-19: bsgrub par bya ba dmigs par mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:221a-20: de'i phyir bde ba chen po dang /
T02TD1203E:221a-24: rang rig ba'i ye shes dang /
T02TD1203E:221a-26: don dam pa'i bden pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams ni grangs so //
T02TD1203E:221a-28: de lta bu yi don dam par //
T02TD1203E:221a-29: lha yi dbang phyug rnam par 'byed //
T02TD1203E:221a-31: sdud pa po lha'i dbang phyug la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas /
T02TD1203E:221a-32: bde ba chen po gnyis su med par 'byed par gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:221a-33: sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun la ;
T02TD1203E:221a-34: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
T02TD1203E:221a-35: sangs rgyas ni dpag tu med pa'i gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyes kyis mtshon pa'o //
T02TD1203E:221a-36: byang chub sems dpa' kun la de bzhin du bshad pa'o //
T02TD1203E:221a-37: snyig gar rtag tu bzhugs pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i de snyed kyi thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes ni de nyid 'di yin no //
T02TD1203E:221a-39: gang ga'i klung gi bye snyed kyi //
T02TD1203E:221a-40: sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di dag nyid //
T02TD1203E:221a-41: thugs chud yod med phyogs spangs pas //
T02TD1203E:221a-42: phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid grub //
T02TD1203E:221b-0: 'di ni mkhyen zhes bya ba mi mnga' @221b ba'i don to //
T02TD1203E:221b-1: yang na sangs rgyas ni phung po rnams so //
T02TD1203E:221b-2: byang chub sems dpa' ni skye mched la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD1203E:221b-4: 'byung ba rnams lha mor bstan pa dang /
T02TD1203E:221b-5: de re re la yang dbye ba'o //
T02TD1203E:221b-6: snying gar rtag tu bzhugs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:221b-7: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin dga' ba skyed par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD1203E:221b-9: rnam par 'byed pa la bsgom pa med ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:221b-12: mchod pa la sogs pa spangs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:221b-13: phung po ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:221b-18: sogs pa ni skye mched bcu gnyis ni khams gzhan no //
T02TD1203E:221b-19: bral ba ni rnam par 'byed pa de nyid kyis de rnams kyi rtog pa med pa'o //
T02TD1203E:221b-20: sgra ni 'jig rten pa'i sgra'i dngos po'o //
T02TD1203E:221b-21: sogs pa ni de bzhin du tshad ma dang snyan dang gsal la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:221b-22: chos kyi stong pa ni nyid kyis de rnams stong pa'am dben pa'o //
T02TD1203E:221b-23: stong pa ni mi dmigs pa'i shes rab chen po'i stong pa nyid do //
T02TD1203E:221b-24: snying rje ni thabs thugs rje chen po'i dngos po kun rdzob sgyur ma tsam mo //
T02TD1203E:221b-25: bdag nyid yin zhes bya ba ni de nyid gnyis kyi bdag po ste /
T02TD1203E:221b-26: gnyis su med pa'i de kho na nyid dam pa'o //
T02TD1203E:221b-28: tshangs dang khyab 'jug drag po dang //
T02TD1203E:221b-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:221b-30: de kho na nyid 'di ni gdul bya'i dbang gis ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid tshangs pa la sogs pa yang bstan pa med long lta bu'i ye shes gsal la rtog pa med pa'i bdag nyid de nyid las byung bas tshangs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:221b-31: de nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du byung zhing sems can kun la khyab 'jug go //
T02TD1203E:221b-32: de nyid las so sor rtog pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis so sor rtogs pas na drag po'o //
T02TD1203E:221b-33: de nyid las chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis mnyam par dbang byed pas na dbang phyug //
T02TD1203E:221b-34: de nyid las bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi mtshan nyid rang bzhin du zhi ba ster bas na zhi ba'o //
T02TD1203E:222a-1: rigs lnga'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i tshangs pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:222a-2: de nyid las ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid du byung bas ni yab yin pa'o //
T02TD1203E:222a-4: dpal mchog dang po'i cho gar yang /
T02TD1203E:222a-5: tshangs dang drag po sogs bsgom pa //
T02TD1203E:222a-6: des 'dul ba la gsungs pa ni ;
T02TD1203E:222a-7: / de nyid la ni 'jug phyir yin //
T02TD1203E:222a-9: gzhan na re lus la gnas pa'i 'khor lo rnams de nyid las byung ba'i don to //
T02TD1203E:222a-10: de nyid las rlung gi 'khor lo des tshangs pa'i ye shes skyed pa'o //
T02TD1203E:222a-11: de nyid las me'i 'khor lo des ye shes la khyab pa'i drod de ni khyab 'jug go ;
T02TD1203E:222a-12: / de nyid las sprul pa'i 'khor lo de'i ye shes drag 'dzin ma las byung ba ni drag po'o //
T02TD1203E:222a-13: de nyid las bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo de'i ye shes gzhan ma'i ye shes la dbang byed pa ni dbang phyug go //
T02TD1203E:222a-14: de nyid las longs spyod kyi 'khor lo der ye shes kyi ros rtog pa'i ro drug zhi ba ni zhi ba'o //
T02TD1203E:222a-15: de nyid las de rnams byung ba ni pha rol gyi yin zer ro //
T02TD1203E:222a-16: 'byed pa de ni mchog rmad byung //
T02TD1203E:222a-18: de nyid 'jig rten gyi lha tshangs pa la sogs pa las mchog //
T02TD1203E:222a-19: de nyid ni de'i gong na gzhan med pas rmad du byung ba'o //
T02TD1203E:222a-20: de nyid ye shes thig le 'dir //
T02TD1203E:222a-22: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le de'i don ston pa'i skabs su ni //
T02TD1203E:222a-23: 'dir de kho na nyid 'di mchog go //
T02TD1203E:222a-24: mchog rnams ni mang po dag gi mchog gi ye shes so //
T02TD1203E:222a-25: grub pa ni de nyid mchog dam par rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:222a-26: mnga' bdag ni ye shes rnams kyi mchog gi mnga' bdag ste /
T02TD1203E:222a-27: de nyid grub pa yang yin la mnga' bdag kyang yin te bsdus pa'o //
T02TD1203E:222a-28: 'byung ba'i sgras sems can rnams so //
T02TD1203E:222a-30: de ni sems can thams cad bsdu'o //
T02TD1203E:222a-31: yang na 'byung ba ni sa la sogs pa'i 'byung ba'o //
T02TD1203E:222a-32: des brtan g-yo la khyab po ;
T02TD1203E:222a-33: / kun ni snod bcud gnyis so //
T02TD1203E:222a-34: nang yod ni des khyab pa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:222a-35: sku lnga zhes 'byung ba ni sngar bshad pa byas so //
T02TD1203E:222a-36: bdag nyid rab mchod yin zhes 'byung ba ni pha rol zhes pa'i tha tshigs go //
T02TD1203E:222a-37: mkha' 'gro dbang phyug lnga zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1203E:222b-0: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa @222b nam mkha' la 'gro ba'o //
T02TD1203E:222b-1: lnga ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro la sogs pa lnga'o //
T02TD1203E:222b-2: rnam par snang mdzad kyis gtso bo byas pa'i 'khor lha mo dang bcas pa ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'o //
T02TD1203E:222b-3: de bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang //
T02TD1203E:222b-7: rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:222b-8: bdag po ni de kho na nyid do //
T02TD1203E:222b-9: mkha' 'gro lnga zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1203E:222b-10: sngar gyi rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:222b-11: bdag nyid skyed med ni sngar bshad pa bzhin ni //
T02TD1203E:222b-12: nam mkha' lnga ni nang du thim //
T02TD1203E:222b-13: zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba lnga'i nang du thim pa'o //
T02TD1203E:222b-14: gzhan na re phung po lnga'i nang du thim zer ro //
T02TD1203E:222b-15: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byed pa //
T02TD1203E:222b-17: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ji snyed bzhugs pa'i phyag bya ba dang /
T02TD1203E:222b-19: phung po lnga la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1203E:222b-20: de la gzhan pa kun gyis kyang phyag bya ba'i gnas so zhes pa'o //
T02TD1203E:222b-21: de lta'i gsang chen ye shes ni //
T02TD1203E:222b-22: zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir na gsang ba chen po'i ye shes so //
T02TD1203E:222b-23: ye shes zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1203E:222b-24: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de kho na nyid do //
T02TD1203E:222b-25: dbang po zhes bya ba ni bdag po'i don to //
T02TD1203E:222b-26: de kho na nyid kyi ye shes 'di rnyed par dka' bas na rnyed par dka' ba'o //
T02TD1203E:222b-27: dpe ci dang mtshungs par rnyed par dka' snyam pa la //
T02TD1203E:222b-29: ji ltar nor kun mi rnyed bzhin //
T02TD1203E:222b-31: ji ltar nor bu rin po che shin tu dkon pa'i phra mo mun pa'i nang na gnas pa de //
T02TD1203E:222b-32: mar me'i thabs kyis ma brtsal bar du mi rnyed pa bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:222b-33: 'bad pa yis ni sba bar bya //
T02TD1203E:222b-35: nor bu rin po che rnyed na za ma tog la sogs par sped pa bzhin du //
T02TD1203E:222b-36: 'dir yang shin tu wa ba ste /
T02TD1203E:222b-37: snod dang mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sbyin par ma gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:222b-38: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u dang po'i bshad /
T02TD1203E:223a-0: // / dang por bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang phyug la de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa de'i don gsal @223a * //
T02TD1203E:223a-2: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol ba zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi 'dir zhugs pa ste /
T02TD1203E:223a-3: kye bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1203E:223a-4: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa kun bcom pa mchog gi ye shes dang ldan pa ste bcom ldan no //
T02TD1203E:223a-5: de nyid gsum bdag rang ngo ci //
T02TD1203E:223a-6: zhes 'byung ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad gcig gis sngar gyi don zhus pa'o //
T02TD1203E:223a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:223a-10: gang gi don du bka' stsal zhe na //
T02TD1203E:223a-11: gdul bar bya ba'i sems can rnams kyi don du ;
T02TD1203E:223a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bka' stsal zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD1203E:223a-13: de nyid gsum ni sku gsung thugs //
T02TD1203E:223a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:223a-15: de nyid gsum gyi rgyu ni lus dang ngag dang sems so //
T02TD1203E:223a-16: de dag rnam par dag pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs su 'gyur te /
T02TD1203E:223a-17: 'dir sems can gyi gnas skabs su ni rgyu can yin la /
T02TD1203E:223a-18: sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'gyur ba sngar bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:223a-19: lus la sogs pa sems kyi rang bzhin dang 'bral ba'am /
T02TD1203E:223a-20: yang sngar gyi bzhin pas na rdo rje gsum zhes kyang bya'o //
T02TD1203E:223a-21: zla ba bde ba mchog ni gang //
T02TD1203E:223a-25: 'di las ri bong can skye ba'o //
T02TD1203E:223a-26: phung po ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa lnga'o //
T02TD1203E:223a-27: dbang po ni mig gi dbang po la sogs pa drug go //
T02TD1203E:223a-28: de'i bdag nyid skyed mched dang khams bco brgyad do //
T02TD1203E:223a-31: phyag rgya chen po zhes 'byung ba ni //
T02TD1203E:223a-32: lus kyi dngos po rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:223a-33: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni sems yin te //
T02TD1203E:223a-34: de'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sems lus la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:223a-35: snying po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:223a-36: shuksha'i don to de'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams kyi grub mtha'o //
T02TD1203E:223a-37: bha gar bshad ces bya ba ni //
T02TD1203E:223a-38: sems can bha ga las 'byung ba'o //
T02TD1203E:223a-39: yang na bha ga'i sgras bcom ldan 'das so //
T02TD1203E:223a-40: 'di ni gcig la gcig rgyu dang 'bras bu'o //
T02TD1203E:223b-0: mtha' dang snang ba rnam par @223b shes ;
T02TD1203E:223b-1: / zhes bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD1203E:223b-2: chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //
T02TD1203E:223b-4: chu zla'i dpes ni kun rdzob sgyur ma'i dngos por snang ba'o //
T02TD1203E:223b-5: snang ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:223b-6: sems can gyi dngos po snang ba'o //
T02TD1203E:223b-7: las zhes bya ba ni lnga pa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:223b-8: thams cad 'byung zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i chos thams cad rgyu las 'byung ba'o //
T02TD1203E:223b-11: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa med //
T02TD1203E:223b-13: de yis rgyu'i dpal ye shes thig le bstan to //
T02TD1203E:223b-14: ci'i phyir zhe na rgyu ni rigs dang ldan pa'i phyir na sems can rnams so ;
T02TD1203E:223b-16: sa stengs skal min yod min pas //
T02TD1203E:223b-17: thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD1203E:223b-18: de bas rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni //
T02TD1203E:223b-19: bsgrub las sgyid lug mi bya'o //
T02TD1203E:223b-21: rgyu'i ye shes thig le'i stobs las /
T02TD1203E:223b-22: thabs kyi ye shes thig le yun ring po yang nas yang goms pa'i stobs kyis ni //
T02TD1203E:223b-23: 'bras bu dpal ye shes thig le thob par 'gyur te /
T02TD1203E:223b-24: de ni rgyu'i ye shes thig le'o //
T02TD1203E:223b-25: thabs gang yin snyam pa la /
T02TD1203E:223b-26: thabs kyis bsdus pa 'dir lung gis bshad pa //
T02TD1203E:223b-27: rdo rje gsungs mchog chen po ni /
T02TD1203E:223b-28: rdo rje gsum gyi mnga' bdag mchog /
T02TD1203E:223b-29: rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa'i phyir //
T02TD1203E:223b-30: rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs //
T02TD1203E:223b-31: mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni //
T02TD1203E:223b-32: sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu grags //
T02TD1203E:223b-33: rdo rje skye mched nyid dag kyang //
T02TD1203E:223b-34: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog / sa chu spyan ni m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1203E:223b-35: dkar mo sgrol ma me rlung grags //
T02TD1203E:223b-36: mkha' dbyings rdo rje dam tshig ni //
T02TD1203E:223b-37: rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid yin //
T02TD1203E:223b-39: rgyud kyi rim pas lha mo dang gnas kyi dgongs pa yang zhal las shes par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:223b-41: phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes ni //
T02TD1203E:223b-42: drug pa rnam dag gnyis su med //
T02TD1203E:223b-43: snying po spros pa dang bcas pa //
T02TD1203E:223b-44: spros med bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
T02TD1203E:223b-45: kun rdzob dngos por snang ba kun //
T02TD1203E:223b-46: thams cad chu yi zla bzhin mthong //
T02TD1203E:223b-47: dri ma med pa'i don dam pa //
T02TD1203E:223b-48: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa med //
T02TD1203E:224a-0: yang de nyid gsum ni sku dang gsung dang thugs @224a * //
T02TD1203E:224a-2: de kho na nyid gsum so //
T02TD1203E:224a-3: ye shes kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pas na rdo rje gsum mo //
T02TD1203E:224a-5: zla ba bde mchog gi don gyi phung po la sogs ba'i bde ba chen po'o //
T02TD1203E:224a-6: phyag rgya chen po ni nyid la nyid sgras bshad par dgongs te /
T02TD1203E:224a-7: sku gsum gyi bdag nyid pas na rdo rje'o //
T02TD1203E:224a-8: chos thams cad kyi snying po yin pa'i phyir rdo rje snying po'o //
T02TD1203E:224a-9: de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin yin pas /
T02TD1203E:224a-10: de yi mtha' ni bha gar bstan //
T02TD1203E:224a-11: zhes de rang la mthar bshad pa'o //
T02TD1203E:224a-12: mtha' dang zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD1203E:224a-13: sku'i 'khor lo la sogs par yang bstan to //
T02TD1203E:224a-14: de yis ni thabs kyi dpal ye shes thig le'i bsdus pa'i don bstan to //
T02TD1203E:224a-15: 'bras bu'i dpal ye shes thig le gang yin snyam pa'am //
T02TD1203E:224a-19: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes mchog / ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni //
T02TD1203E:224a-20: bcom ldan 'das nyid du gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:224a-21: 'di ni ye shes kyi mchog de nyid can no //
T02TD1203E:224a-22: zla ba bde ba mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:224a-23: nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba las grol ba'i phyir na zla ba'o //
T02TD1203E:224a-24: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le nyid bde ba'i mchog go //
T02TD1203E:224a-25: phung po zhes bya ba ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no /
T02TD1203E:224a-26: dbang po khams zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1203E:224a-28: khams rnams byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lo rnams so //
T02TD1203E:224a-29: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni brjod du med pa /
T02TD1203E:224a-32: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i gnyis su med pa'i de nyid mi shigs pas /
T02TD1203E:224a-33: rdo rje rdo rje dang 'dra ste dbyer med pa'o //
T02TD1203E:224a-34: snying po zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan ye shes thig le mchog gi gzugs 'dzin pa /
T02TD1203E:224a-35: 'phags pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams dang lhan cig par bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:224a-36: gang du bzhugs she na de'i bzhugs pa gsungs pa /
T02TD1203E:224a-37: de yi mtha' ni bha gar bshad //
T02TD1203E:224a-39: 'khor rnam ldan 'das dbus na 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa'i sgras bshad do //
T02TD1203E:224b-0: bha gar zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'byung gnas @224b dkar po gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa'i gnas ni bzhugs ba'o //
T02TD1203E:224b-3: mtha' ni chos 'byung dang bcas ba'i gnas so //
T02TD1203E:224b-5: rnam par shes pa ni gsal la ma 'dres bar de rnams shes pa'o //
T02TD1203E:224b-6: chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //
T02TD1203E:224b-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mngon sum du gzugs brnan mthong bzhin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi byin yi rlabs dang /
T02TD1203E:224b-9: bsgoms pa'i stobs la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1203E:224b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje dang /
T02TD1203E:224b-11: smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mthong ba'o //
T02TD1203E:224b-12: chos kun zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:224b-13: 'khor ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams so //
T02TD1203E:224b-14: rang bzhin dri ma med pa ni /
T02TD1203E:224b-15: bcom ldan 'das nyid la 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'o //
T02TD1203E:224b-16: yang dag 'od las thams cad byung //
T02TD1203E:224b-18: dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs la sogs pa dang 'khor ba'i chos thams cad yang dag pa'i 'dor bde kho na nyid las byung ba'o //
T02TD1203E:224b-19: des ni 'bras bu'i dpal ye shes thig le bstan to //
T02TD1203E:224b-20: de rnams kyi don ni 'di nyid kyi 'og nas nges par bstan to //
T02TD1203E:224b-21: de bzhin du rgyud dang de mtshungs so //
T02TD1203E:224b-22: dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud la sogs pa gsum du dbye'o //
T02TD1203E:224b-23: de rnams ni chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid do //
T02TD1203E:224b-25: de'i phyir chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:224b-27: thabs kyi yan lag gi dpal ye shes thig le bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:224b-28: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:224b-29: de la zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:224b-33: dang po zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi dang po'i don yin no //
T02TD1203E:224b-34: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bskyed pa'i sgom pa dang zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1203E:224b-35: bskyed pa'i rim pa pho brang dang /
T02TD1203E:224b-36: lha mo bcu drug dang bcas pa ji ltar ba bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:224b-38: so so rang rang lha rnams kyi la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:224b-39: bzlas pa zhes bya ba ni yab yum dang khro bo rnams dang /
T02TD1203E:225a-1: la sogs pa'i yang shes par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:225a-2: sbyin sreg ni zhi ba la sogs pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:225a-3: mchod sbyin zhes bya ba ni gnyis te /
T02TD1203E:225a-5: 'dir chos kyi mchod sbyin gtsor byas te /
T02TD1203E:225a-6: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas su mchod sbyin bya'o //
T02TD1203E:225a-7: gtor zhes bya ba ni gtor ma chen po tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:225a-8: mchod pa zhes bya ba ni me tshogs la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i mchod pa'o //
T02TD1203E:225a-9: gnas kyi brjod pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:225a-10: gzhal yas khang dang bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dang /
T02TD1203E:225a-12: shing dang dpa' bo la sogs pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:225a-16: zhes rab ye shes kyi dbang dang bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1203E:225a-17: bskur ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:225a-18: slob dpon dang ldan pas de dag dang ldan pa'i dam tshig dang/ man ngag tu bcas pa'i gnas skabs kyis slob ma'i mtshan nyid dang sbyar la bskur ba'o //
T02TD1203E:225a-19: rim pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:225a-20: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD1203E:225a-21: dbang bskur ba'i mtha' man chad bkod pa ste /
T02TD1203E:225a-22: de dag bshad ces gsungs par sbyar ro //
T02TD1203E:225a-23: de ni mdor bsdus pa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:225a-24: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel //
T02TD1203E:225a-25: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1203E:225a-27: // / rtsa'i mtshan nyid nges par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir zhus pa /
T02TD1203E:225a-28: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:225a-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:225a-31: rtsa'i don gsungs pa 'di yin te /
T02TD1203E:225a-32: gcig pu zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:225a-33: dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:225a-34: rtog med ma zhes bya ba ni rtog pa 'joms pa ste /
T02TD1203E:225a-35: gcig pu yang yin la rtog med ma yang yin la /
T02TD1203E:225a-37: so sho mna' yang de nyid do //
T02TD1203E:225a-39: bye brag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi rtsa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:225a-40: grangs kyi bdag nyid mtshon pa tsam yin gyis /
T02TD1203E:225a-41: rigs dang rigs can ni stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02TD1203E:225a-42: phra mo ni rtog pa dang ldan pa'i yul ma yin pa'o //
T02TD1203E:225a-43: dra ba ni sgyu ma'i dngos po'o //
T02TD1203E:225a-44: rol mo ni sprul pa'i lus dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:225b-0: don @225b ni ye shes bskyed par bya ba'i don du byas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:225b-1: sna tshogs ni mchi ma dang /
T02TD1203E:225b-3: glad pa la sogs pa de rnams kyi don ni bdud rtsi byang chub kyi sems so //
T02TD1203E:225b-4: bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni /
T02TD1203E:225b-5: bgrang ba la 'das pa'i don yin no //
T02TD1203E:225b-6: 'byung ba ni shuksha'i ngo bo byang chub sems kyi snying po can no ;
