T02TD1203E:225b-7: / skye ba'i don ni sprul ba'i lus dang /
T02TD1203E:225b-8: cig shos kyi bdag nyid do //
T02TD1203E:225b-9: chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:225b-10: 'khor ba dang mya ngang las 'das pa'i chos rnams 'byung bas na chos 'byung ngo //
T02TD1203E:225b-11: de nyid shes rab kyi bha ga'o //
T02TD1203E:225b-12: rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i de kho na nyid rnyed par 'gyur bas na chen po'i don yin no //
T02TD1203E:225b-13: byang chub kyi sems kyi gnas kyi gtso bo ni /
T02TD1203E:225b-14: sa steng der byang chub kyi sems rtsal las mar bzhin du 'gyur zhing 'bab par byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1203E:225b-15: lha'i dbang phyug ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:225b-16: lha rnams la dbang byed pa de yis dbang phyug gi bdag nyid do //
T02TD1203E:225b-17: gsol pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:225b-19: de ltar yin yang zhes bya ba la //
T02TD1203E:225b-20: rtog med ma ni kun gyi bdag nyid yin yang zhes bya ba'i sgro'o //
T02TD1203E:225b-21: de lta mod kyi sum cu rtsa gcig la mtshan dang grangs zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:225b-22: thams cad kyi grangs nyid rtog med ma yin yang /
T02TD1203E:225b-23: lhag ma sum cu rtsa gcig gi ming re re nas grangs zhu 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02TD1203E:225b-24: de rnams kyi ming dang grangs bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni //
T02TD1203E:225b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
T02TD1203E:225b-26: sum cu rtsa gcig gi rtsa'i ming nyon cig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:225b-27: ci'i phyir kun gyi bdag nyid yin zhen //
T02TD1203E:225b-28: rtog med ma de nyid byis pa rnams kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
T02TD1203E:225b-29: de nyid gting dpag ba'i phyir zab pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:225b-32: zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su tshigs rgyas pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD1203E:225b-33: zla ba'i sgras chad pa'i dga' ba nyi ma sgras mchog gi dga' ba'o //
T02TD1203E:225b-35: mchog dang chad pa'i dga' ba la rang bzhin dga' bas khyab pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1203E:225b-37: srog dang nye ba'i srog dang ba'o //
T02TD1203E:226a-1: pa ni rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis steng 'og tu 'pho ba'i bdag nyid gsum gyi lte bar mchog gi don gyis so //
T02TD1203E:226a-2: gzhan na re zla ba ni shu ksha'o //
T02TD1203E:226a-4: gzas zin pa ni me'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:226a-5: dus ni mnyam pa'i dus su ste /
T02TD1203E:226a-7: tshigs rgyas pa ni rdo rje mthe'u chung bya gdong dang bcas pas de nyid rnyed zer ro //
T02TD1203E:226a-8: de'i 'og tu dbang gi yan lag ston pa la ni /
T02TD1203E:226a-9: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:226a-10: de nas dbang gi rim pas bshad /
T02TD1203E:226a-12: lus la sogs pa'i dri ma ni bum pa dang /
T02TD1203E:226a-15: bzhi pa'i dbang gis dag par byed pa'o /
T02TD1203E:226a-16: de'i rim pa ni cho ga'i khyad par ro //
T02TD1203E:226a-17: bshad pa ni dam bcas pa'i tshig go //
T02TD1203E:226a-18: ji lta ba zhes bya ba ni le'u gnyis par bsdus pa'i don bzhin 'di nas mar thabs kyi bdag nyid rgyas par bshad de /
T02TD1203E:226a-19: go rims zhes bya ba ni dbang la sogs pa'i rim pa bzhin no /
T02TD1203E:226a-20: dbang bskur bas ci pan snyam pa la /
T02TD1203E:226a-21: de'i don tshigs bcad phyed kyis gsungs pa //
T02TD1203E:226a-22: dbang bskur mchog ni rnyed pa gang //
T02TD1203E:226a-26: bla ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pas slob ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la bum pa la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD1203E:226a-27: mchog ni gya nom pa ste /
T02TD1203E:226a-28: gsang ba'i dbang la sogs pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:226a-30: de'i don rnyed pa'i sems can su yang rung ste spyi sgra'o //
T02TD1203E:226a-33: thun mong gi dngos grub pa dang /
T02TD1203E:226a-34: mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa de'i yon tan dang /
T02TD1203E:226a-35: bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1203E:226a-36: slob ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la dbang bskur ba tshigs bcad byed phyed dang gnyis kyis gsungs pa ;
T02TD1203E:226a-37: yon tan tshul khrims ldan pa'i bu //
T02TD1203E:226a-38: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtog pa can ma yin pa'i rgyud dag nas gsungs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa /
T02TD1203E:226a-39: srung ba la sogs pa'i yon tan tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i slob ma de la /
T02TD1203E:226a-40: khrus la sogs pa'i tshogs rdzogs par byas la /
T02TD1203E:226b-1: yon dga' ba'i yid kyis dbul bar bya ba ni //
T02TD1203E:226b-2: 'og nas 'byung ba'i gus pas bla ma la mchod par bya /
T02TD1203E:226b-3: rin chen sna tshogs du ma mchog ni gzor //
T02TD1203E:226b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin du //
T02TD1203E:226b-5: 'dzin chags med pa'i yid kyis phul la dbang blang zhing bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD1203E:226b-6: mchog gi dngos grub grub pas ni //
T02TD1203E:226b-7: thun mong gi bsgrub mi dgos pa'i phyir //
T02TD1203E:226b-8: de'i don tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis gsungs pa /
T02TD1203E:226b-9: dbang bskur las ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs dang bcas pa'i dbang blang dgos pas /
T02TD1203E:226b-10: dbang bskur bzhi ru dbye ba ni //
T02TD1203E:226b-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa spyi'i dbye ba'o //
T02TD1203E:226b-12: bzhi gnyis rab tu dbye ba ni //
T02TD1203E:226b-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02TD1203E:226b-14: rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang gi grangs ming bstan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:226b-16: dbang bskur de ni rin po che /
T02TD1203E:226b-18: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yod pa gang yin pa de la phul ba dang bral ba bzhin du /
T02TD1203E:226b-19: 'dir nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i sgrib pa spong ba'i gnas ni dbang bskur bas so //
T02TD1203E:226b-21: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams so //
T02TD1203E:226b-22: de rnams kyi mchod pa dang /
T02TD1203E:226b-23: phyag bya ba'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1203E:226b-24: 'bras bu'i khyad par can yod pas na /
T02TD1203E:226b-25: nyan thos la sogs pas kyang zhes bya'o //
T02TD1203E:226b-26: thar par zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1203E:226b-27: chu dang dbu rgyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
T02TD1203E:226b-28: chu rnam par dag pa mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1203E:226b-29: de bzhin du dbur rgyan la sogs pa yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1203E:226b-30: rnal 'byor rgyud la mos rnams la //
T02TD1203E:226b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
T02TD1203E:226b-33: snying rje dbyer med pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02TD1203E:226b-34: rgyud ni de nyid 'dus pa la sog pa'i rgyud do //
T02TD1203E:226b-35: mos pa ni der dga' ba'o //
T02TD1203E:226b-36: sems can rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du mos pa rnams so //
T02TD1203E:226b-37: 'di'i gzhung gis slob dpon gyi dbang brgyad rnams gsungs te //
T02TD1203E:226b-38: dam tshigs gsum ma gtogs pa sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1203E:226b-39: de rang gi rgyud kyi ni de lta ma yin no //
T02TD1203E:226b-40: rnal 'byor bla mar mos rnams la //
T02TD1203E:227a-0: @227a * // rdo rje bdud rtsi la sogs par mos pa'i gang zag rnams la'o //
T02TD1203E:227a-1: bcu gcig ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'o /
T02TD1203E:227a-2: bdag nyid ni gsang ba'i dbang dang bcas pa ste /
T02TD1203E:227a-3: spyi par bya zhes bya ba de rnams dang bcas pa slob ma de dga' ba'i don du'o //
T02TD1203E:227a-4: rnal 'byor ma la mos pa rnams //
T02TD1203E:227a-6: shes rab kyi rgyud rigs chen rgya mtsho dang /
T02TD1203E:227a-7: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa la sogs pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams la ni /
T02TD1203E:227a-8: gsang ba'i dbang gi bdag nyid sbyin //
T02TD1203E:227a-10: chu la sogs pa bcu gcig dang /
T02TD1203E:227a-12: bdag nyid kyi sgras shes rab ye shes dang bcas pa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:227a-13: de yang chu'i dbang bskur bas dga' ba'i 'bras bu'o /
T02TD1203E:227a-14: dbu rgyan dang 'bras bu la sogs pa yang de bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:227a-15: gsang ba gnyis su dbye bar bshad //
T02TD1203E:227a-16: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla ba snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:227a-17: shes rab gnyis su dbye bar bya ba ni gsang ba'i phyag rgyas dang shes rab ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1203E:227a-18: bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i bye brag go //
T02TD1203E:227a-19: zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i phyag rgyas ye shes skyed par byed pa ste bskyed pa'o //
T02TD1203E:227a-20: shes rab ye shes kyi phyag rgyas ye shes rang la rdzogs par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do ;
T02TD1203E:227a-21: / bye brag ni ye shes kyi bye brag rnams so //
T02TD1203E:227a-23: shes rab gnyis su med par bya //
T02TD1203E:227a-25: gsang ba'i shes rab ma byed par mi bya ba /
T02TD1203E:227a-26: shes rab ye shes rang la gnyis te /
T02TD1203E:227a-27: rnam pa dang bcas pa dang rnam pa me dpa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1203E:227a-28: bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i bye brag go //
T02TD1203E:227a-30: phyi'i reg bya'i rnam pa dang bcas pa ni bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02TD1203E:227a-31: nang gi reg bya dang bcas pa ni //
T02TD1203E:227a-32: rnam pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1203E:227a-33: phyi'i rnam pa dang bcas pa ni mtshan nyid gsungs pa //
T02TD1203E:227a-34: shes rab brgyad gnyis lo ldan ma //
T02TD1203E:227a-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa'o /
T02TD1203E:227a-36: dbang gi man ngang gsum du byed //
T02TD1203E:227a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:227a-40: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo //
T02TD1203E:227a-41: man ngag gsum du dbye ba ni /
T02TD1203E:227b-0: 'bras bu dga' ba rnams dang @227b bcas pa yin te /
T02TD1203E:227b-2: nang gi de yi brda byed pa //
T02TD1203E:227b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1203E:227b-4: nang gi 'di ni spyi bo'o gnas dang /
T02TD1203E:227b-5: mgrin pa dang snying gar ro //
T02TD1203E:227b-6: brda byed pa ni lte ba gsang gnas dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:227b-7: 'byed pa ni dga' pa rnams so //
T02TD1203E:227b-8: bzhi pas 'bras bu'i ngo bor grags //
T02TD1203E:227b-10: dga' ba gsum pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i ngo bo'o //
T02TD1203E:227b-11: gsum dang bral ba ni gnas gsum dang bral ba'i dga' ba'o //
T02TD1203E:227b-12: gsum bdag nyid ni dga' ba dang /
T02TD1203E:227b-14: chad pa'i dga' ba'i bdag nyid ni rang bzhin dga' ba ste //
T02TD1203E:227b-15: de dag gi rtog pa'i dngos po spangs pas dga' ba la dbang byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1203E:227b-16: dga' ba la sogs bye brag tu //
T02TD1203E:227b-18: 'khor lo'i rim pa nas rdo rje rin po che'i bar gyi dga' ba rnams so /
T02TD1203E:227b-19: de rnyed pa'i gnas gsungs pa //
T02TD1203E:227b-20: rdo rje gzhon nu mas gsal byed //
T02TD1203E:227b-23: thabs kyi phyag rgya gnyis kyi rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang //
T02TD1203E:227b-24: rdo rje rin po che dang ldan pa'i lo bcu drug lon pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid sngar bzhin bstan pa las rnyed ces 'brel lo //
T02TD1203E:227b-26: las dang po pa rnams kyi dga' ba de las rnyed pa'i phyir na /
T02TD1203E:227b-28: de skad du gsang ba grub pa las kyang /
T02TD1203E:227b-29: las kyi phyag rgya bral gang des //
T02TD1203E:227b-30: gzhan du mtshon che rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02TD1203E:227b-31: gzhan du yang dag rigs pa med //
T02TD1203E:227b-32: dang po'i las can rig byed med //
T02TD1203E:227b-34: / yang de'i yon tan bshad pa /
T02TD1203E:227b-35: dbang bskur gyis ni 'khor los sgyur //
T02TD1203E:227b-37: sems can gyi mtshan nyid ye shes spros pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba ni /
T02TD1203E:227b-38: 'khor los sgyur ba yin te thams cad sems su snang ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:227b-40: sems las ma gtogs pa'i dngos po logs na med la /
T02TD1203E:227b-41: de snang ba med pa'i de kho na nyid du bsgrub ba ni //
T02TD1203E:227b-42: glo bur gyi dri ma dag pa'o //
T02TD1203E:227b-44: sems tsam la ni gnas su //
T02TD1203E:227b-45: phyi rol don la mi brtag go /
T02TD1203E:227b-46: de bzhin nyid la gnas nas su //
T02TD1203E:228a-0: @228a * // sems tsam las ni bzla bar bya //
T02TD1203E:228a-1: sems tsam las ni bzlas nas kyang //
T02TD1203E:228a-2: sang ba med las bzla bar bya'o /
T02TD1203E:228a-3: snang med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD1203E:228a-4: de yis theg pa che po mthong //
T02TD1203E:228a-6: the tshom ni yid gnyis za ba'o /
T02TD1203E:228a-7: med pa ni de dang bral ba'i bsam pa'o //
T02TD1203E:228a-8: dri ma ni goo bur ba'i dir ma ste /
T02TD1203E:228a-9: ma rig pa la sog pa'i bdag dang /
T02TD1203E:228a-11: dbang bskur bas de rnams med pa ni dri ma med pa yin te /
T02TD1203E:228a-12: rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang bskur bas lus kyi dri ma dag par 'gyur ro /
T02TD1203E:228a-13: gsang bas ngag gi dbang ngo //
T02TD1203E:228a-14: shes rab ye shes kyis sems kyis kyi'o //
T02TD1203E:228a-16: ji ltar chu la sogs pas ras //
T02TD1203E:228a-18: dper na ras kyi dri ma chu dang 'dag chal dang ldan pas bkrus pa yin na /
T02TD1203E:228a-20: yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa'i dbang zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1203E:228a-25: rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang dang /
T02TD1203E:228a-27: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang dang //
T02TD1203E:228a-28: bzhi ba'i dbang gi mthar thug pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1203E:228a-29: yan lag de nyid dang ni bcas ;
T02TD1203E:228a-31: slob dpon rgyun ma chad pa dbang gi rim pa gzhung bzhin du thob pa'i bla ma'o //
T02TD1203E:228a-32: gcig gnas gcig gi rim pas 'byung //
T02TD1203E:228a-34: bcom ldan 'das nas dbang bskur ba'i don rim par 'chad pa ni bla ma'i mchog tu gsungs te /
T02TD1203E:228a-35: bla ma rab kyi zhal nas blang //
T02TD1203E:228a-37: de ni dbang dang bcas pa'i bla ma rab bo //
T02TD1203E:228a-38: bla ma rab ma yi pa dang /
T02TD1203E:228a-39: slob ma yon tan dang mi ldan pa'i don ni 'di yin te //
T02TD1203E:228a-40: ngag gi cad ra ba la sog pas bstan to //
T02TD1203E:228a-41: dbang gi mchog ni rnam pa gsum //
T02TD1203E:228a-44: shes rab ye shes kyi dang //
T02TD1203E:228a-45: bzhi ba'i dang de dag gsum ni /
T02TD1203E:228a-46: rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang las mchog go //
T02TD1203E:228a-47: blang bya ma yin zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1203E:228a-48: bla ma de lta bu la slob ma yon tan dang mi ldan pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis mi blang //
T02TD1203E:228a-49: dbang mi nod ces ba'i don to /
T02TD1203E:228b-0: sbyin mi bya @228b zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:228b-1: slob ma de lta bu'i mtshan nyid ngan pa de la /
T02TD1203E:228b-2: bla ma rab kyi dbang gi mchog rnam pa gsum po sbyin par ma gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:228b-4: de dang ldan na dngos grub mchog mi rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1203E:228b-7: de ni ring du spang bar bya ;
T02TD1203E:228b-9: sgra dang tshad mas mi 'grub pa'i dpe ni /
T02TD1203E:228b-10: de ltar yang bye ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
T02TD1203E:228b-11: de bzhin tshad ma mang po dang //
T02TD1203E:228b-12: ngag gi dra ba dang ldan pa /
T02TD1203E:228b-14: bye ma las mar btsir ba la sogs pa byas /
T02TD1203E:228b-15: yang mar gyi rgyu sa bon ma yin pas 'byung bar mi 'gyur pa'i dpe de bzhin du tshad ma'i rtog pa la zhes bya ba rnams dang //
T02TD1203E:228b-16: 'jig rten pa'i sgra bdag dang bdag gi ngag dang /
T02TD1203E:228b-17: ngag gi dra ba 'brel ba ste /
T02TD1203E:228b-18: de'i don ni sems kyi rang bzhin ma shes pas rtag chad du gol pas /
T02TD1203E:228b-19: la la ni lus mi rtag pa yin yang shes pa rtag pas na dbang phyug byed pa por 'dod /
T02TD1203E:228b-20: la la ni skye rga na 'chi ni bdag go bar 'dod pa'o /
T02TD1203E:228b-21: la la ni srog chag kun 'goms pas dus yin no bar 'dod do /
T02TD1203E:228b-22: la la ni shi ba'i lus rdul du brlag la /
T02TD1203E:228b-25: de bzhin du 'dir rtag chad gnyis su bsdu'o //
T02TD1203E:228b-26: de lta bu'i slob dpon gyis /
T02TD1203E:228b-27: bstan pa'am zhe bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:228b-29: nyan pa ni slob ma ste 'bras bu mi rnyed pa'i phyir //
T02TD1203E:228b-31: de bas na de la nyon mongs pa las //
T02TD1203E:228b-32: gzhan 'bras bu tsam rnyed pa me do zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:228b-33: de'i phyir bla ma rab btsal bar bya ba'i don to /
T02TD1203E:228b-34: kun 'goms pas dus yin no bar 'dod do /
T02TD1203E:228b-35: la la ni shi ba'i lus / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:228b-36: de lta bu'i bla ma ni rdo rje 'dzin pa dang mtshungs par lta ba'i don ni //
T02TD1203E:228b-37: mi gsal mchog gi bkra shis can //
T02TD1203E:228b-38: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:228b-40: mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan rnams dang mi ldan zhing /
T02TD1203E:228b-41: mi gsal ba yin yang de rnams kyi rgyu'i gtso bo yod pas na mchog gi bkra shis can yin no //
T02TD1203E:228b-42: ci'i phyir yin snyam pa la //
T02TD1203E:229a-2: sangs rgyas 'bras bu sbyin pa'i bdag / ces bya ba ni dbang dang bcas pa'i man ngag gnang ba ni /
T02TD1203E:229a-3: sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD1203E:229a-5: bdag ces bya ba ni bla ma mchog tu 'gyur ba nyid kyis bdag go /
T02TD1203E:229a-7: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid do //
T02TD1203E:229a-8: bdag gzhan ni rtag chad la dmigs pa'i dngos po dang /
T02TD1203E:229a-10: med pa ni 'jig rten las 'das par blta bar bya'o bsod rnams thams cad kyi ni gnas //
T02TD1203E:229a-11: zhe bya ba ni rin po che dang /
T02TD1203E:229a-12: gser la sog pa dpag tu med pa dbul ba'i gnas yin te /
T02TD1203E:229a-13: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i 'dus byas gang gis kyang bla ma la mchod pa la mnyam du med do /
T02TD1203E:229a-15: sangs rgyas dngos grub ster bas na bsnyam par mi bya'o /
T02TD1203E:229a-17: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02TD1203E:229a-18: tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug lta /
T02TD1203E:229a-19: de kun gyis ni bdag mchod 'os //
T02TD1203E:229a-20: gras pa ma yin grags gzug sbyin /
T02TD1203E:229a-22: sangs rgyas la sogs pa thams cad kyang rang rig bla ma la mchod cing bkru ba'i gnas yin no zhes bya ba'o /
T02TD1203E:229a-23: yang na sangs rgyas ni phung po lnga'o //
T02TD1203E:229a-24: byang chub sme dpa' ni skye mched rnam so /
T02TD1203E:229a-25: tshangs pa ni rlung gi 'khor lo'o /
T02TD1203E:229a-26: brgya byin la sog pa yang de bzhin no /
T02TD1203E:229a-28: mchod par 'os pa ni bla ma'o //
T02TD1203E:229a-29: sangs rgyas su 'jig rten pa la ma grags kyang //
T02TD1203E:229a-30: gsang sngags rdo rje theg par grags pa'i gzugs so //
T02TD1203E:229a-31: de ltar shes nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
T02TD1203E:229a-32: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel /
T02TD1203E:229a-33: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u gsum pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1203E:229a-35: // / ji lta bu'i go rims su zhes gsungs pas na /
T02TD1203E:229a-37: de'i rjes thogs su gnas kyi bskyed pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1203E:229a-38: de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon cig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:229a-39: nyon cig pa ni sdud pa po la gdams pa'o //
T02TD1203E:229a-40: de la dang por de kho na yid mngon du byas la //
T02TD1203E:229a-41: de'i 'og tu gnas kyi zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1203E:229b-0: bcom ldan @229b 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa'i gnas so //
T02TD1203E:229b-1: bskyed pa ni rim pas bskyed rim dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:229b-2: ji lta ba bzhin don ni go rims te /
T02TD1203E:229b-3: dbang gi 'og tu 'byung ba'i don to //
T02TD1203E:229b-4: ka bag cig dang sngo dgur ldan //
T02TD1203E:229b-5: zhes bya ba la lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi srog gi dbyug pa ni /
T02TD1203E:229b-6: ka ba gcig gi dngos po'o //
T02TD1203E:229b-9: skye mched la sogs pa'i lhag pa'i lha rnams dgu po'i lam nas 'gro ba'i phyir sgo dgu'o /
T02TD1203E:229b-10: ldan pa zhes bya ba ni sgo bzhi dang gsum dang //
T02TD1203E:229b-13: bzhi ni 'khor lo bzhi'i bdag nyid dga' ba rnams so //
T02TD1203E:229b-14: gsum ni sku gsungs thugs te /
T02TD1203E:229b-15: de la sku'i sgo sngar bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:229b-16: thugs kyi ni snying gi dbus na //
T02TD1203E:229b-17: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa gser dang bcas pa'i dbus na gnas pa'i rtsa chen shing gi me tog lta bur gnas pa'i dngos po 'og tu kha bltas nas 'chad pa'i bdag nyid de'i dbus su gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems yungs kar sbom po'i tshad tsam pa'i ming shigs pa'i yi ge dang ldan pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma dag 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i spyi bo'o //
T02TD1203E:229b-22: chu rnams ni de bzhin du //
T02TD1203E:229b-26: 'og nas rgyu ba rnams rim pa bzhin sbyang ba'o //
T02TD1203E:229b-30: de la steng gi sgo nas /
T02TD1203E:229b-32: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams g-yo zhing gshegs su gsol ba dang //
T02TD1203E:229b-33: lte ba nas steng du ba ltas pa'i rtsa la nyi ma rgyu zhing bzhud pa'i rtsa ro can ma'i lam nas so /
T02TD1203E:229b-34: 'og gi sgo nas rna par shes pa ste /
T02TD1203E:229b-35: spyan 'dren cing bzhugs su gsol ba ni /
T02TD1203E:229b-36: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang mkha' 'gor ma dang gzhan yang steng nas 'og tu bltas pa rtsa la zla ba rgyu zhing byon pa'i rtsa 'dzin ma'i lam nas lte ba'i dbus su 'dzag go //
T02TD1203E:229b-37: sgo gcig pa ni rtog med ma'i rtsa yin te /
T02TD1203E:229b-38: bde ba'i byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i lam nas rang bzhin dga' ba ni //
T02TD1203E:230a-1: thams cad dang bral ba gcig tu grub pas na sgo gcig go //
T02TD1203E:230a-3: dkyil 'khor gnyis med sbyor ba las /
T02TD1203E:230a-4: sgom pa so sor snang ba tsam //
T02TD1203E:230a-5: bde gshegs rnams kyi dkyil 'khor sogs //
T02TD1203E:230a-6: rang bzhin dga' la bzhugs par mdzod //
T02TD1203E:230a-8: / de'i gnas kyi bskyed pa ji bzhin don zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa'o //
T02TD1203E:230a-9: rdo rje'i pa rtsag pa zhes bya bas la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:230a-10: rdo rje ni sems kyi rdo rje'i ni sems kyi rdo rje'o //
T02TD1203E:230a-11: rtseg pa ni sems kyi rdo rje khyab pa'o //
T02TD1203E:230a-12: rgyun ni khrag dang mchi ma la sog pa'i byang chub sems so //
T02TD1203E:230a-13: rdo rje thig ni rtsa rtog med ma dang ldan ba'o //
T02TD1203E:230a-14: bla re ni 'khor lo rnams so //
T02TD1203E:230a-15: kun du yongs su bskor ba yin / zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1203E:230a-16: 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rtsas bskor ba'o //
T02TD1203E:230a-17: rlung la sogs pa'i rim pas dbye //
T02TD1203E:230a-24: gsang bar rlung gi dbyibs dang //
T02TD1203E:230a-27: snying gar sa'i dbyibs dang bzhi //
T02TD1203E:230a-28: keng rus dbyug pa'i bdag nyid du ldan pa'i gnas so //
T02TD1203E:230a-29: nam mkha' thams cad mtha' kun du //
T02TD1203E:230a-31: bde ba chen po'i 'khor la sogs pa'i thams cad kyis lus la khyab pas na mtha' kun no //
T02TD1203E:230a-32: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02TD1203E:230a-34: de rnams thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni //
T02TD1203E:230a-35: gnyis su med pa'i de nyid do //
T02TD1203E:230a-36: de nyid ni sems can dang sangs rgyas thams cad la rgyun mi 'chad pas rtag pa'o //
T02TD1203E:230a-37: gshegs bzhugs mi mda' pas na rtag tu bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:230a-38: da ni phyi'i don bshad de //
T02TD1203E:230a-39: rdo rje gur gyi dbus su ni //
T02TD1203E:230a-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:230a-41: 'dir dka' ba 'ga' tsam zhig dgongs te /
T02TD1203E:230a-42: gshin rje gshed ces bya ba ni //
T02TD1203E:230a-44: gang zag la sogs pa bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rtog pa 'phrog pa'i dang tshul can yin pa'i phyir na /
T02TD1203E:230a-45: gshin rje mthar byed yin no /
T02TD1203E:230a-46: shes rab mthar byed ces bya ba ni //
T02TD1203E:230a-47: 'od zer dpag tu med pa spros pas shes rab dman pa'i bdud dang //
T02TD1203E:230b-0: mu stegs kyi rtogs pa @230b drag po ni khyab 'jug btul bas shes rab mthar byed do /
T02TD1203E:230b-1: padma mthar byed ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:230b-3: drag shul gyi sbyor bas brtson 'grus dman pa'i le lo can rnams kyi tshangs pa la sogs pa btul ba'i dngos grub thams cad kyi bdag nyi rta mgrin rgyal po'o //
T02TD1203E:230b-4: bgegs mthar byed ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:230b-5: 'od zer la sogs pa'i sbyor bas nyon mongs pa dang bcas pas tshogs kyi bdag po la sogs pa'i bgegs rnams thal bar byas te /
T02TD1203E:230b-6: slar gsos nas dam la btags pa'i phyir bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o //
T02TD1203E:230b-7: gzhan 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa go sla'o ;
T02TD1203E:230b-8: / gzhan ra ne phyogs skyong bcu btul ba'i phyir na /
T02TD1203E:230b-9: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo bcu po ni //
T02TD1203E:230b-10: bdag nyid kyi gdan rang rang gi steng na bzhugs pa'o zer ro /
T02TD1203E:230b-11: tshul dang thig pa'i rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba la sog pa ni /
T02TD1203E:230b-12: mngon par byang chub pa lngas lha'i sku bskyed pa'o ;
T02TD1203E:230b-13: / dpal ye shes thig le zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1203E:230b-14: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis dang ldan pas na dpal lo //
T02TD1203E:230b-15: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid ye ru ka nyid kyi gzugs ni ye shes so //
T02TD1203E:230b-16: de nyid spros pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang bral bas na thig le'o //
T02TD1203E:230b-17: phyag rgya chen pos 'khyud cing zhes bya ba la //
T02TD1203E:230b-18: skye ba dang 'gag pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'i chos kyi dbyings yin yang /
T02TD1203E:230b-19: 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pas phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1203E:230b-20: khyab pa yin yang lha mo'i gzugs su 'byung bas na chen po'o //
T02TD1203E:230b-21: kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa'i phyir 'khyud pa yin no ;
T02TD1203E:230b-22: / gtan tshigs 'dis na phyag rgya chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:230b-23: skur bzhengs shing brjod pa zhe bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:230b-24: dpal he ru ka thugs rjes khro bo khros par rab tu gzhom pa'i phyir ni nyid kyi sgra brjod pa tsam gyis phyir rgol ba ku rlag par byed do //
T02TD1203E:230b-25: ha har dgod kyi phem gyi ye shes zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1203E:230b-26: gdug pa can gdul ba'i sgras brjod pa'o //
T02TD1203E:230b-27: chol pa chen po sgra bsgrags pas //
T02TD1203E:230b-29: h'um h'um dang phat phat la sogs pa'i sgras sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'jigs pa tsam mo //
T02TD1203E:230b-30: tshangs pa'i yul sa ni mgo bo ste /
T02TD1203E:231a-1: rnams kyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02TD1203E:231a-2: bye ba'i grangs ni 'bum phrag bcu yin te mtshon pa tsam mo //
T02TD1203E:231a-3: thod pa'i lto ba rlag pa'o //
T02TD1203E:231a-5: mgo thod kyi nang gi klad pa khro bo'i sgras med par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1203E:231a-6: gar dug dang ldan par byed pa //
T02TD1203E:231a-17: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel /
T02TD1203E:231a-18: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1203E:231a-20: // / bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lha rnams bstan kyang /
T02TD1203E:231a-21: de rnams kyi sngags med na /
T02TD1203E:231a-22: dngos grub mi 'grub pas de'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:231a-24: da ni sngags mchog bshad bya ba //
T02TD1203E:231a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni mchog yin te /
T02TD1203E:231a-27: mchog 'dir bshad par dam bca' ba'o //
T02TD1203E:231a-28: gang gi sgrub pa po des 'grub //
T02TD1203E:231a-30: sngags kyi mchog shes rab dang /
T02TD1203E:231a-31: snying rje'i bdag nyid gang yin pa la /
T02TD1203E:231a-32: rnal 'byor pa sgrub pa po de yang nas yang du bsgoms pa dang /
T02TD1203E:231a-34: sa yi cha ni mnyam par mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:231a-35: sgra ji bzhin pas bshad do //
T02TD1203E:231a-36: nang du ni dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i cho ga bya ba ni mnyam pa ru'o //
T02TD1203E:231a-40: byug pa'i sgras ni stobs dang bcas pa'i mi 'chi ba bcu phyed byug pa'o //
T02TD1203E:231a-41: dri zhim pa ni bzhi mnyam pa'o //
T02TD1203E:231a-42: me tog ni ku mu da la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:231a-43: dgram pa ni mdzes par bya ba /
T02TD1203E:231a-44: khyab par gtor ba yin pas na //
T02TD1203E:231a-45: me tog gis ni chal bar bya //
T02TD1203E:231a-47: sngags btu zhing bsgrub pa'i gnas bstan pa ni /
T02TD1203E:231a-48: chu ngogs yang na thang stong du //
T02TD1203E:231a-50: chu ngogs ni chu bo'i drung du'o //
T02TD1203E:231a-51: thang stong ni mi med pa'i gnas de dag gang yang rung ngo //
T02TD1203E:231a-53: rdo rje srad bu yis ni bskor //
T02TD1203E:231b-0: srad bu kha dog sna lnga ye shes lngar @231b byin gyis brlabs pa ni rdo rje'i srad bu'o //
T02TD1203E:231b-1: de ni gtsor gsungs pa yin pa /
T02TD1203E:231b-2: gzhan dag gis kyang bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD1203E:231b-3: rdo rje gzhon nu spyan rings ma //
T02TD1203E:231b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:231b-5: gsang ba'i mchod pa rgyu dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:231b-6: rdo rje gzhon nu ni lha mor bskyed la sbyor bas byin gyis brlabs pa ni rdo rje'o //
T02TD1203E:231b-7: lo bcu drug la sogs pa ni gzhon nu ma'o //
T02TD1203E:231b-10: sbom pa snyoms pas mdzes pa'o //
T02TD1203E:231b-12: spyan ring ba gtsor gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:231b-15: padma ni ge sar zhes bya ba /
T02TD1203E:231b-17: lang tsho la bab pa ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:231b-18: reg bya 'jam pa ni lus kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1203E:231b-19: dang por mkhas pas gzhug par bya //
T02TD1203E:231b-21: rnal 'byor pas shes rab ma'i mtshan nyid rtogs nas dang por dkyil 'khor du'o //
T02TD1203E:231b-22: sngags kyi gnas su lugs ji bzhin ;
T02TD1203E:231b-25: bsgrub pa'i gnas le'u bzhi par bskyed par gsungs par ji lta ba bzhin du byas la byin gyis brlab bo /
T02TD1203E:231b-26: legs dges ni gcig la gcig dga' na dgyes pa'o //
T02TD1203E:231b-27: shin tu sbyor bar bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:231b-28: rang bzhin dga' ba'i ye shes dga' ba gzhan mas bskyed pa'o //
T02TD1203E:231b-29: de'i sbyar bas ni thabs dang shes rab dga' ba rnams las so //
T02TD1203E:231b-32: kha dang sogs mchod par bya //
T02TD1203E:231b-34: slob ma'i gnas gsum du thig le bya ba dang /
T02TD1203E:231b-35: dkyil 'khor gyi sa la mchod pa dang ;
T02TD1203E:231b-36: lha rnams la mchod par bya'o / yang na byang chub kyi sems phyir mi 'byung bar rtog med ma'i rtsa'i kha dang sa ni rten yin te /
T02TD1203E:231b-37: rten phyag rgya dang bcas pa dga' ba rnams kyis mchod par bya zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:231b-41: sngags btu ba'i dkyil 'khor padma 'dab ma brgyad pa dmar po bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1203E:231b-42: rdo rje yi ni phur bu bcu //
T02TD1203E:231b-43: khro bo'i sngags kyis mkhas pas gdab //
T02TD1203E:231b-45: phur bu bcu la khro bo bcur byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD1203E:231b-46: khro bo'i sngags bcus ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos so //
T02TD1203E:232a-1: aom dzrembha dzrembha zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:232a-2: de ni sngags dgod pa dang btu ba gsungs pa 'di yin te /
T02TD1203E:232a-3: a'a li k'a li mnyam byas la //
T02TD1203E:232a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:232a-5: a'a li ni a'a la sogs pa bcu drug go //
T02TD1203E:232a-6: k'a li ni yi ge sum cu rtsa gsum ste /
T02TD1203E:232a-9: 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte ba'i 'dab ma la ste /
T02TD1203E:232a-10: 'dab ma kun la rim pas dgod //
T02TD1203E:232a-12: a'a li ye shes 'dab ma gcig ni /
T02TD1203E:232a-13: 'dab ma gcig la dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug go //
T02TD1203E:232a-14: k'a li 'dab ma bdun du dran //
T02TD1203E:232a-16: ka nas ha'i bar gyi yi ge 'dab ma bdun po la dgod do //
T02TD1203E:232a-17: 'dab ma re re yi ge lnga //
T02TD1203E:232a-18: lnga pa la ni lnga pa'o //
T02TD1203E:232a-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nim ka'i sde tshan lnga dang /
T02TD1203E:232a-23: pa'i sde tshan lnga pa lnga 'dab ma lnga la lnga lnga'o //
T02TD1203E:232a-26: lte bar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin yig 'bru kasha'o //
T02TD1203E:232a-28: dang po gzugs kyi bdag po ni yi ge aom ste /
T02TD1203E:232a-29: sngags rnams kyi thog mar bstan pas so //
T02TD1203E:232a-30: de nas 'dab ma gnyis kyi dang por zhes pa ni yig 'bru sha'o //
T02TD1203E:232a-31: bzhi par dbyangs yig dang bcas pa ni /
T02TD1203E:232a-32: aa'i ring po dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:232a-33: 'og tu re par yis ni brgyan //
T02TD1203E:232a-34: zhes bya ba ni ra'i yi ges so //
T02TD1203E:232a-35: nyi shu lnga pa ni ma'i yig 'bru'o //
T02TD1203E:232a-36: 'dab ma gnyis pa'i zhes pa ni yig 'bru ha'o //
T02TD1203E:232a-37: dbyangs yig gnyis pa ni yi ge a'a'o //
T02TD1203E:232a-38: sngags kyi nus mthu bstan pa ni /
T02TD1203E:232a-41: 'dab gnyis dang po'i bzhi pa yis ni yi ge wa'o //
T02TD1203E:232a-43: gsal byed pa yi brgyad pa ni yig 'bru dza'o //
T02TD1203E:232a-44: 'dab gnyis dang po'i gnyis pa yis ni ra'i yig 'bru'o //
T02TD1203E:232a-45: ldan pas thams cad rigs 'phrogs byed ni yon tan mthu yod pa'o //
T02TD1203E:232a-46: gsal byed pa yi gsum pa ni g'i yig 'bru'o //
T02TD1203E:232a-47: bcu pas yang dag ldan pa'o ni /
T02TD1203E:232a-49: dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni a'a dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:232a-50: bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin pa ni /
T02TD1203E:232a-52: de nas de'i dang po ni /
T02TD1203E:232b-0: bcu @232b drug po'i gsum pa ni ai'o //
T02TD1203E:232b-1: thams cad sngags kyi tshig bzhi ni /
T02TD1203E:232b-2: ti la ka'i yi shes thig le'i le'u dang po'o //
T02TD1203E:232b-3: de nas sa'i dag pa ni la'o //
T02TD1203E:232b-4: de bzhin gsal byed dang po ni ka'o //
T02TD1203E:232b-5: yan lag gsal byed sum cu gsum ni ha'i yi ge'o //
T02TD1203E:232b-6: dbyangs yig drug pa ni a'u'i bdag nyid do ;
T02TD1203E:232b-7: / thams cad kyi ni 'byung ba'i gzhi //
T02TD1203E:232b-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1203E:232b-9: dang po ru ni gzugs kyi mchog / ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:232b-10: yi ge aom dang por btu ba'o //
T02TD1203E:232b-13: 'og tu re pha ri ra dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:232b-14: dbyangs yig bzhi pa ni a'i'i bdag nyid dang sbyar ba'o //
T02TD1203E:232b-15: rig pa'i rgyal po mchog ni /
T02TD1203E:232b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying po hr'i'o //
T02TD1203E:232b-17: thig le steng du ldan pa ni /
T02TD1203E:232b-19: de rang du ni nye bar gnas ni /
T02TD1203E:232b-21: nyon mongs par la sogs pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:232b-22: thams cad zhi ba zhi ba'i mchog / ces so //
T02TD1203E:232b-23: thig les steng mnan sum cu gsum ni ham gi yi ger bstan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:232b-24: bcu drug pa yi gnyis pa ni a'a'o //
T02TD1203E:232b-25: ldan pa ni ham du gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:232b-26: yang na de nyid yi ge mchog ni /
T02TD1203E:232b-28: khams gsum mun nag med par byed ni /
T02TD1203E:232b-29: 'dod khams la sogs par ye shes thig le'i ye shes sgron ma 'bar bar byas pas /
T02TD1203E:232b-30: ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal bar byas zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po dang /
T02TD1203E:232b-31: nye ba'i snying po'i yon tan bsgrags par byas so //
T02TD1203E:232b-32: h'um phat de ni gnyi gar sbyar ni /
T02TD1203E:232b-33: gnyis gnyis te h'um h'um phat phat ces bya'o //
T02TD1203E:232b-34: tha mar sv'a h'a yis ni ldan //
T02TD1203E:232b-36: sngags kyi mthar sv'a h'a dang ldan pas sbrul gyi sngags so //
T02TD1203E:232b-37: nye ba'i snying po'i sngags zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:232b-38: snying po rang la nye bas na /
T02TD1203E:232b-39: nye ba'i snying po'i don te //
T02TD1203E:232b-40: bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po bstan nas /
T02TD1203E:232b-41: bcom ldan 'das ma'i gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:232b-42: dang pos rnam par snang mdzad dag / ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:232b-44: nyi shu rtsa dgu de nas so ni wa'i yig 'bru'o //
T02TD1203E:232b-45: gsal byed pa yi brgyad pa yang ni yig 'bru dza'o //
T02TD1203E:232b-46: nyi shu rtsa bdun pas ni ldan //
T02TD1203E:233a-0: @233a * // nyi shu lnga pas de nas so ni yig 'bru ma'o //
T02TD1203E:233a-1: dbyangs kyi yi ge bdun pas ldan ni /
T02TD1203E:233a-2: 'dir ma'i yig 'bru la ri yis steng 'og tu ldan pa ste me'i don to //
T02TD1203E:233a-3: bzhi pa las ni gsum pa'i zhes pa ni /
T02TD1203E:233a-4: de dang nye ba rlung yin no //
T02TD1203E:233a-6: rlung gi sa bon ni ya'i yig 'bru'o ;
T02TD1203E:233a-7: / dbyangs yig bcu gcig ldan pa ni /
T02TD1203E:233a-9: lnga pa'i lnga pa ni ma'i yig 'bru'o //
T02TD1203E:233a-10: ha'i yig 'bru de dang nye ba ni ha rang gi'o //
T02TD1203E:233a-11: lnga pa'i gsum pa ni ba'i yig 'bru'o //
T02TD1203E:233a-12: yi ge rtsa brgyad de nas so ni /
T02TD1203E:233a-14: lnga pa yi ni dang po dang ;
T02TD1203E:233a-16: pa'i ye ge bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:233a-17: nyi shu rtsa bdun de nas so ni ra'i yig 'bru'o //
T02TD1203E:233a-18: dbyangs yig gnyis pas ldan ni a'a ring ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:233a-19: gsal byed kyi ni dang po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:233a-21: sum cu rtsa gcig pas ni ldan ni /
T02TD1203E:233a-23: ksha'i don gyis ka dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:233a-24: nyi shu rtsa lnga dag pa ni ma zhes pa'i yig 'bru'o //
T02TD1203E:233a-25: dbyangs yig gnyis pas ldan pa ni /
T02TD1203E:233a-26: a'a ring po dang mar ldan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:233a-27: nyi shu rtsa drug yi ge mchog / ces pa ni ya'o //
T02TD1203E:233a-28: dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gcig pa ni ae'i yig 'bru bstan to //
T02TD1203E:233a-29: ya la ae gnyis ldan pa ni //
T02TD1203E:233a-31: sv'a h'a mthar ni ldan pa ni /
T02TD1203E:233a-32: mtha' can gyi sngags kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1203E:233a-33: h'um h'um phat ni sprel bar bya //
T02TD1203E:233a-35: sv'a h'a gong du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1203E:233a-36: de ni phyag rgya chen po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:233a-37: bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po'i yon tan ni rin po che'i dpe ji lta ba bzhin gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:233a-38: dang po yi ge gzugs kyi mchog ni /
T02TD1203E:233a-39: rnam par snang mdzad kyi sa bon no //
T02TD1203E:233a-44: ya'i sde tshan gnyis pa ni /
T02TD1203E:233a-46: / nyi shu rtsa dgus de nas so ni /
T02TD1203E:233a-48: dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa yis //
T02TD1203E:233a-49: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:233a-50: ai thung bas sbyar te wi'o //
T02TD1203E:233a-51: de nas sum cu rtsa gnyis pa ni /
T02TD1203E:233a-53: ra yi yig 'bru de dang mnyam //
T02TD1203E:233b-0: zhes bya ba @233b ni go sla'o //
T02TD1203E:233b-1: tha mar sv'a h'a dang ldan pa ni /
T02TD1203E:233b-2: sngar bshad pa bzhin 'dir yang ngo //
T02TD1203E:233b-3: h'um h'um phat ni sprel ba yin //
T02TD1203E:233b-6: nye ba'i snying po'i sngags yin no //
T02TD1203E:233b-8: de rang la nye ba ste bcom ldan 'das ma'i bstan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:233b-9: phreng ba'i sngags gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:233b-10: aom shr'i ma h'a zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:233b-11: aom ni sngags thams cad gsal ba'o //
T02TD1203E:233b-12: shr'i ma h'a ni dpal chen po ste /
T02TD1203E:233b-13: dpal he ru ka nyid do //
T02TD1203E:233b-14: ka ru na ni thugs rjes 'og ma'i chen po dang sbyar ro //
T02TD1203E:233b-16: shva ra ni dbang phyug go //
T02TD1203E:233b-17: dpal chen po he ru ka thugs rje chen po dbang phyug khros pa'o //
T02TD1203E:233b-19: gdug pa can rnams khros pa'o //
T02TD1203E:233b-20: de'i don ni bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po he ru ka nyid /
T02TD1203E:233b-21: thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis gdug pa can rnams la shin tu khros pas zhal dang phyag mang por ston pa'o //
T02TD1203E:233b-22: bhe be da zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ma bshad do //
T02TD1203E:233b-24: bsgom par dang bzlas pa la rag lus pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1203E:233b-25: h'um h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:233b-26: dpal nam mkha' dri med dang /
T02TD1203E:233b-27: zla ba la sogs pa dpa' bo dang dpa' mo bcu drug phrag gnyis kyi sngags so //
T02TD1203E:233b-28: de'i phyir 'khor lo'i sngags zhes bya'o ;
T02TD1203E:233b-29: /'khor lo ni 'khor lo'i lha rnams so //
T02TD1203E:233b-31: sngags chen po'i ni nus mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o / dpa' bo rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug go //
T02TD1203E:233b-34: snying po mchog ni thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi sa bon ni snying po mchog mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1203E:233b-36: 'jigs ma la sogs pa'i sngags ni /
T02TD1203E:233b-38: dpa' bo'i yan lag ma snying sngags //
T02TD1203E:233b-40: yan lag ma ni lha mo rnams so //
T02TD1203E:233b-42: / gsang ba'i sngags kyis dgod pa ni //
T02TD1203E:233b-43: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:233b-44: dam tshig dang mi ldan pa rnams la bstan par bya ba ma yin pas gsang ba yin no //
T02TD1203E:233b-45: 'gro ba rnams la skyob pa'i bdag nyid yin pas na sngags so //
T02TD1203E:233b-46: sbyor ba drug gi don bstan pa ni dgod pa'o //
T02TD1203E:234a-0: @234a * // sbyor ba drug gi man ngag rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das ni mchod pa'i dus so //
T02TD1203E:234a-1: aom n'a da ni rma la ya h'um h'um phat ces brjod pa ni mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:234a-2: de la sngags kyi dang por phyag 'tshal ba'i yi ge aom zhes bya ste /
T02TD1203E:234a-4: n'a da ni ye shes kyi tshul de rtog pa dang bral ba'i sgra'o //
T02TD1203E:234a-5: ni rma ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i ngo bo rnams dang bcas pa'i lte ba'o //
T02TD1203E:234a-6: la ya ni pho brang ste sprul pa'i lte ba'i pho brang bcom ldan 'das tshul gyi ye shes bzhugs pa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:234a-7: h'um dang pos ni gdug pa can rnams la sdigs mdzub kyis 'joms pa'o ;
T02TD1203E:234a-8: / gnyis pa'i h'um ni de rnams dbang du sdud pa'o //
T02TD1203E:234a-9: phat kyis gtor nas ltung bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1203E:234a-10: aom bi du la sogs pa ma bshad pa snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:234a-11: ye shes drug ni sbyor ba drug gi ye shes so //
T02TD1203E:234a-12: sngags mchog dbang zhes bya ba ni sngags thams cad kyi mchog go //
T02TD1203E:234a-15: nus mthu dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:234a-17: gsangs sngags kyi nus mthu ni rgyud la sogs pa thams cad nas 'byung ste /
T02TD1203E:234a-19: bde ba mchog gi rgyud las kyang 'jig rten gsum g-yo bar byed do //
T02TD1203E:234a-26: lto 'phye chen po dang bcas pa 'gugs par byed pa dang /
T02TD1203E:234a-28: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad sgrub pa po'i mngang [?] gzhug byed par 'gyur ba dang //
T02TD1203E:234a-29: de'i sbyor ba 'phrog par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa bzhin /
T02TD1203E:234a-30: sngags kyi nus mthu rgyud la sogs pa kun nas gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:234a-31: de rnams kyang khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchog yin no //
T02TD1203E:234a-32: sde tshan brgyad kyi gtso bo yin //
T02TD1203E:234a-34: a'a li dang k'a li yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i gtso bo aa la sogs pa brgyad do //
T02TD1203E:234a-35: 'di rnams sngags btu ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:234a-37: cig shos kyang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1203E:234a-38: rtsa ba'i sde tshan zhes bya ba ni yi ge a'a'o //
T02TD1203E:234a-39: gtor ma gtang ba ni aa dang ldan pa'i sngags kyis gtor ma gtang ba'o //
T02TD1203E:234a-40: brtag pa gnyis pa ji bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:234b-0: kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud brtag pa gnyis pa @234b bzhin du ste /
T02TD1203E:234b-2: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharmm'a n'am aady'a nutpa nna tv'at aom a'a: h'um sv'a h'a zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD1203E:234b-4: dbal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel //
T02TD1203E:234b-5: gsangs ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u lnga pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1203E:234b-7: // / sngags kyi 'og tu mchod spyin 'byung bas na /
T02TD1203E:234b-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:234b-9: mchod sbyin ni phyi dang nang gi mchod sbyin no //
T02TD1203E:234b-10: rab ni nang gi mchod sbyin dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1203E:234b-11: de ni bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le bdag gis bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:234b-16: sogs pas ni nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD1203E:234b-17: rim pas sbyor ni phyi'i bzhin du nang la yang mgo bo dang /
T02TD1203E:234b-20: smin ma la sogs pa rnams la sbyar te /
T02TD1203E:234b-21: nang gi don bsgoms pas ni /
T02TD1203E:234b-22: phyi'i gnas la sogs par bgrod mi dgos par 'dus pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1203E:234b-24: de'i nang du gsum gyi phyag rgya'i grva la /
T02TD1203E:234b-25: dpal au tyan dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gnas skabs bzhin shes par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:234b-26: phyi'i bgrod mi dgos par nang gi lus la 'dus pa yin na /
T02TD1203E:234b-29: bskyed pa'i bye brag thigs pa gsum //
T02TD1203E:234b-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1203E:234b-31: bskyed ba ni 'khor lo'i rim pas bde ba'i thig le rnams 'byung zhing skyed pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1203E:234b-32: bye brag ni dga' ba'i rim pa'i bye brag skyed pa'o //
T02TD1203E:234b-35: longs spyod dang dbang gi dga' ba rnams so //
T02TD1203E:234b-37: de smin pa'i rdzogs pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:234b-38: rim pa gsum de ltar ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:234b-39: bskyed pa'i thig le thim par la sogs pa dang ldan par ni de bzhin du rdzogs pa'i rim pa bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:234b-40: thig le drug gi bdag nyid bcas ;
T02TD1203E:234b-42: rnam shes la sogs bye brag tu //
T02TD1203E:234b-43: zhes bya ba la rnam par shes pa dang /
T02TD1203E:234b-44: sems dang yid ces bya ba rnam grangs so //
T02TD1203E:234b-45: sems kyi gnas ni snying yin no //
T02TD1203E:234b-46: sogs pa ni bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid dang /
T02TD1203E:235a-2: de rnams mchod sbyin byed pa'o //
T02TD1203E:235a-3: bye brag tu ni dga' ba'i khyad par tha dad pa'i ni bye brag skye ba'i gnas so //
T02TD1203E:235a-4: de'i don gsal bar gsungs pa ni mchod sbyin ni byang chub kyi sems kyi bdag nyid mchod sbyin no //
T02TD1203E:235a-5: tshangs pa ni bde ba'i ye shes te /
T02TD1203E:235a-6: mchod sbyin yang de yin la tshangs pa yang de yin no //
T02TD1203E:235a-7: g-yul sa che zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:235a-8: sku'i 'khor lo'i bzhugs pa'i gnas yin no //
T02TD1203E:235a-9: longs spyod ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:235a-11: rnam par shes pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:235a-13: nam mkhar ye shes zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:235a-14: 'pho ba la sogs pa'i ye shes bcas pa'i gnas ni sprul pa'i 'khor lor ro //
T02TD1203E:235a-15: de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:235a-16: sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i ye shes dang ldan par gsungs pa de bzhin du /
T02TD1203E:235a-17: gzhan gsum po yang dag pa la sogs pa'i dngos po la sogs pa gsum dang sbyar ro //
T02TD1203E:235a-18: sku brgyad kyi ni bye brag tu //
T02TD1203E:235a-20: 'khor lo bzhi'i bye brag gis gnas brgyad dang ldan pa'i sku brgyad bskyed pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1203E:235a-21: dngos po rten dang rnam par 'byed //
T02TD1203E:235a-23: sku'i 'khor lo la sogs pa'i gzhi'i gnas la sogs par dngos po la sogs pa'i mchod sbyin bya zhes bla ma'i man ngag gi 'chang pa'o //
T02TD1203E:235a-24: ji bzhin 'dod pa sdud pa ni //
T02TD1203E:235a-26: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i thig le bstan pa bzhin du /
T02TD1203E:235a-27: bde ba'i byang chub kyi sems 'di yang de bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:235a-29: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa'i dkyil 'khor ni mkha' ni mkha' ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa'i bde ba dang bcas pa'i ngo bo ste /
T02TD1203E:235a-30: mchog gi dga' ba'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1203E:235a-31: phyi'i gnas shes nang gi gnas la 'jug par 'gyur pa'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:235a-33: au dyan na sogs gnas su ni ;
T02TD1203E:235a-35: mkha' 'gro ma 'du ba'i gnas ni au dyan dang /
T02TD1203E:235b-18: byang gi sgra mi snyan dang /
T02TD1203E:235b-19: nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /
T02TD1203E:235b-20: lho'i 'dzam bu glings dang de rnams so //
T02TD1203E:235b-21: legs dgyes la sogs lha mo kun //
T02TD1203E:235b-23: lha mo legs dgyes rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD1203E:235b-24: rdo rje mche ba ma dang /
T02TD1203E:235b-25: rdo rje glang chen ma dang /
T02TD1203E:235b-27: dpa' mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams so //
T02TD1203E:235b-28: k'a li zhes pa la sogs pa ni bla ma'i kha las shes par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:235b-29: sems can sems kyi bye brag tu //
T02TD1203E:235b-31: 'gro ba'i bsam pa tha dad pa'i dbang gis /
T02TD1203E:235b-32: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa yang de bzhin du mdzad pa yin no ;
T02TD1203E:235b-34: sna tshogs thabs ni rab tu bshad //
T02TD1203E:235b-36: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las kyang /
T02TD1203E:235b-37: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //
T02TD1203E:235b-38: 'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po //
T02TD1203E:235b-40: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku'i gzugs ji ltar 'thad pa bzhin du mdzad nas thabs rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sgo nas chos ston pa dang /
T02TD1203E:235b-41: sprul pa'i sku'i gnas skabs su /
T02TD1203E:235b-42: sems can rnams la gzigs te /
T02TD1203E:235b-43: 'dul ba'i thabs la sogs pa tshul rnam pa bzhi gsungs te /
T02TD1203E:235b-44: kha cig rnams la 'dul ba'i thabs //
T02TD1203E:235b-45: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:235b-46: kha cig rnams ni sems can 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lam la khyad par du mos pa rnams la chos bstan pa /
T02TD1203E:235b-47: 'dul ba'i thabs ni gdul bya de rnams kyi don du'o //
T02TD1203E:235b-48: kha cig rnams la mdo sde ni //
T02TD1203E:235b-50: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dang de las gzhan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:235b-51: theg pa chen po ni sbyin pa dang //
T02TD1203E:235b-52: tshul khrims la sogs pa'i lam la zhugs pa yin la /
T02TD1203E:235b-53: gzhan ma ni spyin pa la sog pa bya ba'i lam la ma zhugs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:235b-54: la la pha rol phyin pa'i lam //
T02TD1203E:235b-56: sa dang pha rol phyin pa'i sgo nas spyod pa ste /
T02TD1203E:235b-57: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams so //
T02TD1203E:236a-1: cig la ni sngags kyang mchog / ces bya ba ni //
T02TD1203E:236a-5: rnal 'byor bla ma'i spyod pa ni sngags so //
T02TD1203E:236a-6: sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa las mchog tu gyur pa'i phyin na mchog go //
T02TD1203E:236a-7: rab 'bring tha ma'i bya brag tu //
T02TD1203E:236a-9: rab rnams la ni sngags kyi theg pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:236a-10: 'bring rnams ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:236a-11: tha ma rnams la ni shes rab dam dman pa'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:236a-13: de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02TD1203E:236a-14: gang zhig dge slong dngos gnas dang //
T02TD1203E:236a-15: gang yang rtogs pa dga' ba'i mi //
T02TD1203E:236a-16: gang zhig rgan por gnas pa la //
T02TD1203E:236a-17: de la de nyid mi bstan no //
T02TD1203E:236a-19: thar par 'gro ba'i thabs yin no //
T02TD1203E:236a-21: sna tshogs pa'i thabs de rnams so //
T02TD1203E:236a-22: de yang 'khor ba'i rnam par rtogs pas bcings pa las nges par grol ba'i phyir thar pa'o //
T02TD1203E:236a-23: der 'gro ba'i thabs theg pa gsum po la yod pa'i phyir thar par 'gro ba'i thabs yin pa'o //
T02TD1203E:236a-24: rtag pa la sogs pa'i phyin ci log rnams kyi gnyen po sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgoms pas /
T02TD1203E:236a-25: 'dod chags dang bral ba mngon du byas nas rtogs par byed cing /
T02TD1203E:236a-26: dus phyi nas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs nas bskal pa grangs med pa bzhis sangs rgyas nyid rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1203E:236a-27: yang mngon par rdzogs pas sa dang pha rol tu phyin pas ma lus pa'i bsod rnams kyi tshogs nyid sbyin pa la sogs pa'i thabs la bslabs pa'i phyir na /
T02TD1203E:236a-28: bskal pa gsum gyi sangs rgyas ni //
T02TD1203E:236a-30: de la bskal pa gsum zhes bya ba la bskal pa grangs med pa gsum na 'tshang rgya'o //
T02TD1203E:236a-31: theg pa kun gyi blo gros che //
T02TD1203E:236a-33: theg pa chen po ni dmigs pa dang /
T02TD1203E:236a-39: lam chen po dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD1203E:236a-40: byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD1203E:236b-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa rnams kyi ngo bo @236b nyid do ;
T02TD1203E:236b-1: / de las kyang khyad par du 'gyur ba ni /
T02TD1203E:236b-2: rdo rje theg pa chen po ste /
T02TD1203E:236b-3: tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:236b-5: sngags theg mos la de ltar min //
T02TD1203E:236b-10: rnal 'byor gsum gyis ni de lta min te /
T02TD1203E:236b-11: bsgoms pa'i stobs rdzogs pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ma lus pa nyid kyis ni /
T02TD1203E:236b-12: bsgom pa la mchog tu gzhol ba'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:236b-14: sangs rgyas nyid rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:236b-15: rnal 'byor bla ma ni rdzogs rim bsgom pa'i stobs kyis tshe gcig gis sangs rgyas pa nyid yin no //
T02TD1203E:236b-17: shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyun las kyang /
T02TD1203E:236b-18: bskyed pa'i rim par ldan pa yis //
T02TD1203E:236b-19: dus ni nges pa med pas 'grub //
T02TD1203E:236b-20: rdzogs pa'i don gyi rnal 'byor la //
T02TD1203E:236b-21: tshe gcig tu ni sangs rgyas 'grub //
T02TD1203E:236b-23: yang slob dpon padma'i rdo rjes mdzad pa las kyang /
T02TD1203E:236b-24: de nyid lam la 'jug rnams kyi //
T02TD1203E:236b-25: rnal 'byor pa rnams thams cad ni //
T02TD1203E:236b-26: thabs dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1203E:236b-27: de rnams dngos grub gzhan du min //
T02TD1203E:236b-28: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lam gyis ni //
T02TD1203E:236b-31: skye ba du ma'i bar gyis 'grub //
T02TD1203E:236b-33: de ltar nges par shes bya yi //
T02TD1203E:236b-34: shes rab thabs kyis rnams par bsgom //
T02TD1203E:236b-36: rnal 'byor ma khyod smos ci dgos //
T02TD1203E:236b-37: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pha'i rgyud nas rtsa'i man ngag shas chung la /
T02TD1203E:236b-38: ma rgyud nas shas che ba dang /
T02TD1203E:236b-39: de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i ye shes skye ba bul la /
T02TD1203E:236b-40: rnal 'byor ma'i myur ba'i dpes so //
T02TD1203E:236b-41: de skad du lung las kyang /
T02TD1203E:236b-42: rnal 'byor ma rnams rnyed mi dka' //
T02TD1203E:236b-43: rnal 'byor cung zad rnyed dka' ba //
T02TD1203E:236b-44: thabs ni rab kyis rnyed 'gyur te /
T02TD1203E:236b-45: thabs rab min na nam yang min //
T02TD1203E:236b-47: de'i phyir khyad par yod pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:236b-48: tshe 'di la ni sangs rgyas so //
T02TD1203E:236b-49: zhas bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad lnga ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02TD1203E:237a-0: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba @237a * //
T02TD1203E:237a-3: // / de nas mchod pa'i cho ga ni //
T02TD1203E:237a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:237a-5: de nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:237a-6: bar ma chad pa'i tshig yin te /
T02TD1203E:237a-7: mchod pa ni me tog la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:237a-8: cho ga ni mchod bya dang /
T02TD1203E:237a-10: mchod rdzas la sogs pa'i cho ga rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:237a-11: sdig pa ni dge ba ma yin pa'i glo bur ba'i 'o //
T02TD1203E:237a-12: thams cad ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rtog pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad 'khor ba'i rgyu'o //
T02TD1203E:237a-13: 'jig byed pa ni mchod pa'i cho ga'i 'bras bu de kho na nyid kyis glu bur ba'i dri ma dag pa'i phyir ;
T02TD1203E:237a-15: yid 'phrog ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:237a-16: nges par bstan pa'i gnas skabs kyis shes pra 'gyur ro //
T02TD1203E:237a-17: byang chub sems 'byung mchod pa yis //
T02TD1203E:237a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs la /
T02TD1203E:237a-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir byang chub sems yin no //
T02TD1203E:237a-20: de bral ba la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi gnas rnams su 'bab pa ni 'byung ba'o //
T02TD1203E:237a-22: mchod pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir mchod pa'o //
T02TD1203E:237a-23: yar ngo ni mchod sbyin yin te sngar bstan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:237a-24: mar do ni mchod pa'i cho ga yin no //
T02TD1203E:237a-25: bye brag ni tha dad pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1203E:237a-26: shes rab ni mchod pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1203E:237a-27: de bzhin du mchod sbyin gyi mtshan nyid thabs so //
T02TD1203E:237a-28: sbyor ba ni ro gcig pa'i ngo bo mchog gi dga' bar ro //
T02TD1203E:237a-29: mchod pa'i mtshan nyid ni chad pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02TD1203E:237a-30: mchod sbyin gyi mtshan nyid ni mchog gi dga' ba'o //
T02TD1203E:237a-31: ro gcig pa ni rang bzhin gyi dga' ba'o //
T02TD1203E:237a-32: de dag las de kho na nyid rnyed par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02TD1203E:237a-33: sku gsum ye shes dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1203E:237a-35: chos kyi sku la sogs pa'i gsum po ni /
T02TD1203E:237a-38: dbang gsum gyi ye shes dga' ba rnams kyi bdag nyid yin no //
T02TD1203E:237a-39: tshes ni mar ngo'i bcu drug nas bgrangs pa'i tshes so //
T02TD1203E:237a-40: yi ge ni a'a li'i yi ge bcu drug go //
T02TD1203E:237a-41: sngags ni sems srung bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1203E:237a-42: ri bong can ni zla ba dang ldan pa'i don du gnas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:237a-44: skye zhing 'phel bar rdzogs pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1203E:237b-0: thig le ni @237b bde ba'i byang chub kyi thig le bco lnga dang ldan no //
T02TD1203E:237b-1: mkha' ni rtsa gnas kyi gtso bo dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:237b-2: 'gog pa ni rdzogs par byed pa'i ngo bo de mnyam pa'i ror gyur pa'o //
T02TD1203E:237b-4: 'gog pa yis zhes gsungs pa'i gtan tshigs dang ldan pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:237b-5: rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'i don de kho na nyid do //
T02TD1203E:237b-7: thabs dang shes rab spyor ba'i don gyis 'byung ba'o //
T02TD1203E:237b-8: thig le'i rang bzhin ye shes te //
T02TD1203E:237b-10: byang chub sems bde ba'i thig le'i bdag nyid rang bzhin dga' ba'i ye shes te /
T02TD1203E:237b-15: 'dzin pa la sogs pa thams cad dang rang bzhin gyis bral ba mnyam pa nyid do //
T02TD1203E:237b-16: sangs rgyas kun ni rnam par sna mdzad la sogs pa thams cad do //
T02TD1203E:237b-17: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni /
T02TD1203E:237b-18: sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi rnyed na /
T02TD1203E:237b-19: gzhan rnams kyis ni rnyed pa ha cang ches zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:237b-21: don dam pa so sor rang rig pa de'i mtshan nyid 'di ni /
T02TD1203E:237b-22: tshig dang yi ge'i rnam par rtog pa'i yul las 'das pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:237b-24: bstan pa thams cad ni kun rdzob yin te ;
T02TD1203E:237b-25: dper na dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bstan pa na /
T02TD1203E:237b-26: de thos pas nyams su mi myongs ba bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:237b-27: de skad du ye shes mnyam pa'i rgyud las kyang /
T02TD1203E:237b-28: spros pa med pa'i mchog nyid ni //
T02TD1203E:237b-29: sangs rgyas la sogs kun gyis kyang //
T02TD1203E:237b-30: de yi tshad ma brjod pa med //
T02TD1203E:237b-31: ji snyed brjod pa kun rdzob yin //
T02TD1203E:237b-33: bdag gi bka' drin rang bzhin myur //
T02TD1203E:237b-35: bcom ldan 'das kyis man ngag bka' stsal pa'i drin gyis sems can skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi rang bzhin don myur du 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1203E:237b-36: the tshom med par rnyed pa yin ;
T02TD1203E:237b-38: yid gnyis kyi sems ma yin zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD1203E:237b-39: nges par zung shig ces pa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:237b-40: blun po gang gis zhes pa ni /
T02TD1203E:237b-41: shes rab dman pa'i byis pa la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD1203E:238a-0: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i ros @238a * //
T02TD1203E:238a-1: thams cad la khyab kyang mthong ba ma yin no //
T02TD1203E:238a-2: mi shes pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1203E:238a-3: ci'i phyir blun po rnams kyis mi shes she na /
T02TD1203E:238a-4: de'i don gsungs pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1203E:238a-5: bsam gtan rags la rtag mos pa //
T02TD1203E:238a-7: dngos po rtog pa la zhen pa'i phyir bsam gtan rags pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:238a-8: de'i rnam pa la dga' zhing 'dun pas na rtag mos pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD1203E:238a-9: de rnams kun ni 'grub pa med //
T02TD1203E:238a-10: lha yi dbang phyug bden pa'o //
T02TD1203E:238a-12: bsam gtan rags pa'i rtog pa can kun gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi 'grub pa bden pa kho na'o zhes sdud pa po la gsungs pa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:238a-13: shes rab dang thabs kyi ros thams cad la khyab pa mi mthong ba de gang yin snyam pa la /
T02TD1203E:238a-14: de'i don tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis ston te /
T02TD1203E:238a-15: sa kun dbang phyug gi bdag po //
T02TD1203E:238a-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1203E:238a-17: sa kun ni bcu drug gnas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:238a-18: de rnams la dbang ba'i phyir dang phyug kyang yin la /
T02TD1203E:238a-19: bdag po yin te kun gyis bdag po bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le spros pa dang bral ba 'bras bu zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD1203E:238a-20: de nyid gzhan la rag ma las par bdag rang la mnga' bas mnga' bdag go //
T02TD1203E:238a-21: de nyid ni sa kun gyi yon tan dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mi thub pa'i phyir rgyal po'o //
T02TD1203E:238a-22: de nyid ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i phyir bdag nyid do //
T02TD1203E:238a-23: de nyid de bdag la khyab pa'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:238a-25: de nyid ni de dag gi mtha' la mi gnas pa'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:238a-26: thams cad la rtag tu stong zhes bya ste /
T02TD1203E:238a-27: chos thams cad la khyab pa tha ma'i mthar thug pa ji srid du rgyun mi 'chad par bzhugs pa'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:238a-28: rtag tu stong pa dngos po dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1203E:238a-29: de nyid bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir //
T02TD1203E:238a-30: kun gyis mchod cing phyag 'dzad pa'i gnas so //
T02TD1203E:238a-31: de nyid sgyu ma lta bu'i shes rab dang /
T02TD1203E:238a-33: shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin du grags pa'o //
T02TD1203E:238a-34: de nyid sangs rgyas dang sems can thams cad la dbang byed pas na /
T02TD1203E:238b-0: @238b 'gro med 'gro la bdag nyid rol lo //
T02TD1203E:238b-1: de nyid ni 'jig rten pa dang /
T02TD1203E:238b-2: bstan bcos la grags pa'i nam mkha' las mchog tu gyur pas na /
T02TD1203E:238b-4: mtha' gnyis grol bas na mtha' med pa nyid pa nyid do //
T02TD1203E:238b-5: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa rtog pa'i dngos po ni don dam par med pas na /
T02TD1203E:238b-6: mngon sum du bya ba'i ye shes de yang rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa yin te /
T02TD1203E:238b-7: skra'i rtse mo 'bum gyi cha tsam yang dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:238b-8: mtshan nyid dang bral gnas dang bral //
T02TD1203E:238b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:238b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin gyi man ngag gang yin snyam pa la /
T02TD1203E:238b-11: chos dang longs spyod dag gi mtha' //
T02TD1203E:238b-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:238b-13: de la chos ni thugs kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1203E:238b-14: longs spyod ni gsung gi 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1203E:238b-15: bdag ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1203E:238b-17: de rnams kyi don ni dga' ba rnams dang yang sbyar bar bya ba yin no //
T02TD1203E:238b-18: ye shes rnam shes ngo bo bdag //
T02TD1203E:238b-19: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:238b-20: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u bdun pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1203E:238b-22: // / da ni sdig pa dang bral bas dngos grub rnam gnyis 'grub pa'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:238b-24: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:238b-25: phrin las rnams bzhi bshad pa ni /
T02TD1203E:238b-26: zhi ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:238b-27: de'i tshe brda yis bstan pa ni //
T02TD1203E:238b-28: rgyas mtsho me dang mig zla la //
T02TD1203E:238b-31: lag pas bskor zhing mdzub mos g-yob pa ste /
T02TD1203E:238b-33: rgya mtsho la sogs pa'i brda bshad do //
T02TD1203E:238b-34: de la rgya mtsho bdun du grags pas rgyas pa'i kha khyer dang /
T02TD1203E:238b-37: me ni me lha bdun zhes grags pas /
T02TD1203E:238b-38: dbang gi yang mdzub bdun gyis gnas skabs kyi kha khyer dang shul dang zabs su'o //
T02TD1203E:238b-39: mig ni me lha spyan gsum par grags pas drag po'i kha khyer la mdzub gnyis zabs su brtsig go //
T02TD1203E:238b-40: zla ba ni dus bzhi zla bar grags pas zhi ba'i kha khyer la mdzub gnyis dang /
T02TD1203E:239a-0: @239a * // zabs su gcig dang sum cha'o //
T02TD1203E:239a-1: lha yi dbang phyug tshad yin no //
T02TD1203E:239a-3: de rnams thab khung gi tshad yin pa'o //
T02TD1203E:239a-4: gzhan ma kun gyi rim pas gcig / ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:239a-5: dgug pa dang bskrad pa dang dbye ba dang /
T02TD1203E:239a-7: bcing ba la sogs pa yang bzhi po dang gcig pa'o //
T02TD1203E:239a-9: sngar grub kyis ni gzhan ma grub //
T02TD1203E:239a-11: dam tshig sems dpa'i rim pa la sogs pa'i don bstan pa hom khung zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:239a-12: yo byad kyi rim pa la sogs pa /
T02TD1203E:239a-13: mkhas pa yis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o ;
T02TD1203E:239a-14: / rnal 'byor pa sgrub pa po'i mtshan nyid tshigs bcad phyed dang gnyis kyis gsungs pa /
T02TD1203E:239a-15: sgrub pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:239a-16: de la sgrub pa'i dbang po ni bsgrub pa'i bdag po'i don yin no //
T02TD1203E:239a-17: thig le'i don ni mchog gi dga' ba'o //
T02TD1203E:239a-19: / ye shes ni rang bzhin dga' ba'o //
T02TD1203E:239a-20: bye brag ni dga' ba bzhi'i mtshan nyid de /
T02TD1203E:239a-21: chad pa'i dga' ba dang bcas pa'i shes pa bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD1203E:239a-22: rin chen rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yin no /
T02TD1203E:239a-23: gzhan na re gang zag rin po che'i rigs su nges te /
T02TD1203E:239a-24: slob ma la bshad pa'i skabs so zhes zer ro //
T02TD1203E:239a-25: da ni de'i phyag rgya tshigs bcad gnyis kyis gsungs te /
T02TD1203E:239a-26: rigs lnga'i gzhon nu ma ni lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:239a-27: thod pa ma srid mo'i bdag nyid kyis sangs rgyas spyan du bsgom pa yin te zhi ba'i las bya'o //
T02TD1203E:239a-28: brtso blag mkhan ma'i bdag nyid kyis rgyas pa'i las bya'o //
T02TD1203E:239a-29: gtum mo sgyug mo'i bdag nyid kyis dbang gis las bya'o //
T02TD1203E:239a-30: do mbi chung ma'i bdag nyid kyis drag po la'o //
T02TD1203E:239a-31: gar mkhan bu mo'i ni bdag nyid kyis las sna tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:239a-33: 'khor lo bcu drug la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu ma rnams so //
T02TD1203E:239a-34: sbyin sreg las ni don bsgrub phyir //
T02TD1203E:239a-36: sbyin sreg phyi'i las kyi don nang la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg gi de kho na nyid kyi don bsgrub pas ni gzhan rnams kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1203E:239b-0: don chen po de nas @239b de'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:239b-1: rigs ngan mo ni 'jug par bya //
T02TD1203E:239b-3: de rnams kyi don ji ltar sgrub snyam pa la /
T02TD1203E:239b-4: don bsgrub pa'i don gsungs te /
T02TD1203E:239b-5: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //
T02TD1203E:239b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad phyed dang gnyis so //
T02TD1203E:239b-7: 'o na don gyi 'bras bu gang yin zhe na /
T02TD1203E:239b-8: de'i 'bras bu bstan pa 'di yin te /
T02TD1203E:239b-9: don dam du ni phyi don min //
T02TD1203E:239b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:239b-11: da ni kun rdzob gyi [*kyi] don dam pa'i de nyid rnyed pa bshad de /
T02TD1203E:239b-12: kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs su ni //
T02TD1203E:239b-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:239b-14: kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs ni /
T02TD1203E:239b-16: phyag rgyas gnyis lha'i gzugs sgyu ma'i bdag nyid dang ldan par bskyed do //
T02TD1203E:239b-17: kun brtags ni rang gi ngo bo ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1203E:239b-18: ye shes ni dga' ba rnams kyi ngo bo yin no //
T02TD1203E:239b-19: sbyor ba yis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:239b-21: a'a li k'a li ro gcig par sbyor bar 'gyur pas so ;
T02TD1203E:239b-22: / dga' ba dang mchog gi dga' ba dang /
T02TD1203E:239b-23: chad pa'i dga' bas ni rim pas bstan pa yin la /
T02TD1203E:239b-24: gnas ni rnyed par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:239b-25: bzhi pa rten can las rten med pa'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i rgyal po rnyed cing mthong gi skye ba ni ma yin no //
T02TD1203E:239b-30: 'jig pa med pa'i don ni mdo dang /
T02TD1203E:239b-31: sgrub thams cad la sogs pa kun nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1203E:239b-32: de bas na zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:239b-34: thams cad ni sems can kun bla na med pa'i byang chub sgrub pa la 'bad pa chen po bya dgos zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'dir ro //
T02TD1203E:239b-35: rnam pa thams cad ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad do //
T02TD1203E:239b-36: mchog ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid do //
T02TD1203E:239b-37: de rnams kyi rgyur 'gyur bas na man ngag yin no //
T02TD1203E:239b-38: thabs sna tshogs pa gzhan yang gsungs pa /
T02TD1203E:239b-39: rang dang gzhan rnams 'grub don du //
T02TD1203E:239b-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:239b-41: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel /
T02TD1203E:239b-42: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u brgyad pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1203E:240a-0: // / da ni go rims kyi gtor ma chen po dang bcas pa @240a * //
T02TD1203E:240a-2: de nas yang ni bshad bya ba //
T02TD1203E:240a-4: yang gi sgras sngar bstang pa yod pa de'i rjes su bshad pa'o //
T02TD1203E:240a-5: tshogs kyi 'khor lo gtor chen pos //
T02TD1203E:240a-7: dam tshig dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa rtsa ba'i gtor ma ka p'a la dum bu gcig pa dang ldan pa'am //
T02TD1203E:240a-8: yang na dum bu gsum par gtor ma chen po'i snod byas te //
T02TD1203E:240a-9: de nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gtor ma chen po'o //
T02TD1203E:240a-10: khyim ni sum thog gnas su ni //
T02TD1203E:240a-11: rim pa gsum pa'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pas sgrub pa po byin gyis brlab par bya ba yin no //
T02TD1203E:240a-13: de'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1203E:240a-14: chom rkun kun dang bral ba yi //
T02TD1203E:240a-16: phyir ril yul min nang gi min //
T02TD1203E:240a-17: zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi gnas ni phyi rol yin te /
T02TD1203E:240a-19: ni gnas su bar chad byed pa'i chom rkun la sogs pa'i bgegs 'byung ba'o //
T02TD1203E:240a-22: de ni bdag gi gnas yin te /
T02TD1203E:240a-23: 'khor gyi 'du 'dzi mang bas mi dben no //
T02TD1203E:240a-25: sgrub pa po rnal 'byor pa'i gtso bo yin la /
T02TD1203E:240a-27: 'khor la sogs pa dang ldan pas brgyan cing mdzes par byas ba'i don yin pa'o //
T02TD1203E:240a-28: rdo rje mda' ni rnam par gzugs //
T02TD1203E:240a-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:240a-30: de ru mchod sbyin don du ni //
T02TD1203E:240a-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mchod sbyin ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dang gtor ma'i rim pa bya'o //
T02TD1203E:240a-32: byol song rab kyi gzugs ni glang //
T02TD1203E:240a-34: rig pa med pa'i phyir na byol song rab shi ba'i ro dang mtshungs so //
T02TD1203E:240a-35: de yang bdag dang bral ba'i phyir ro ste /
T02TD1203E:240a-36: rnal 'byor pa yis kyang chos bdag dang bdag gi 'dzin pa spangs pa'i phyir blang bar bya'o ;
T02TD1203E:240a-37: / gri gug rung bas brtag par bya //
T02TD1203E:240a-39: nyon mongs pa rnams gcod pa'i bdag nyid ni /
T02TD1203E:240a-40: shes rab kyis de rnams brtag par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:240a-41: de rnams kyi rang bzhin shes par bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1203E:240b-0: yan lag rang ni mgo bo'i thod pa @240b yin no ;
T02TD1203E:240b-1: / padma'i snod ces bya ba ni thod pa yang yin la padma yang yin te /
T02TD1203E:240b-3: snod kyang yin te bdud rtsi'i snod do //
T02TD1203E:240b-4: sgron ma lnga ni glang po che'i stobs la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:240b-5: bsres pa ni mnam par sbyar bas bsres pa'o //
T02TD1203E:240b-6: gang dang sbyar ba zhe na /
T02TD1203E:240b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang ldan //
T02TD1203E:240b-10: mi bskyod pa ni gla rtsi'o //
T02TD1203E:240b-11: rnam par snang mdzad ni bzhi mnyam mo //
T02TD1203E:240b-12: rin chen 'byung ldan ni si la'o //
T02TD1203E:240b-13: 'od dpag med ni ga bur ro //
T02TD1203E:240b-14: don yod grub pa ni stobs chen po'o //
T02TD1203E:240b-15: ldan pa ni bsres nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsir ro mnyam par byas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:240b-16: de ru dam tshig dag pa ni //
T02TD1203E:240b-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:240b-18: tshigs kyi 'khor lo'i gnas skabs de ru dam tshig 'da' bar mi bya bas na dam tshig go //
T02TD1203E:240b-19: nyes pa'i skyon rnams mi 'byung ba'i phyir dag pa'o //
T02TD1203E:240b-20: rtag tu ni gnas skabs thams cad du rgyun chad pa med pa dus gsum du'o //
T02TD1203E:240b-21: bdag rang ni shi yis dogs pa dang /
T02TD1203E:240b-23: lhung gis dogs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:240b-24: bzhin du bsrung zhes bya ba rnal 'byor pa'i bla ma dang /
T02TD1203E:240b-25: rnal 'byor pho mo rnams la sogs pa la ;
T02TD1203E:240b-26: srog dang bral gyis dogs pa'i bsam pa la sogs pa bzhin du bsrung ba'o //
T02TD1203E:240b-27: dam tshig bsrungs pas ci zhig dgos snyam pa la /
T02TD1203E:240b-29: dam tshig bsrungs na grub pa ni //
T02TD1203E:240b-30: lha yi dbang phyug rnyed pa'o //
T02TD1203E:240b-33: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lha'i dbang phyug la bos nas yon tan gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1203E:240b-34: de yang thun mong gi dngos grub dang /
T02TD1203E:240b-35: mchog gi dngos grub rnyed par byed pa'i rgyu dam tshig yin gyi /
T02TD1203E:240b-36: gzhan du na skye ba'i 'dir yang mi bde ba sna tshogs la 'byung la /
T02TD1203E:240b-37: shi 'phos nas kyang mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba la sogs par skye'o //
T02TD1203E:240b-38: de skad du rgyud la sogs pa kun nas kyang gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:240b-39: de bzhin du 'dir dgongs pa'i thig le'i rgyud las kyang /
T02TD1203E:240b-40: dam tshig nyams pa'i sems can ni //
T02TD1203E:241a-0: rgyal po blun po rkun ma @241a * //
T02TD1203E:241a-2: / gcan gzan gza' dang sa bdag rims //
T02TD1203E:241a-3: me chu dug dang mkha' 'gro bdun //
T02TD1203E:241a-4: yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs dang //
T02TD1203E:241a-5: dus min shi nas mnar med 'gro //
T02TD1203E:241a-7: da ni bza' ba'i dam tshig bshad de /
T02TD1203E:241a-8: dam tshig mchog gi ye shes te ;
T02TD1203E:241a-9: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:241a-10: bza' ba'i dam tshig kyang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:241a-12: ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1203E:241a-13: dang pa ni 'dod pa la sogs pa'i dngos po'o //
T02TD1203E:241a-15: zas la ji srid spyod pa de srid du bdud rtsi lnga dang /
T02TD1203E:241a-16: stobs lnga dang ldan par byas la bza' ba'o //
T02TD1203E:241a-17: de dag ni rigs lnga'i dam tshig go //
T02TD1203E:241a-18: de nas 'khor lo'i mchod pa la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02TD1203E:241a-19: dgyes pa'i dam tshig zin nas ni //
T02TD1203E:241a-21: bsrung ba la sogs pas mnyes par byas nas ;
T02TD1203E:241a-22: de ma thag tu dkyil 'khor mchod pa'o //
T02TD1203E:241a-24: 'khor lo dang bcas rigs rab ces bya'o //
T02TD1203E:241a-25: de nas gtor ma dbul ba ni //
T02TD1203E:241a-26: rab tshim byas nas gtor ma dbul //
T02TD1203E:241a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:241a-28: gtor ma ni bdud rtsi la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i gtor ma'o //
T02TD1203E:241a-29: de'i gnas la sogs pa ni nam phyed ni gtang ba'i dus so //
T02TD1203E:241a-30: mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyun srang gi lam bzhi mdo'am /
T02TD1203E:241a-31: yang na lam sum mdo gyes pa de ru gtor ma bskyal bar bya ba'o //
T02TD1203E:241a-32: gnas tshogs kyi 'khor lo gtor ma chen po dang bcas pa'i gnas bstan par bya ba 'di yin te /
T02TD1203E:241a-33: dur khrod dam ni chu ngogs su //
T02TD1203E:241a-35: gzhan du na de ru ni tshogs kyi 'khor lor ro //
T02TD1203E:241a-36: dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya ste /
T02TD1203E:241a-37: chad pa la sogs pa'i rtogs pa bsrung ba dag pa ni /
T02TD1203E:241a-39: rtag tu ni dus rtag tu bsgoms pa'i stobs bskyed par bya /
T02TD1203E:241a-40: bdag rang ni srog dang bral gyi dgos pa la sogs pa bzhin bsrung ba ni /
T02TD1203E:241a-41: de gnyis su med pa'i don la 'bad pa ste chad pa'i dga' ba bsrung ba'o //
T02TD1203E:241a-43: dam tshig ni mchog gi dga' ba /
T02TD1203E:241b-0: bsrung ba ni @241b chad pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02TD1203E:241b-1: 'grub pa ni rang bzhin dga' ba /
T02TD1203E:241b-2: rnyed pa ni rang bzhin dga' mchog rnyed par 'gyur ba'i don to //
T02TD1203E:241b-3: da ni bza' ba'i dam tshig bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:241b-4: dam tshig ni bza' ba ste chad pa'i dga' bar /
T02TD1203E:241b-5: de bzhin du mchog ni mchog gi dga' bar /
T02TD1203E:241b-6: ye shes ni chad pa'i dga' bar /
T02TD1203E:241b-7: dad pa ni 'dod pa'i dad pa la sogs pa /
T02TD1203E:241b-8: rtag tu bza' ba ni rang bzhin dga' ba'i don rgyun du bza' zhing nyams su myong bar bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1203E:241b-9: dgyes pa'i dam tshig zin nas su //
T02TD1203E:241b-13: skye mched la sogs pa yang dgyes shing tshim pas dga' ba'o //
T02TD1203E:241b-14: 'khor lo ni bde ba chen po la sogs pa /
T02TD1203E:241b-15: bcas pa ni rtsa gzhan rnams dang bcas pa /
T02TD1203E:241b-16: rigs ni rigs dang rigs can ma'i rtsa kun /
T02TD1203E:241b-18: khyad par du yang de dag gis dgyes pa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:241b-19: gtor ma ni bar chad kyi bgegs bsrung ba'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:241b-21: nam phyed ni mchog gi dga' bas phyin ci log gi mtshan ma mi mthong ba'i phyir lam gyi bzhi mdo ru bsdu'o //
T02TD1203E:241b-22: yang sum mdor gyes pa ru ni /
T02TD1203E:241b-23: autpala'i snying po brgyad pa dang bcas pa'i lte bar ro //
T02TD1203E:241b-24: dur khrod ni dbugs dang bral ba'i byang chub sems kyi ro //
T02TD1203E:241b-25: chu ngogs ni bde chen di zhes man ngag gis zhes bya'o //
T02TD1203E:241b-26: da ni gtor ma bshad de /
T02TD1203E:241b-27: lhag ma 'am ni yang na phud //
T02TD1203E:241b-28: ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:241b-29: rang gnas phyir na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:241b-30: sgrub pa po rang gi khyim du phyin pa ste /
T02TD1203E:241b-31: gtor ma btang la zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02TD1203E:241b-32: 'khor lo ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:241b-33: 'khor gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni mi gcig gi snod brtag pa yin te /
T02TD1203E:241b-34: kun la yang de yis so //
T02TD1203E:241b-35: slob dpon la ni dum bu gcig / ces bya ba ni thod pa gling gcig pa ru bdud rtsi dbul lo //
T02TD1203E:241b-36: 'bad pa yis ni bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1203E:241b-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:241b-39: mi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig yin no //
T02TD1203E:241b-40: ma rgyud kyi dam tshig gsungs pa /
T02TD1203E:241b-41: g-yon gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:242a-0: rnal 'byor ma brtag pa'i don gyi phyir @242a * //
T02TD1203E:242a-1: 'ong na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:242a-3: gtor ma chen po'i dus su ni /
T02TD1203E:242a-4: mkha' 'gro ma 'ong ba srid pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1203E:242a-6: brtag pa'i don gyi phyir zhes gsungs to /
T02TD1203E:242a-7: dam tshig brtag pa'i ched du don 'ongs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams so //
T02TD1203E:242a-9: re zhig 'jigs par mi bya ste //
T02TD1203E:242a-11: mkha' 'gro ba ma rnams de la'o //
T02TD1203E:242a-15: rim pas de rnams 'ongs nas so //
T02TD1203E:242a-16: rang nyid dam tshig dang ldan par byas la /
T02TD1203E:242a-17: de kho na nyid la dmigs pas zhum pa'i sems mi skyed de /
T02TD1203E:242a-18: de kho na nyid dang ldan pas seng+ge lta bu ste /
T02TD1203E:242a-19: byol song lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa la mi 'jigs pas na seng+ge'i gzugs kyis spyod pas /
T02TD1203E:242a-20: rnam pa thams cad du 'jigs pa med par spyod pas ni /
T02TD1203E:242a-21: de'i rang bzhin nyid kyis yongs su 'gro ba'o //
T02TD1203E:242a-22: de yang rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:242a-23: de yang rnal 'byor ma kun gzugs sna tshogs dang /
T02TD1203E:242a-25: skad sna tshogs rab tu byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lus kyi brda dang /
T02TD1203E:242a-26: de'i lan du dag gi brda /
T02TD1203E:242a-27: de'i lan dang rim pa bzhin gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:242a-28: de dang lhan cig gtor ma chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:242a-29: dngos grub rnyed pa'i rgyu yin pas //
T02TD1203E:242a-30: gtor ma la sogs pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:242a-31: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel /
T02TD1203E:242a-32: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u dgu pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1203E:242a-34: // / de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:242a-35: mdor bsdus pa ni yan lag rgyas par bshad pa'i don rigs nas /
T02TD1203E:242a-36: bcom ldan 'das la dkyil 'khor gyis nges pa'i don zhugs pa ji ltar lags zhes zhus pa'o //
T02TD1203E:242a-37: sngar gsungs pa'i rgyud don las zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:242a-38: gzhal yas khang la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1203E:242a-39: mngon par byang chub lngas bskyed pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:242a-40: de lta'i dkyil 'khor rgyal dbang po //
T02TD1203E:242a-42: sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor nang gi rim pa dang /
T02TD1203E:242b-0: phyi'i rim pa ni @242b de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin no //
T02TD1203E:242b-1: de'i dbang po ni bcom ldan 'das yin te /
T02TD1203E:242b-2: de bas na bdag po yin no //
T02TD1203E:242b-3: rgyud kun du ni rnyed dka' ba //
T02TD1203E:242b-5: rnal 'byor pa thabs dang shes rab rgyud rnams su rnyed par dka' ba de 'dir gsal bar bstan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:242b-6: byang chub sems dang bha ga sku //
T02TD1203E:242b-7: dkyil 'khor gsum ni rab mchog go //
T02TD1203E:242b-8: zhes bya ba ni sngar ka ba gcig dang /
T02TD1203E:242b-9: sogs dgu la sogs pa gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1203E:242b-10: rim pa gnyis bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD1203E:242b-11: 'og nas 'byung ba'i don rnams kyi dkyil 'khor byang chub sems la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:242b-12: de dag gi phyi dang nang dang gnyis so //
T02TD1203E:242b-13: ci'i phyir byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa gsum gyi phyi dang nang yin zhe na /
T02TD1203E:242b-14: de dag ni phyi dang nang du dbye ste /
T02TD1203E:242b-16: gnyis su med pa'i rgyud las kyang //
T02TD1203E:242b-17: sku dang bha ga'i dkyil 'khor dang ;
T02TD1203E:242b-18: / gsum pa'i byang chub sems brtag pa //
T02TD1203E:242b-19: phyi dang nang gi rim pa yis //
T02TD1203E:242b-20: de dag kun du bshad par brjod //
T02TD1203E:242b-22: yang gleng gzhi'i phyi ma'i rgyud las kyang /
T02TD1203E:242b-23: lus kyi dkyil 'khor brjod pa dang //
T02TD1203E:242b-24: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa dang //
T02TD1203E:242b-25: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te //
T02TD1203E:242b-26: dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum du brtag //
T02TD1203E:242b-27: du ma brtag pa'i rab 'byung ba //
T02TD1203E:242b-28: gang lam mnga' bdag kun du sbyong //
T02TD1203E:242b-29: yang dag rig dang rab brtag pa'i //
T02TD1203E:242b-30: phung po rnam gnyis brjod pa yin //
T02TD1203E:242b-32: yang dpal aindra bhu tis mdzad pa'i dga' ba'i me tog gi phreng ba las kyang /
T02TD1203E:242b-33: dkyil 'khor sku zhes brjod pa dang //
T02TD1203E:242b-34: dkyil 'khor bha gar bshad pa dang //
T02TD1203E:242b-35: dkyil 'khor byang chub sems brjod de //
T02TD1203E:242b-37: de lta bu'i man ngag shes pas /
T02TD1203E:242b-38: phyi dang nang gi rim pas spyad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:242b-40: yang na snying po'i dkyil 'khor ba bstan //
T02TD1203E:242b-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:242b-42: yang zhes bya ba'i sngar bshad kyang 'dir bstan zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1203E:242b-43: snying po ni yang dag pa'i thugs rje ye shes /
T02TD1203E:243a-2: bstan pa ni bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:243a-3: rang gi bde ba ni mandala zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD1203E:243a-5: len pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:243a-6: sgra'i dbyings la ni len pa'i don te /
