T02TD1203E:260a-1: pa'i bde ba chen po dang ldan pa mchog tu gyur pa yang dbang po'i yul ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don gyis bstan to //
T02TD1203E:260a-3: de ni rab mchog aa yig 'bru //
T02TD1203E:260a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:260a-6: snying gi dbus na mi shes pa //
T02TD1203E:260a-7: gsal zhing mar mi bzhin du 'bar //
T02TD1203E:260a-8: mi 'gyur mchog tu phra ba ste //
T02TD1203E:260a-9: yig 'bru dam pa aar zhes bya //
T02TD1203E:260a-12: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / don chen yi ge dam pa ste //
T02TD1203E:260a-13: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
T02TD1203E:260a-14: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
T02TD1203E:260a-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i don gyis /
T02TD1203E:260a-16: rgyud kyi don la sogs pa bstan te //
T02TD1203E:260a-20: kun rdzob tsam du don sna tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid tsam gyis skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyi don rnyed do //
T02TD1203E:260a-21: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u nyi shu pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1203E:260a-23: // / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das mo nyid kyi don zhu bar 'dod pa'i phyir na /
T02TD1203E:260a-25: bcom ldan ye shes thig le lags //
T02TD1203E:260a-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:260a-27: zhus pa'i lan gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:260a-28: ye shes kyis rnyed gsang ba po ;
T02TD1203E:260a-29: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:260a-30: ye shes ni me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa lnga pos de rnyed par 'gyur ba'i thab so //
T02TD1203E:260a-31: gsungs ba ni gnyis su med pa ye shes drug pa'i 'og byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid brjod par mi nus pa dang /
T02TD1203E:260a-32: snod ma yin pa rnams la mi bstan pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
T02TD1203E:260a-36: 'od rab kyi ye shes kyis rnyed pa'o //
T02TD1203E:260a-37: snang ba'i rim pas dga' ba rnams kyi ngo bor bshad pa yin te /
T02TD1203E:260a-39: snang ba dga' bar bshad pa ste //
T02TD1203E:260a-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:260a-41: lha mo ni bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yin te /
T02TD1203E:260a-42: rang bzhin gyi 'od rab de kho na nyid bde ba chen bo kun gyi gnas su 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1203E:260a-44: gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin ni skye ba dang /
T02TD1203E:260a-46: bral ba brjod du med pa /
T02TD1203E:260b-0: yi ge dang bral ba dpyad pas @260b mi rnyed pa /
T02TD1203E:260b-2: chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o //
T02TD1203E:260b-4: skye ba nang gi 'pho med rab //
T02TD1203E:260b-5: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas ni /
T02TD1203E:260b-6: gang nas kyang ma skyes pa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:260b-7: da ni bcom ldan mo'i ngo bo bstan pa /
T02TD1203E:260b-8: rang gi ngo bo ye shes 'od //
T02TD1203E:260b-9: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:260b-10: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'i yum nyid rang 'od kyi bdag nyid /
T02TD1203E:260b-11: phyag rgya chen po'i rang nyid ni bde ba chen po'i sku la sogs pa'i dbye bas dbye bar bya ste /
T02TD1203E:260b-13: gdul bya'i bsam pa'i dbang gis drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyis rang gi ngo bo dbye ba'o //
T02TD1203E:260b-14: da ni skyon dang yon tan ston te /
T02TD1203E:260b-15: gzhan min bdag dang khyod med na //
T02TD1203E:260b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:260b-17: da ni 'byung ba dang skye ba med pa yin yang gdul bya'i mos pa'i dbang dang /
T02TD1203E:260b-18: thugs rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gshegs pa bstan te /
T02TD1203E:260b-19: mchog ni nam mkha'i gnas nas byon //
T02TD1203E:260b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:260b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das yum phyag rgya chen po dang bcas pa /
T02TD1203E:260b-22: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:260b-23: mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:260b-24: don gyi rang bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo las ma 'das par /
T02TD1203E:260b-25: gdul bya'i dbang gis sku bzhir snang ba dang /
T02TD1203E:260b-26: de bzhin du ji ltar 'dul ba'i gzugs kyis bzhugs so //
T02TD1203E:260b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje yis /
T02TD1203E:260b-29: ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du snang //
T02TD1203E:260b-31: mchog ni bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid skyon gyis ma gos pa'i chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' sprin la sogs pas gnod par mi 'gyur ba bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:260b-32: kun gyis bsgrub cing thob par bya ba yin pa'i phyir //
T02TD1203E:260b-33: gnas de nyid las ma g-yos bzhin du don mdzad pas na byon pa'o //
T02TD1203E:260b-34: de yang gzugs kyi sku'i dngos po'i tshul du sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa bsam pa rnam par dag pa rnams kyis so //
T02TD1203E:260b-35: sku gnyis lta ba'i don spyod pa dang 'cham pa bzhin du byis pa so so skye bo la gzigs nas gdul bya'i dbang gis chos ston du gshegs kyang /
T02TD1203E:261a-0: sku nyid bde ba chen po las mi g-yos par @261a * //
T02TD1203E:261a-2: mchog ni nam mkha'i gnas nas gshegs //
T02TD1203E:261a-4: bde ba chen po'i sku thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin te /
T02TD1203E:261a-6: phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba 'khor ba ji srid par gnas pa nyid la sogs pa'i bye brag dang ldan pas na /
T02TD1203E:261a-8: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T02TD1203E:261a-9: sprul pa'i sku la sogs pa kun gyi rang bzhin te /
T02TD1203E:261a-10: sku de rnams tha mi dad pa mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1203E:261a-11: de bas na mchog gi nam mkha'i ngal so nas /
T02TD1203E:261a-12: mchog gi nam mkha'i rtag tu bzhugs //
T02TD1203E:261a-14: gzhan na re tshig bzhi po bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la sogs pa bzhi la rim pa bzhin sbyar ro //
T02TD1203E:261a-15: da ni nges pa'i don du bshad de /
T02TD1203E:261a-16: kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02TD1203E:261a-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:261a-18: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le ni shuksha'i rnam pa bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor bzhugs pa'i gzugs so //
T02TD1203E:261a-19: yum phyag rgya chen mo mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs kyi rnam par rtsa'i khyad par gyi dngos po rtog med ma'i sku ma nor ba thabs nyid la 'khyud pa ni /
T02TD1203E:261a-21: de yang dbus kyi khyad par rtog med ma nyid g-yas dang g-yon du ro ma dang /
T02TD1203E:261a-22: 'dzin ma de dag gi gnas srog gi dbyug pa'o //
T02TD1203E:261a-23: gsang ba ni spa bar bya ba'i thabs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig med pa la mi bstan pa ni /
T02TD1203E:261a-24: sangs rgyas rin po che ni snod padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i ge sar dang lte bar bcas pa'i snying po gnas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:261a-26: chad pa'i dga' ba'i gnas ma yin pa'i lte ba'i gnas khyad par can no //
T02TD1203E:261a-27: langs nas ni ye shes kyi 'od zer gzugs kyis bzhengs pa'i ngo bo 'di'o //
T02TD1203E:261a-28: bde ba'i padma zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:261a-29: bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i gnas rtog med ma'i lam gyi gnas kyi padma ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis dbyer med par bzhugs pa dang /
T02TD1203E:261a-30: gshegs pa dang byon pa'i gnas so //
T02TD1203E:261a-31: thig le khong du chud pa'i phyir //
T02TD1203E:261b-0: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i don gyis ye shes kyi 'od kyi thig le'i don rtogs pa'i rang bzhin spros pa med pa'i gtum mo'i grogs lte ba'i thig @261b les byas pa dang /
T02TD1203E:261b-1: dbyer med pa'i gzugs su 'gyur te /
T02TD1203E:261b-3: gshegs nas brten pa kun ka tshig / ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:261b-4: gyen la gshegs shing 'od 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis rtsa'i nang gi rnam par rtog pa'i dngos po ji snyed pa de snyed ye shes kyi 'od kyis sbyangs shing bsregs /
T02TD1203E:261b-5: thal bar 'gyur pa ni ma yin no //
T02TD1203E:261b-6: de'i don ni mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin du byas pa la ni bsregs shing tshig ces bya'o //
T02TD1203E:261b-7: rgyal ba'i thig le khyer nas ni //
T02TD1203E:261b-9: sdig pa thams cad las rgyal ba ni /
T02TD1203E:261b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid /
T02TD1203E:261b-11: bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi gzugs kyis byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par bzhugs nas /
T02TD1203E:261b-12: spros pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin du byed pa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:261b-13: yang ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:261b-14: sngar gyi lam nas yang sngon dang mi 'dra bar zhes bstan pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1203E:261b-15: khyod ni bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen mo nyid de sngar bstan pa dang /
T02TD1203E:261b-17: da ltar bzhugs pa'i gnas dang 'brel pa'o //
T02TD1203E:261b-18: 'dir byon pa'i don zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:261b-19: lte ba'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i gnas nas gshegs nas yang slar sdud de de rang du byon zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to //
T02TD1203E:261b-21: lte ba'i sprul pa'i padma zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
T02TD1203E:261b-22: de nyid du gsal ba'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:261b-24: de yis ni spros pa med pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i gtum mo ye shes kyi 'od la brten pa ste /
T02TD1203E:261b-25: dga' ba'i rim pas rang bzhin dga' ba de nyid las spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin dga' ba phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin rnyed pa'o ;
T02TD1203E:261b-26: / kha cig 'khor lo bzhi'i dbye bas spros pa dang bcas par 'dod /
T02TD1203E:261b-27: kha cig spros pa yod rung med rung /
T02TD1203E:261b-28: mchog gi nam mkha'i gnas nas byon pa la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad 'dir rang bzhin dga' ba'i gnas gnyis la sbyar te /
T02TD1203E:261b-29: de yang bde chen gyi gnas dang /
T02TD1203E:261b-30: sprul pa ru rang bzhin dga' ba skye ba'i dus kyi skabs kyi gnas so zhes zer ro //
T02TD1203E:261b-31: kha cig sprul pa'i gnas kho na zhes smra'o //
T02TD1203E:261b-32: de bzhin kha cig bde ba chen po gcig pur gnas pa dang gshegs pa la sogs pa zer ro //
T02TD1203E:261b-33: tshangs pa'i yul las bye ba mthar //
T02TD1203E:262a-0: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la byang chub @262a * //
T02TD1203E:262a-1: kyi sems bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi spyi bo'i 'khor lo na gnas pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1203E:262a-2: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin can yin pas phyag rgya chen po bcom ldan 'das yum dang /
T02TD1203E:262a-3: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin du gcig pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1203E:262a-4: rgyas btab pa'i nges pa'i tshig gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:262a-5: de'i phyir phyag rgya chen po khyod grags zhes bya'o //
T02TD1203E:262a-7: rgyu la 'bras bus rgyas btab cing //
T02TD1203E:262a-8: 'bras bu la yang rgyus rgyas btab //
T02TD1203E:262a-10: sems ni ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyu //
T02TD1203E:262a-11: sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig /
T02TD1203E:262a-14: 'jig rten khams ni gang du yang //
T02TD1203E:262a-15: gzhan nas sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02TD1203E:262a-16: sems ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD1203E:262a-17: gzhan na sangs rgyas bstan du med //
T02TD1203E:262a-19: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u nyi shu gcig pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1203E:262a-21: // / sngags kyi don la som nyer gyur pas 'dir zhugs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:262a-22: gsang ba'i pad snying rgyas byed pa //
T02TD1203E:262a-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rjes dang padma'i sgras bshad pa'i thabs dang shes rab kyi padma 'dab ma dang /
T02TD1203E:262a-24: lte bar bcas pa'i gsang ba'i thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis 'byed par byed cing rgyas par mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:262a-25: gsang ba'i pad snying rgyas byed pa'o //
T02TD1203E:262a-26: ji lta ba'i nyi ma shar ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis padma'i gzugs kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'brel pa'i dpe brjod pa'i don kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:262a-27: re zhig ni rim gyis pa'i don yin te /
T02TD1203E:262a-28: 'og nas 'byung ba dang 'brel pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1203E:262a-29: ci'i phyir gsang ba bshad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:262a-30: der gnas dang gsang pa'i don bshad pa /
T02TD1203E:262a-31: 'dir gsang ba'i don gyi mtshan nyid rgyas pa dang gnas kyi don zhus pa'o //
T02TD1203E:262a-32: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:262a-33: 'pho ba dang 'jigs pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'i ri bong can gyi gzugs ni /
T02TD1203E:262a-34: ga pur dngos po phur dang bral //
T02TD1203E:262a-36: shes rab kyi skye gnas kyi khyad par de bzhin thabs la yang yin pa'i rang bzhin gnas ni skye gnas yin zhes bya'o //
T02TD1203E:262b-0: de dag la @262b brten pa byams pas dga' ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i don 'byung ba bcom ldan mo la gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:262b-1: dga' pa sbyin pa mo phyag rgya //
T02TD1203E:262b-3: de la gsang ba'i don ni rgyu'i rang bzhin 'bras bu dang bcas pa gsum gyi dbye bas rab 'bring dang /
T02TD1203E:262b-4: tha ma'i don bstan pa yin no ;
T02TD1203E:262b-5: / bcom ldan mo yum gyis tha mal pa'i 'dod chags dang 'bras bu dang /
T02TD1203E:262b-6: thabs dang gsum gyi dbye bas rab dang /
T02TD1203E:262b-8: tha ma'i don bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:262b-9: bcom ldan mo yum gyis tha mal pa'i 'dod chags dang /
T02TD1203E:262b-12: byang chub sems ni ga pur gzugs //
T02TD1203E:262b-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:262b-14: kun rdzob kyi byang chub sems gang zag so so'i skye bo thams cad la yod pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1203E:262b-15: pho dang mo'i skye gnas kyis phye nas /
T02TD1203E:262b-16: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i spyod pa kun byed cing gnas kyang mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:262b-17: gang zag kun gyi gsang ba'i don nges pa kho nar shes shing khong du chud pa'i don gyis dbang bskur ba'i don dang dam tshig dang /
T02TD1203E:262b-18: thos pa la sogs pa mi dgos par 'gyur bas na ci zhig bya zhes bya'o //
T02TD1203E:262b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa lon kyang ni /
T02TD1203E:262b-20: ma rangs pa'i tshig tu rig par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:262b-21: drang pa'i don gyi tshig gis ldan //
T02TD1203E:262b-23: byang chub kyi sems ga pur kun rdzob kyi dngos po'i gzugs la yang yon tan yod pa yin pa dang /
T02TD1203E:262b-24: de bzhin du gnas la yang sbyar bar bya ste /
T02TD1203E:262b-25: rten gyi don gyi phyir yang dag nges pa'i don zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:262b-26: rten kun rdzob kyi gzugs gnas dang /
T02TD1203E:262b-27: byang chub kyi sems ga pur drang ba'i don gyi tshig la brten nas /
T02TD1203E:262b-28: don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin nges pa'i don yang dag pa'i tshig dang /
T02TD1203E:262b-29: rten la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa /
T02TD1203E:262b-30: rten dang rten las rnyed pa de ni /
T02TD1203E:262b-31: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1203E:262b-32: de'i phyir rten med na 'bras bu ji ltar rnyed ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:262b-33: lus kyi dngos med ji ltar 'di ru sems //
T02TD1203E:263a-0: dper na lus med par sems gnas pa'i gzhi med pa @263a * //
T02TD1203E:263a-1: bzhin khu ba'i gzugs med na bde ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni bde ba kho na nyid yin no //
T02TD1203E:263a-3: lus kyi dngos med ci ste bde //
T02TD1203E:263a-4: bde ba brjod par yong mi nus //
T02TD1203E:263a-5: khyab bya khyab byed rang bzhin du //
T02TD1203E:263a-6: 'gro ba rnams la bde bas khyab //
T02TD1203E:263a-7: ji ltar me tog la gnas dri /
T02TD1203E:263a-8: me tog dngos med shes mi 'gyur /
T02TD1203E:263a-9: de bzhin gzugs sogs dngos med na //
T02TD1203E:263a-10: bde ba dmigs su med pa nyid //
T02TD1203E:263a-13: khu ba med na bde med 'gyur //
T02TD1203E:263a-14: bde dang bral na'ang de med 'gyur //
T02TD1203E:263a-15: ltos bcas nus pa med pa'i phyir //
T02TD1203E:263a-16: lha yi sbyor bas bde ba'o //
T02TD1203E:263a-18: ji ltar don mthun gsang tshig de ni gsang //
T02TD1203E:263a-20: lus dang me tog la sogs pa'i bde ba dpe bstan pa rnams dang /
T02TD1203E:263a-21: de bzhin 'dir mthun par bshad pa'i tshig dang 'brel par don mthun pa 'di ni /
T02TD1203E:263a-22: rten gyi rgyu'i gsang ba'o / da ni 'bras bu'i gsang ba'i don bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1203E:263a-23: drang ba'i don min nges pa'i don yang min //
T02TD1203E:263a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:263a-25: da ni thabs dang bcas pa'i gsang ba'i don btsal bar bstan te /
T02TD1203E:263a-26: yang na mos pa 'bring gi don gyis su //
T02TD1203E:263a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:263a-28: mchog gi dga' ba zhes bya ba ni dga' ba thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa ni /
T02TD1203E:263a-29: rang bzhin dga' ba'i ngo bo bzhi pa 'di yin no //
T02TD1203E:263a-30: sbyin pa ni chad pa'i dga' ba'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyis bzhi pa'i 'bras bu gzugs su ster ba'i don to //
T02TD1203E:263a-32: 'bad pas chad dga' srung bar byed //
T02TD1203E:263a-33: ces bya ba la sogs pa la chad pa'i dga' ba'i gnas su shes rab dang thabs kyi sbyor ba byas pa las /
T02TD1203E:263a-34: byang chub sems babs pa de rdo rje'i 'khor lor mchog gi dga' bde las 'phos pa nyid 'bad pas te /
T02TD1203E:263a-35: ye shes kyi rlung 'gugs pa'i srung bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1203E:263a-36: de nyid las rang bzhin dga' ba nyams su myong ba rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1203E:263a-37: de'i 'bras bu ni gsang ba'i don te /
T02TD1203E:263a-38: bzhi pa'i rdo rje'i sku zag pa med pa bde ba dus thams cad par rgya che ba /
T02TD1203E:263a-39: spros pa'i mtshan ma mi mnga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes te /
T02TD1203E:263a-40: rab kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba 'bras bu'i don to //
T02TD1203E:263b-0: gzhan na re chad pa'i dga' @263b ba nas rang bzhin dga' bar 'og tu 'pho ba ste /
T02TD1203E:263b-1: de yang gong ma'i yon tan gyis 'og ma thub pa de las 'bras bu'i don rnyed kyi skye ba ma yin no zhes zer ro //
T02TD1203E:263b-2: nor mdud snying ga yi ni gsang //
T02TD1203E:263b-4: rin po che'i nor bu'i mdud pa'i dkyil gyi lte ba'i snying ga'i gnas ni gsang ba'i gzhi dang bcas pa'i don bstan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:263b-5: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:263b-6: gnas khyad par can du kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang rang bzhin dga' ba dang ldan par bzhugs pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1203E:263b-7: thabs kyi gzugs la gnas kyi bye brag dang /
T02TD1203E:263b-8: byang chub sems kyi rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin shes rab ma la yang gnas pa ni /
T02TD1203E:263b-9: shes rab ma yi de bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:263b-11: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u nyi shu gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1203E:263b-13: // / gsang ba'i don rang bzhin dga' ba'i mtshan nyid du gsungs pa'i rjes su bar cis kyang mchod pa /
T02TD1203E:263b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen po yang zhu bar byed do zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:263b-15: sngar zhus pa de yin pa'i don la yang zhu zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD1203E:263b-16: mgon po thams cad gtan la phab //
T02TD1203E:263b-17: ji ltar rang bzhin yin pa las /
T02TD1203E:263b-19: skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs mgon byed pa khyod yin zhes pos nas /
T02TD1203E:263b-20: rgyud kyi rim pa 'di nyid kyi phyi dang nang la sogs pa'i chos rnams thams cad gsungs shing bshad de gtan la phab na /
T02TD1203E:263b-21: de rnams thams cad kyi gsang ba'i don rang bzhin dga' ba mchog tu gyur pa ;
T02TD1203E:263b-23: zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de ji lta bu lags zhes zhus pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1203E:263b-24: de ji lta bu'i tshig thos nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:263b-25: zhus pa'i tshig la lan bka' ma stsal par cad mi gsung bar mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin gyis mi snang ba'i ngo bo bde ba chen po gnyis su med pa'i don la bzhugs pa tsam gyis gzhan gyi spyod yul du ma gyur pa'i don to //
T02TD1203E:263b-26: 'di'i don ni 'di rang gi 'og nas rgyas par gsungs te /
T02TD1203E:263b-28: rang bzhin brjod du med pa dang /
T02TD1203E:264a-1: du med pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:264a-2: 'di ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po litstsha b'a dri ma med par grags pa la gnyis su med pa'i don slar dris pas /
T02TD1203E:264a-3: dri ma med par grags pa cang mi gsung pa'i tshul dang mtshungs pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:264a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs pa rnams ni go sla'o //
T02TD1203E:264a-5: 'di'i rgyud las bdag las gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das ye shes thig le'i rgyud 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi don dang dpa' bo rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi don gyi mtshan brdar bstan pa tha dad pa ru yod pa ni ma yin te gcig pa nyid do //
T02TD1203E:264a-7: dpa' bo rnams dang lta smos kyang ci dgos bcom ldan 'das nyid las 'di'i chos thams cad rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1203E:264a-8: de ni lte ba'i gsang ba'i pad //
T02TD1203E:264a-9: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra'i dbyi gzhug gis sngon bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:264a-10: na ma'i don gyis shes rab kyi padma dang /
T02TD1203E:264a-11: thabs kyi nor bu rin po che'i sgras chad pa'i dga' ba dang mchog gi dga' ba'i rgyu de dag sbyor ba las rang bzhin dga' ba'i rgyal po nyid ni /
T02TD1203E:264a-12: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'i mtshan nyid kyi don dang /
T02TD1203E:264a-13: dpa' bo rnams kyi yang gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:264a-14: de'i phyir chos thams cad kyi gsang ba'i 'bras bu'i don dang rang bzhin dga' ba bcom ldan 'das kyis don du bsdus pa 'di yin no //
T02TD1203E:264a-15: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u nyi shu gsum pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1203E:264a-17: // / bcom ldan 'das mos gsol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:264a-20: shes rab ye shes la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dus su /
T02TD1203E:264a-22: rdo rje slob dpon bla mas cho ga gang gis dbang bskur ba sbyin zhing /
T02TD1203E:264a-23: slob mas tshul ji ltar zhu zhing blang zhes zhus pa'o //
T02TD1203E:264a-24: chu la sogs pa'i dbang dus su //
T02TD1203E:264b-0: rdo rje @264b dang dril bu dang /
T02TD1203E:264b-1: ming la sogs pa'i dbang bcu gcig po rnams bskur ba'i dus su /
T02TD1203E:264b-3: rdul tshon la sogs zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:264b-4: sogs pa'i sgras thang ka'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD1203E:264b-6: lugs ma bshad par shes so //
T02TD1203E:264b-7: gsang ba'i dbang bskur dus su ni //
T02TD1203E:264b-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:264b-13: de bzhin du me tog gi khyad par gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor byed pa /
T02TD1203E:264b-14: gsang ba'i dbang bskur sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:264b-17: ku mu da yis mtshon nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya /
T02TD1203E:264b-18: dgram par bya zhing gzor bya'o //
T02TD1203E:264b-20: de bzhin du rdul tshon la sogs pa'i yang bshad pa'o //
T02TD1203E:264b-21: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur dus su zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:264b-26: aa ka ru la sogs pa dri zhim po sna tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor byas la dbang bskur sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:264b-28: ga pur gyis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya zhes nang du bstan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:264b-29: da ni dbang bskur ba'i mtshan nyid ston te /
T02TD1203E:264b-30: las dang po'i dang po la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:264b-31: sbyang ba ma byas pa'i sems can rnams la /
T02TD1203E:264b-40: skyabs sbyin de rnams nges pa'i don du sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1203E:264b-41: shes rab can drang ba'i don te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:264b-42: sbyang byas pa'i shes rab ldan pa la drang ba'i don du de rnams sbyin pa'o //
T02TD1203E:264b-44: dbang po rab kyi yang rab yin pa'i phyir na /
T02TD1203E:264b-45: bsod nams chen pos yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid can /
T02TD1203E:264b-46: ji ltar padma yongs su smin pa las nyi ma'i 'od kyis reg gang tsam gyis rgyas par gyur pa'o //
T02TD1203E:264b-47: padma yongs su ma smin pa rnams ni /
T02TD1203E:264b-49: 'on kyang dus phyis rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1203E:264b-50: de bas na sa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu thob cing sbyang ba byas pa'i don te /
T02TD1203E:264b-51: mchog gi bla ma dang 'dzom pa'o //
T02TD1203E:265a-1: gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba bstan te /
T02TD1203E:265a-2: nor bu'i mgrin par byang chub sems //
T02TD1203E:265a-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:265a-4: slob ma'i gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i dus su ye shes bskyed pa'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1203E:265a-5: rke yi dbus su rtsa gnyis ni //
T02TD1203E:265a-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1203E:265a-7: mthe bo mtha' ltag gnyis kyis man na //
T02TD1203E:265a-9: thabs dang shes rab kyi rdo rje dang padma'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin du bsams te /
T02TD1203E:265a-10: rtsa btsir ba la rtog pa med pa'i ye shes skye ba 'di ni /
T02TD1203E:265a-11: gsang ba'i dbang gi don yin te /
T02TD1203E:265a-14: de'i dpe yi rang bzhin ni /
T02TD1203E:265a-15: bu mos rnyed pa'i bde ji bzhin //
T02TD1203E:265a-17: skyes pa dang phrad pa'i bu mo gzhon nu ma'i bde bde gzhan dag las bstan brjod par mi nus pa ji ltar ba bzhin du /
T02TD1203E:265a-18: rtsa mnan pa'i ye shes kyang don de ltar ro //
T02TD1203E:265a-19: gzhan kha cig ni ma ning la sogs pa'i shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i thabs dang /
T02TD1203E:265a-20: ye shes su bcas pa yin no zer ro //
T02TD1203E:265a-22: ji ltar gzhon pa'i chags dag dang //
T02TD1203E:265a-23: ji ltar lkugs pa'i rmi lam bzhin //
T02TD1203E:265a-26: rke yi dbus su rtsa gnyis ni //
T02TD1203E:265a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1203E:265a-28: rgad po dang skyes pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i ye shes la bral ba'i dga' ba nyams su myong ba /
T02TD1203E:265a-29: dul ba'i mthe bong dang mtha' ltag gi rtsol ba las skye ba'i don to zhes zer ro //
T02TD1203E:265a-30: da ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ston te /
T02TD1203E:265a-31: reg bya chen pos dga' ba che //
T02TD1203E:265a-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:265a-33: rdo rje slob dpon gyis gzhon nu ma la /
T02TD1203E:265a-34: rdo rje dang padma sbyor ba las nang gi reg bya chen po'i mtshan nyid dga' ba'i don nyams su myong ba dang /
T02TD1203E:265a-35: de las mchog gi dga' ba la sogs pa'i bde ba bdag dang shes rab man gyis kas myong ba'i don rang bzhin dga' ba rdzogs pa'i rim pas dbang rdzogs par bskur bas shes rab kyi dad pa skyed pa dang /
T02TD1203E:265a-36: yang slob ma de lta bu'i don bstan cing /
T02TD1203E:265b-0: @265b skad cig ma rnams kyi don bstan cing don du yang gzhug pa ni /
T02TD1203E:265b-1: dga' sogs bye brag mgu bar bya //
T02TD1203E:265b-4: rtsa ba nas gsal ba'i don gyis so //
T02TD1203E:265b-5: da ni slob ma dbang bskur zhing skyabs sbyin gyi cho ga gzhan du ston te /
T02TD1203E:265b-6: de nas slob ma la sbyin bya //
T02TD1203E:265b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:265b-8: dbang bskur ba'i rim pa de rnams ni las dang po pa rnams la sbyin no //
T02TD1203E:265b-9: shes rab can gyi slob ma la ni /
T02TD1203E:265b-10: bya ba dang bral ba'i dbang sbyin pa yin te /
T02TD1203E:265b-11: nang la sogs pa bum pa dang /
T02TD1203E:265b-12: gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes dang bzhi pa rnams so //
T02TD1203E:265b-13: 'on kyang rgyud las ni 'di skad du /
T02TD1203E:265b-14: dang po'i dga' ba dang ldan pa //
T02TD1203E:265b-15: sras dang po la sbyin par bya //
T02TD1203E:265b-16: gnyis pa dga' ba dang ldan pa //
T02TD1203E:265b-17: snang ba gsum ni thabs la sbyin //
T02TD1203E:265b-18: gsum pa dga' ba dang ldan pa /
T02TD1203E:265b-19: chos kyi sprin rnyed nges pas so //
T02TD1203E:265b-20: bzhi pa'i dga' ba dang ldan pa'i //
T02TD1203E:265b-21: kun du 'od rnyed sa la sbyin //
T02TD1203E:265b-23: bla ma'i zhal snga nas las dang po ba de gnyis ni gcig la ma yin te /
T02TD1203E:265b-25: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po pa dang /
T02TD1203E:265b-26: slob bzhin pa'i khyad par gyi phyir ni rgyu gnyis su ming tsam mthun yang ;
T02TD1203E:265b-27: don ni de lta ma yin no //
T02TD1203E:265b-28: dper na lha'i bu tshangs pa dang /
T02TD1203E:265b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshangs pa bzhin no zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:265b-30: mtha' ni rnam par 'byed par shes //
T02TD1203E:265b-32: chad pa'i dga' ba'i pho brang ye shes bco lnga'i rnam pa 'byed pa ni /
T02TD1203E:265b-33: rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes la rten dang bcas pa'i dngos po rnams kyi bye brag go //
T02TD1203E:265b-34: bcom pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:265b-35: de rnams kun gyi nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma ji snyed bcom pa'i phyir ni /
T02TD1203E:265b-36: rang bzhin dga' ba'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1203E:265b-37: de'i rten gyi khyad par dang /
T02TD1203E:265b-38: bskyed pa'i rim par rdzogs pa'i ye shes chen po mthong bzhin rnyed par 'gyur bar bshad pa'o //
T02TD1203E:265b-39: de'i phyir na rnam par 'byed pa bcom mthar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:265b-41: ye shes chen po sku dang bral //
T02TD1203E:265b-42: gnyis su med par nam mkha' bzhin //
T02TD1203E:266a-2: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u nyi shu bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1203E:266a-4: // / mngon sum zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:266a-5: nyid kyis mngon sum du nyams su myong nas /
T02TD1203E:266a-6: gzhan la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i don bstan pa'am ;
T02TD1203E:266a-7: rjes su dpag pa ni nyams su myong bar dgongs pa'i dbang gis gzhan dag la rtags kyi mtshan nyid la brten nas gsungs pa yin pa'am /
T02TD1203E:266a-8: rgyu dang 'bras bu mthun pa ma yin na ni /
T02TD1203E:266a-10: dper na 'bras kyi sa bon las 'bras 'byung ba ni rigs pa yin pa dang /
T02TD1203E:266a-11: sa bon las 'bras bu s'a lu skye ba ni mi rigs pa'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:266a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don gsungs pa ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
T02TD1203E:266a-14: gsang sna padma'i snying po ni //
T02TD1203E:266a-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:266a-16: thabs rnal 'byor pa'i gsang ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i rtse mor rang gi gnas na chu skyes padma brgyad pa'i 'og na gsum pa lte ba dang bcas pa'i snying po ni tshig rgyas pa'i gnas yin te /
T02TD1203E:266a-17: phyag rgya rnams las gang yang rung ba gcig gis sbyor ba byas pa las /
T02TD1203E:266a-18: ye shes kyi me 'bar bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD1203E:266a-19: yang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje bde ba byang chub kyi sems slar rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i gnas su gshegs pa nyid kyis rgyas pa'i don ni rim gyis ye shes snying po'i bdag nyid rgyal po'o //
T02TD1203E:266a-20: yang na thams cad kyi ni tshig / ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1203E:266a-21: snying po ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis spangs pa'i byang chub kyi sems gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te /
T02TD1203E:266a-22: dbyer mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid can rdo rje bya gdong ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i rtsa dbyibs kha khva mu kha'i rtsa dbyibs ni shes rab ma'i dbang du byas te /
T02TD1203E:266a-23: 'dab ma dang lte ba la sogs pa ni sngar bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:266a-24: de la rdo rje rtse mo yis //
T02TD1203E:266a-26: thabs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje rin po che dang /
T02TD1203E:266a-27: sangs rgyas rin po che gnyis kha sprad pa las gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi gzugs kyi bdag nyid la rgyu byed pa'i dngos po'o //
T02TD1203E:266a-28: phye ba de ni rgyas par mdzod //
T02TD1203E:266b-0: rdo rje dang @266b padma'i don gyis snying po bde ba chen po'i byang chub kyi sems kyi bya gdong ma khong du chud pa ni /
T02TD1203E:266b-2: ae ta bi gal gnyis kyi dbus //
T02TD1203E:266b-4: g-yas pa ni g-yon pa'i rtsa gzung 'dzin gyi dngos po dang bcas pas rtog pa can gyi mtshan nyid dang gcig pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin dbus na gnyis dang bral ba /
T02TD1203E:266b-5: gnyis pa'i bdag nyid bde ba dang bcas pa'i phyir rtog med ma'o //
T02TD1203E:266b-6: so sho ma ye shes ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:266b-7: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i gzugs kyi zhu ba med pa shin tu phra ba'i ye shes rgyun mi 'chad pa ni 'bab pa'i rgyu ba ;
T02TD1203E:266b-8: gzung 'dzin spangs pa'i rtsa nyid kyi ming gi rnam grangs ni mtshan nyid spangs pa'i gzugs su gnas zhes bya'o //
T02TD1203E:266b-9: thabs dang shes rab kyi ye shes don rtogs par bya ba gsungs pa /
T02TD1203E:266b-10: bsgrub dang bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1203E:266b-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:266b-12: las kyi phyag rgya la ltos pa med par tshig rgyas pa'i snying po'i don bshad pa ni /
T02TD1203E:266b-13: lte ba'i dbus nas smin 'khor lo //
T02TD1203E:266b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:266b-15: kha cig na re las kyi phyag rgya'i bsgrub pa dang bsrub pa'i rgyus /
T02TD1203E:266b-16: lte ba'i gnas nas smin 'khor lo //
T02TD1203E:266b-17: la sogs pa yin par 'gyur ba'o zhes zer ro //
T02TD1203E:266b-18: da ni rang bzhin dga' ba bde ba chen po'i rgyal po'i don bshad tshig rgyas pa'i zhes bya ba'i sgras gsal bar ston te /
T02TD1203E:266b-19: ma ni bsrub dang bsrub pa ste //
T02TD1203E:266b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras gsungs pa'i don ni /
T02TD1203E:266b-21: le'u bcu bzhi pa'i sgra'i dbyi gzhug bstan pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD1203E:266b-22: bsrub pa dang bsrub pa ni thabs dang shes rab la brten pa'i don ston pa ni dga' ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i don ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02TD1203E:266b-23: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u nyi shu lnga pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1203E:266b-25: // / de kho na nyid kyi snying po'i don ston pa'i le'u 'byung ba la ni /
T02TD1203E:266b-26: de nas gzhan nyon bdag gis bshad //
T02TD1203E:266b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis sdud pa po la bos nas 'di'i zab mo'i don nyid du bsdus te gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:267a-2: rgyud 'di dbu nas zhabs su gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rgyu la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:267a-3: 'di rnams ni rgyud kyi don gyi snying po bsdus pa yin pas /
T02TD1203E:267a-4: phyi ma la sogs pa ni 'di dang rang rang gi le'u'i skabs su gsal la /
T02TD1203E:267a-5: de kho na nyid kyi skabs 'di ni ;
T02TD1203E:267a-6: dpal de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma'i rgyud du gsal bar gsungs pas der blta bar bya zhing /
T02TD1203E:267a-7: shes par bya ba yin no //
T02TD1203E:267a-9: 'dir mangs pas 'jigs pa dang 'pho ba dang 'byung ba'i chos can gyi phyir na /
T02TD1203E:267a-10: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'di'i don der zhib tu bshad pa'i don gyis ma bris pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:267a-11: 'on kyang 'dir dga' ba'i don ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD1203E:267a-12: de ni bde ba chen po'i mtha' //
T02TD1203E:267a-14: bde ba chen po'i ye shes rang bzhin dga' ba'i mnga' bdag spros pa dang bral ba'i don la /
T02TD1203E:267a-15: de kho na nyid bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid bde ba chen po'i rgyal po bdud rtsi'i gter la yang dag pa'i don bstan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:267a-17: de nyid bsdus pa'i snying po'i don //
T02TD1203E:267a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:267a-19: de nyid sum cu drug bdag po //
T02TD1203E:267a-21: de kho na nyid gang yang rung ba'i sgo nas zhugs shing /
T02TD1203E:267a-22: bsgom pa la 'bad pa'i stobs kyis rang bzhin gyi ye shes bde ba chen po nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD1203E:267a-23: de bzhin du bzhi ba cus kyang de nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD1203E:267a-24: yang gcig kyang kun gyi bdag nyid dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1203E:267a-25: kun kyang de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba khod du chud par bya ba yin no //
T02TD1203E:267a-26: 'dir spyod pa drug bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig ler gsungs pas /
T02TD1203E:267a-27: de rang bzhin bcu po spyir bzhag pa'i don bstan pa ni /
T02TD1203E:267a-28: cha yi ye shes tshor byed do //
T02TD1203E:267a-30: sbyor ba rnams de kho na nyid rnams ni thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'i de kho na nyid du 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes so //
T02TD1203E:267a-31: 'di ni 'bras bu'i don yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD1203E:267a-32: rnam par dag pa de nyid mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:267a-33: gzhan du sa'i rim pa dang sbyar nas yang 'dir bshad pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:267b-0: dpal ye @267b shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u nyi shu drug pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1203E:267b-2: // / bcom ldan 'das ni mchog dga' la //
T02TD1203E:267b-3: kun dga' ba yi rnam pa'i sku //
T02TD1203E:267b-5: dga' ba thams cad kyi bdag nyid mchog gi dga' ba /
T02TD1203E:267b-6: rab las rab mchog tu 'gyur ba'i dga' ba de nyid ni /
T02TD1203E:267b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis dang gnyis su med pa'i phyir na kun dga' ba ste /
T02TD1203E:267b-9: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T02TD1203E:267b-11: rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i 'phags pa'i khongs su gtogs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD1203E:267b-12: 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar mdzad pa'i sku nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi sku lta bas chog mi shes pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:267b-13: de nyid kyi ni zhal brgyad po //
T02TD1203E:267b-15: de kho na nyid bzhi bcu dang /
T02TD1203E:267b-16: sbyor ba drug gi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku yin pa de'i zhal brgyad dang ldan ba'i rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyi don 'dri ba ni /
T02TD1203E:267b-17: rnam par dag pa ji ltar lags //
T02TD1203E:267b-19: zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad //
T02TD1203E:267b-21: gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni //
T02TD1203E:267b-22: rnam par thar pa dang po'o //
T02TD1203E:267b-23: nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs la lta pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1203E:267b-24: sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni gsum pa'o //
T02TD1203E:267b-25: de'i gzugs ni thogs pa dang bcas pa'o snyam nas gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te /
T02TD1203E:267b-26: nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam pa 'di ni bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1203E:267b-27: nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam pa'i 'du shes las 'das te /
T02TD1203E:267b-28: rnam shes mtha' yas so snyam pa 'di ni lnga pa'o //
T02TD1203E:267b-29: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las 'das te /
T02TD1203E:267b-30: ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni drug pa'o //
T02TD1203E:267b-31: ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
T02TD1203E:267b-32: 'du shes med min bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni bdun pa'o //
T02TD1203E:267b-33: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
T02TD1203E:267b-35: 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o //
T02TD1203E:268a-1: rnam par dag pa ni zhal brgyad do //
T02TD1203E:268a-2: nang gi stong pa de kho na nyid ces pa ni /
T02TD1203E:268a-3: gsang ba'i don 'og nas bshad pa'i zhal 'di yin te /
T02TD1203E:268a-4: stong ba dang shin tu stong ba dang /
T02TD1203E:268a-7: bdag nyid kyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD1203E:268a-8: sngags kyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD1203E:268a-9: dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD1203E:268a-10: lha'i de kho na nyid dang brgyad rnam par dag pa'i zhal brgyad pa'o //
T02TD1203E:268a-11: spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni /
T02TD1203E:268a-13: ye shes so zhes bya ba ni sa bcu ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nas /
T02TD1203E:268a-14: sa bcu pa'i bar te stobs bcu po dang /
T02TD1203E:268a-16: rnam par dag pa'i 'bras bu spyan rnams so //
T02TD1203E:268a-17: phyag rnams stong zhing rnam par dag / ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:268a-20: phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
T02TD1203E:268a-21: chen po stong pa nyid dang /
T02TD1203E:268a-26: thog ma dang tha ma med pa dang /
T02TD1203E:268a-32: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
T02TD1203E:268a-33: de rnams rnam par dag pa phyag bcu drug pa rnams so //
T02TD1203E:268a-34: sbyangs pa'i yon tan bden pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang go sla bas mngas pas 'jigs pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:268a-35: 'on kyang mdor bsdus pa tsam bshad de /
T02TD1203E:268a-36: sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis /
T02TD1203E:268a-38: thod pa ni phyag mtshan rnams te /
T02TD1203E:268a-39: bcom ldan 'das la yum gyis gnang ba'o //
T02TD1203E:268a-40: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i gnyis spangs pa /
T02TD1203E:268a-41: 'jigs byed ma chen po bcu drug khrag kha nas 'dzag pa /
T02TD1203E:268a-43: gnas brgyad kyi dbang gis klu brgyad rnam par dag pa ni sna tshogs padma brgyad pa'i gdan no //
T02TD1203E:268a-44: thabs kyi dngos por 'dzin pa spangs pa ni med pa'i mtshan nyid yin la /
T02TD1203E:268a-45: de rang med pa yang med pa ni mi dmigs pas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ni gzugs med pa'i bdag nyid kyi 'du shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid do //
T02TD1203E:268b-0: dpal @268b ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u nyi shu bdun pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1203E:268b-2: // / der rnam par dag pa'i don gyis de kho na nyid bstan pa'i rjes su ni de nas zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD1203E:268b-3: bcom ldan mos zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1203E:268b-4: sdud pa po zhu ba byed pa'i dngos kyis bstan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:268b-5: ma mchu'i bdud rtsi'i ro phul nas //
T02TD1203E:268b-7: zhal gyi tshems kyis mchu btsir ba dang /
T02TD1203E:268b-8: gzhibs pas bde ba'i ro bstar ba dang /
T02TD1203E:268b-9: de bzhin du gsang ba'i padma'i ye shes kyi ros bde ba rgyas shing mnyes par mdzad pa'i tshul gyis gdul bya la dgongs te /
T02TD1203E:268b-10: ye shes sgyu ma'i gzugs kyis sgyu ma'i bde bas sgyu ma nyid la rol cing spyod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1203E:268b-11: nyi ma dang zla ba'i me tog gis mchod nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:268b-13: ku mu da'i rgyu'i rkyen nyi ma dang zla ba de nyid ga pur dang sihla dga' ba rnams kyis mnyes par byas te zhus so zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1203E:268b-14: sems can kun gyi las su bshad //
T02TD1203E:268b-15: ces bya ba'i bar du sbyar ro //
T02TD1203E:268b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:268b-17: dus phyis dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud 'di skal ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la dus bshad cing ston pas gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:268b-18: dpal phyag na rdo rje mgon pos bshad par byed do zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:268b-19: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs gsang ba'i ye shes kyi mdzod 'dzin pa ni /
T02TD1203E:268b-20: dpal phyag na rdo rje de nyid dang mtshungs pa dpal rgyal po aindra bh'u ti zhes bya ba /
T02TD1203E:268b-21: sprul pa'i sku de nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus su yang dag par gsang ba'i rgyud 'di skal ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la bshad cing ston par 'gyur pa'o //
T02TD1203E:268b-23: ma 'ongs dus na byang phyogs su //
T02TD1203E:268b-24: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas //
T02TD1203E:268b-25: au rgyan yul zhes bya ba ru //
T02TD1203E:268b-26: rgyal po'i rigs su skyes pa yi //
T02TD1203E:268b-27: aindra bh'u ti zhes bya bas //
T02TD1203E:268b-28: shes pa dang ni bshad pa dang //
T02TD1203E:268b-29: sems can rnams la gsal byed 'gyur //
T02TD1203E:268b-31: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs gsang ba'i ye shes kyi bdag po yin pa'i don ni /
T02TD1203E:268b-32: dpal phyag na rdo rje'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
T02TD1203E:268b-33: phyag na rdo rje mgon po che //
T02TD1203E:269a-3: mtha' yas pa yi 'jig rten khams //
T02TD1203E:269a-5: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu bas bsdus pa'i 'jig rten pa dang chags pas bsdus pa'i khams gsum gyis bsdus na yang de'i byed pa ni /
T02TD1203E:269a-6: bye ba mtha' yas bgrang ba las 'das pa'i 'jig rten pa'i khams thams cad do //
T02TD1203E:269a-7: skye ba dang 'jig pa'i rgyu yin no zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:269a-8: gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems skye ba dang /
T02TD1203E:269a-9: 'gag pa med pa las kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis skye ba dang /
T02TD1203E:269a-13: rnam par byang ba'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo skye ba dang /
T02TD1203E:269a-16: 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid gzugs de rnams med pa'o //
T02TD1203E:269a-17: de'i phyir de la skye ba gang yang med /
T02TD1203E:269a-18: rang byung mchog gi dbang phyug go //
T02TD1203E:269a-21: sems can kun nas nyon mongs pas na /
T02TD1203E:269a-22: sems kun nas nyon mongs par snang ngo //
T02TD1203E:269a-23: sems can rnam par byang bas na sems rnam par byang bar snang ngo zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:269a-25: de yi phyag na rdo rje gang //
T02TD1203E:269a-26: zhes bya ba ni dris pa'o //
T02TD1203E:269a-28: ye shes bcu gnyis skye ba med //
T02TD1203E:269a-30: me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa lnga ni /
T02TD1203E:269a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lnga'i gzugs su snang ba dang /
T02TD1203E:269a-32: de rnams kyis sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa'i shes rab kyi gzugs kyis snang ba ste /
T02TD1203E:269a-33: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i ye shes skye ba med pa nyid ni /
T02TD1203E:269a-34: dbyer med pa'i ye shes spros pa dang bral ba nyid gdul bya'i dbang gis skal ba dang ldan pa la /
T02TD1203E:269a-35: ji lta ba bzhin du snang ba so so nas gsal bar mthong ba'o //
T02TD1203E:269a-37: thog ma yi ni ra lnga las ;
T02TD1203E:269a-38: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:269a-39: chos nyid dbyer med pa'i ye shes kyi phyir na /
T02TD1203E:269a-40: rdo rje 'di nyid ye shes lnga dang ldan nas bdag nyid gnas pa'am /
T02TD1203E:269a-41: de rang gi dbye ba'i phyir ra lnga phyi nang gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
T02TD1203E:269b-0: 'on kyang thabs dang shes rab kyis 'dul ba'i phyir de bzhin @269b gshegs pa lnga 'byung zhing /
T02TD1203E:269b-1: yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs su kun bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1203E:269b-2: mtha' nas 'byung ba chen po lnga //
T02TD1203E:269b-4: gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin las spyan ma la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyis 'byung ba'i phyir na chen po ste /
T02TD1203E:269b-5: bde ba chen po sku'i mnga' bdag chen po'o //
T02TD1203E:269b-6: de 'gro ba'i don mdzad kyang mi 'gyur ba dang nyams pa la sogs pa'i rkyen mi mnga' bar /
T02TD1203E:269b-7: yon tan thams cad dang bde ba'i ye shes kun rdzob pa'i phyir na /
T02TD1203E:269b-8: 'gro ba'i don du sems dpas na rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD1203E:269b-11: de bzhin lha la sogs pa'i gzugs 'byung ba de rab tu bshad pa bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:269b-12: phyag na rdo rje stobs chen po //
T02TD1203E:269b-13: thams cad rdor 'dzin gyi bdag po //
T02TD1203E:269b-14: mtha' yas pa yi 'jig rten khams //
T02TD1203E:269b-15: skye dang 'jig pa'i rgyu yin no //
T02TD1203E:269b-16: de la skye ba gang yang med //
T02TD1203E:269b-17: rang 'byung mchog gi dbang phyug go //
T02TD1203E:269b-19: sna tshogs pa yi gzugs su sbyor //
T02TD1203E:269b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni /
T02TD1203E:269b-22: rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen te //
T02TD1203E:269b-23: gnas ni gang du bzhugs 'gyur ba //
T02TD1203E:269b-24: brtan g-yo kun la rol mdzad pa //
T02TD1203E:269b-25: bcom ldan lha yis bshad du gsol //
T02TD1203E:269b-26: slob dpon nyid kyis 'di skad gsungs //
T02TD1203E:269b-27: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam 'phrul ba //
T02TD1203E:269b-28: sh'akya tshul bzhin pa yis nyon //
T02TD1203E:269b-29: thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs pa //
T02TD1203E:269b-30: sngar ni gang zhig bshad pa nyid //
T02TD1203E:269b-31: sgo dgu dang ni ldan pa yis //
T02TD1203E:269b-32: lus kyi dkyil 'khor mchog yin te //
T02TD1203E:269b-33: de la lte ba'i 'khor lo ni //
T02TD1203E:269b-34: thams cad mkhyen ces bya bar gsungs //
T02TD1203E:269b-35: rdo rje can ni der bzhugs pa //
T02TD1203E:269b-36: lus can gyi ni nang na rol //
T02TD1203E:269b-37: cha med cha ni rnam par spangs //
T02TD1203E:269b-38: lus las 'das shing gos pa med //
T02TD1203E:269b-39: la lar lus dag can du zhugs //
T02TD1203E:269b-40: la lar rna bar sgra dag dang //
T02TD1203E:269b-41: la lar sna dang dri dag dang //
T02TD1203E:269b-42: la lar dri chen rdor chu dang //
T02TD1203E:269b-43: la lar tshor dang bcas sems su //
T02TD1203E:269b-44: bkres dang skom pa gang la lar //
T02TD1203E:269b-45: la lar bde ba rnam par gzigs //
T02TD1203E:269b-46: la lar zhi dang la lar khros //
T02TD1203E:269b-47: la lar bud med chags pa dang //
T02TD1203E:269b-48: la lar 'jigs shing la lar dgod //
T02TD1203E:270a-2: la lar rol cing la lar gsod //
T02TD1203E:270a-3: la lar me tog 'bras bur gnas //
T02TD1203E:270a-4: la lar srog tu rnam par gnas //
T02TD1203E:270a-5: sa chu me rlung mkha' la lar //
T02TD1203E:270a-6: la lar 'byung ba chen po lnga //
T02TD1203E:270a-7: la lar rigs kyi bye brag gis //
T02TD1203E:270a-8: bram ze dang ni gdol pa dag /
T02TD1203E:270a-9: la lar ma dang la lar sring //
T02TD1203E:270a-10: la lar chung ma nyid kyis so //
T02TD1203E:270a-11: de bzhin la lar bu mo'i gzugs //
T02TD1203E:270a-12: la lar tshangs pa la lar ni //
T02TD1203E:270a-13: khyab 'jug dbang ldan nyi ma dang //
T02TD1203E:270a-14: zla ba skar ma de bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:270a-15: la lar nyin dang mtshan la lar //
T02TD1203E:270a-16: la lar khams gsum pa rnams kun //
T02TD1203E:270a-17: la lar byed pa po dang ni //
T02TD1203E:270a-18: mi bzad rgyal ni gang la lar //
T02TD1203E:270a-19: la lar shi ba'i dbang gis zhum //
T02TD1203E:270a-20: mi gsal ston pa rdo rje can //
T02TD1203E:270a-21: la lar rgad po lo mang po //
T02TD1203E:270a-22: la lar byis pa'i gzugs rang bzhin //
T02TD1203E:270a-23: la lar nad cher gdungs pa dang //
T02TD1203E:270a-24: la lar byang chub chen por gshegs //
T02TD1203E:270a-25: bdud las rgyal ba gang la lar //
T02TD1203E:270a-26: la lar rgyu dang mi rgyu nyid //
T02TD1203E:270a-27: la lar dkar dang la lar ser //
T02TD1203E:270a-28: la lar sngo dang la lar dmar //
T02TD1203E:270a-29: la lar sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1203E:270a-30: la lar sgrol ma la lar spyan //
T02TD1203E:270a-31: la lar gos dkar m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1203E:270a-32: la lar zhi ba dka' bzlog ma //
T02TD1203E:270a-33: mkhas nas 'dab chags gang la lar //
T02TD1203E:270a-34: nam mkha' mkha' 'gro gang la lar //
T02TD1203E:270a-35: la lar klu dang la lar sbrul //
T02TD1203E:270a-36: la lar smad 'tshong la lar spre'u //
T02TD1203E:270a-37: la lar rmi lam mthong ba dang //
T02TD1203E:270a-38: la lar gnyid ni log pa dang //
T02TD1203E:270a-39: la lar rlung dang la lar mkhris //
T02TD1203E:270a-40: la lar pags pa la lar khrag / la lar sreg byed me dag dang //
T02TD1203E:270a-41: la lar mya ngan du pa dang //
T02TD1203E:270a-42: la lar mtho ris skye ba dang //
T02TD1203E:270a-44: thams cad bdag nyid zhugs 'di la //
T02TD1203E:270a-45: aindra bh'u tis bshad pa yin //
T02TD1203E:270a-47: de rnams kyi don gyis thams cad la khyab cing bzhugs pa'i rang bzhin gyis ;
T02TD1203E:270a-48: sku gsum dang ldan pa bde ba chen po'i skus /
T02TD1203E:270a-49: 'gro ba la sogs pa la khyab pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i don gsum pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:270a-50: la lar rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid //
T02TD1203E:270a-51: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1203E:270b-0: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid @270b ces bya ba le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1203E:270b-2: // / de nas de'i dus su 'khor thams cad langs te zhes bya ba ni dpal phyag na rdo rje'i don dang /
T02TD1203E:270b-5: bar cis kyang mchod pa de ma thag tu ni /
T02TD1203E:270b-6: 'khor bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi 'khor thams cad langs nas //
T02TD1203E:270b-7: bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byed pa ni /
T02TD1203E:270b-8: khu ba'i gzugs la bskor ba dang /
T02TD1203E:270b-9: bstod pa'i don gyis sbyor ba drug gi mtshan nyid kyis thabs bde ba chen po'i rnam pa g-yas pa bshad do //
T02TD1203E:270b-10: bskor ba ni 'khor rnams kyis bskor ba byas pa'i don de dus gsum pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1203E:270b-11: lan gsum ni sku gsung thugs kyi dbye bas gsum du bstan pa'o //
T02TD1203E:270b-12: de bcom ldan 'das nyid la mnga' ba byas nas zhes so //
T02TD1203E:270b-13: zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD1203E:270b-15: drang ba'i don gyis sgra ji bzhin no //
T02TD1203E:270b-16: yang na zhabs dang mgo bo'i sgra yis bstan to //
T02TD1203E:270b-17: sbyor ba drug gi don yang don gnyis kyis khong du chud par bya ba yin te /
T02TD1203E:270b-19: thabs kyi rim pa'i dbye ba ni los kyang mos //
T02TD1203E:270b-21: mgon po khyod kyi bka' drin bdag cag dag / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:270b-22: blta bar dka' ba ni 'gro ba thams cad la rgyu'i mtshan nyid du yid kyis kyang sems kyi rang bzhin dngos po dang mtshan ma ma spangs pas mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1203E:270b-23: shes par dka' ba ni sbyor ba drug po la sogs pa'i man ngag 'di kun gyi thun mong ma yin pas /
T02TD1203E:270b-24: las 'phro dang skal bar ldan pa 'ga' spyod yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1203E:270b-26: 'od rab kyi ngo bo 'bras bu'i rang bzhin mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa'i phyir na /
T02TD1203E:270b-27: dbang po la sogs pa'i yul las 'das pa /
T02TD1203E:270b-28: gzung 'dzin dang bral ba'i 'di nyid de kho na nyid dam pa'o //
T02TD1203E:270b-30: gsang ba'i rang bzhin gyis gsang ba dang /
T02TD1203E:270b-31: 'jig rten nyan thos la sogs pa rnams la gsang ba'o //
T02TD1203E:270b-32: gsang ba'i mchog ni dam tshig dang mi ldan pa rnams dang /
T02TD1203E:270b-33: theg pa chen po pa rnams la gsang ba dang /
T02TD1203E:270b-34: bskyed pa'i rim pa la spyod pa la sogs pa rnams las mchog tu gyur pa ni /
T02TD1203E:271a-2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes de nyid dam pa 'di ni kun gyis thob par bya bar 'os pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir mchog go //
T02TD1203E:271a-5: thob ces bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam grangs su gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:271a-6: de bas na bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo dbang phyug chos dbyings phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1203E:271a-7: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1203E:271a-8: de bzhin du sbyar zhing rgya cher bshad do //
T02TD1203E:271a-9: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u nyi shu dgu pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1203E:271a-11: // / yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan ma bos te zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad du yang dag pa'i don nges par ston pa'i rgyud 'di nan tan dang bcas nas gtang ba'i cho ga gsungs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na ma zhes bya'o //
T02TD1203E:271a-12: sbyor ba drug gi grags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1203E:271a-13: dpal mchog gi bla ma'i zhal nas 'bad pas btsal te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1203E:271a-14: dpal aindra bh'u ti rgyal po chen po las bar ma chad pa'i man ngag thob pa dang /
T02TD1203E:271a-15: dbang bskur ba yin zhing grub pa brnyes pa dang ldan na /
T02TD1203E:271a-16: sbyor ba drug la sogs pa'i rgyud shes pas de lta bu la blangs la /
T02TD1203E:271a-17: dam tshig dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1203E:271a-18: de yang 'di skad du bsam gtan la sogs pa'i sa yang dag par thob par bya zhes gtan la bab pa'o //
T02TD1203E:271a-20: de bzhin du thabs kyi rgyud 'di yang nan tan du bya ba dang mchod pa dang /
T02TD1203E:271a-22: rim gro la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1203E:271a-23: chu dang me la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1203E:271a-24: chu dmigs na par sba ba dang /
T02TD1203E:271a-26: bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don gyis bshad pa yin no //
T02TD1203E:271a-27: yang de bzhin du phyi rabs rnams kyis kyang /
T02TD1203E:271a-28: bsam gtan la sogs pas nyams su blangs zhing tha na skad cig tsam yang mnyam par gzhag pas bde ba thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1203E:271a-29: bsgoms shing bsgrubs pas 'bras bu thob pa ni /
T02TD1203E:271a-31: gzhan du na log par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02TD1203E:271b-0: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel @271b gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u sum cu pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1203E:271b-2: // / gang tshe yang dag mchog gi lus la ma brten par /
T02TD1203E:271b-3: de tsam thos dang sgra sogs chos ni ji snyed kun //
T02TD1203E:271b-4: rgyud kyi don ni ji bzhin shes par nus ma yin //
T02TD1203E:271b-5: de bas bdag gis dka' 'grel 'di ni byas pa'o //
T02TD1203E:271b-6: ji ltar rdo rjes phug pa'i nor bu ni //
T02TD1203E:271b-7: srad bus rjes su 'jug cing bde bas bstar //
T02TD1203E:271b-8: dam pa rnams kyis gsungs pa'i man ngag la //
T02TD1203E:271b-9: bdag kyang de bzhin 'dir ni brten pa'o //
T02TD1203E:271b-10: rtsod dang bag med gyur pa yis //
T02TD1203E:271b-12: 'phags pas rang gi sras bzhin du ;
T02TD1203E:271b-13: / de dag thams cad bzod par gsol //
T02TD1203E:271b-14: gang du bdag gis ma shes pa //
T02TD1203E:271b-15: der ni bdag la yod min na //
T02TD1203E:271b-16: sangs rgyas sras dang bcas sogs rnams //
T02TD1203E:271b-17: kun gyis bzod par de la mdzod //
T02TD1203E:271b-18: rgyal po aindra bh'u ti yi //
T02TD1203E:271b-20: dam tshig sdom pa bsrung ba dang //
T02TD1203E:271b-21: bla ma la gus bsgom la brtson //
T02TD1203E:271b-22: shes rab rnam gsum dang ldan pas //
T02TD1203E:271b-24: man ngag 'di la rim ji ltar //
T02TD1203E:271b-25: grub thob pa ni bde bar nges //
T02TD1203E:271b-26: de bas gzhung ni ma nor bar //
T02TD1203E:271b-27: dam pa'i dpal ldan bla ma la //
T02TD1203E:271b-28: 'bad pas btsal nas rang nyid bsgrub //
T02TD1203E:271b-30: de lta min te log pa ni //
T02TD1203E:271b-31: sdug bsngal myong nas lhung ba yin //
T02TD1203E:271b-32: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' yin kyang ni 'grel sogs bral //
T02TD1203E:271b-33: don ni byis pas ma nor shes par nus pa yin //
T02TD1203E:271b-34: de bas 'di byas pa yi dge ba'i bsod nams kyis //
T02TD1203E:271b-35: 'gro ba ma lus rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas thob shog / dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba slob dpon a'a ts'a rya dzny'a na bar ma yis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1203E:271b-37: // / bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong byang chub 'byung gnas kyis bsgyur ba'o //
T02TD1203E:271b-38: rgyud rgyal ye shes thig le la //
T02TD1203E:271b-39: aindra bh'u ti'i man ngag gis //
T02TD1203E:271b-40: rim gyis brgyud nas legs par bshad //
T02TD1203E:271b-41: dam tshig can gyis rtogs par shog /
